polysemy_1951264_11.mp4.en: I haven't dealt in anything as common as money in years.

polysemy_1951264_12.mp4.en: Remember, Katniss, today's about making allies.

polysemy_1951264_13.mp4.en: I guess we just try to figure out who we trust least and work our way backwards from there.

polysemy_1951264_19.mp4.en: Tonight will be their final opportunity to express their thoughts.

polysemy_4176826_21.mp4.en: The body can absorb some Jewry.

polysemy_4944380_4.mp4.ja: お疲れさんスーパーガール

polysemy_4212498_2.mp4.en: Finch, we just got another number.

polysemy_4212498_4.mp4.ja: 代替要員は彼女の場所を取る
polysemy_4212498_4.mp4.en: An alternate will take her place.

polysemy_4212498_5.mp4.en: I went through the academy, actually.

polysemy_4212498_6.mp4.ja: 俺は実際に子供の頃告訴された
polysemy_4212498_6.mp4.en: I actually did get sued when I was a kid.

polysemy_4212498_7.mp4.ja: それは職業を危険に晒す

polysemy_4212498_8.mp4.ja: 取れる限りにしてはどうだろう

polysemy_4212498_10.mp4.ja: あなたは考えを変えないと

polysemy_4212498_14.mp4.ja: でも黒幕は彼女の秘密を明かすことはない
polysemy_4212498_14.mp4.en: But a magician never reveals her secrets.

polysemy_4212498_16.mp4.ja: まあ多分それは新しい習慣の為の時間だ
polysemy_4212498_16.mp4.en: Well, maybe it's time for some new habits.

polysemy_4724492_10.mp4.ja: その対処法で夫と対立...
polysemy_4724492_10.mp4.en: Clayton and I disagreed over how to handle it.

polysemy_4724492_12.mp4.ja: もっと広範囲で避難警告を出さないと

polysemy_4724492_13.mp4.en: I thought he was in L.A.

polysemy_4724492_15.mp4.en: A-all that I've ever tried to do is to get them to tell the truth.

polysemy_4724492_16.mp4.en: I just wanted to ask you ...

polysemy_4724482_0.mp4.ja: これで音を上げては現場では働けないぞ
polysemy_4724482_0.mp4.en: But if you think this is pressure, wait until you're out in the field.

polysemy_4724482_1.mp4.ja: じゃあ部屋の中で相手をするよ
polysemy_4724482_1.mp4.en: I can entertain you in the room, can't I?

polysemy_4724482_2.mp4.ja: あの朝FBIは情報をつかんでた私の訓練生仲間が犯人だと...
polysemy_4724482_2.mp4.en: The morning of the bombing, the FBI got a tip that the bomber was someone from my class at the Academy.

polysemy_3672840_1.mp4.ja: お前は私に偉大な支配者である道が運命づけられてると教えた
polysemy_3672840_1.mp4.en: You taught me the road to be a great lord is predestined

polysemy_3672840_2.mp4.ja: 助けてくれて感謝しますお名前は？
polysemy_3672840_2.mp4.en: Thank you for rescuing us May I ask your name?

polysemy_3672840_4.mp4.ja: 私が彼に与えなければないのはちっぽけな肩書だ
polysemy_3672840_4.mp4.en: And all I have to give him is an insignificant title

polysemy_3672840_6.mp4.en: Please raise the memorial flag that we made together

polysemy_3672840_7.mp4.en: Whoever dares to invade Wild Geese Gate, I'll kill him

polysemy_3672840_8.mp4.ja: 彼は本当に厳しい警護がいる刑務所だと言ってた
polysemy_3672840_8.mp4.en: He says that there is one prison which has really tight security

polysemy_3672840_9.mp4.ja: 心配するな助けに行く
polysemy_3672840_9.mp4.en: Don't worry I'll go help them

polysemy_3672840_10.mp4.ja: お前も捕まってどうやって他の人を助ける

polysemy_4211958_0.mp4.ja: やつらを除けないと群れが散るぞ

polysemy_4731504_18.mp4.en: You came back to save me, Joris ...

polysemy_2085239_8.mp4.en: Harren the Black thought this castle would be his legacy.

polysemy_2085239_21.mp4.en: A man is what others say he is and no more.

polysemy_1876277_2.mp4.ja: わからん俺はただのパイロットだ

polysemy_1876277_3.mp4.en: You sailed away with a gun and a Bible in your hand and took whatever you wanted!

polysemy_1876277_5.mp4.ja: そんな場合かいいから手を貸せ！
polysemy_1876277_5.mp4.en: Keep it for all i care, just help me here!

polysemy_1876277_6.mp4.en: But when the war broke out they gave me a new chance.

polysemy_1876277_11.mp4.ja: ♪はるか遠い雲の下で目覚める
polysemy_1876277_11.mp4.en: And wake up where the clouds are far Behind me.

polysemy_1876277_14.mp4.en: You gave your arm for your Fuhrer!

polysemy_1876277_16.mp4.en: You stay here and make some kind of sled for Josef and then we'll all go.

polysemy_1876277_18.mp4.en: This information goes straight to the Norwegian Army and from ther to your commanding officer.

polysemy_1876277_19.mp4.en: Lieutenant Horst Schopis tells the same story.

polysemy_2069318_0.mp4.ja: 某は一晩何も飲まずだ
polysemy_2069318_0.mp4.en: A man does not drink for a day and a night.

polysemy_2069318_1.mp4.ja: ビールをよこさないと皮を剥ぐぞ
polysemy_2069318_1.mp4.en: Give us beer before I skin you.

polysemy_2069318_2.mp4.ja: どうか許してもらいたい

polysemy_2069318_3.mp4.ja: こっちへ来いその棒をケツの穴に突っ込んでやる
polysemy_2069318_3.mp4.en: Come closer and I'll shove that stick up your bunghole and fuck you bloody.

polysemy_2069318_4.mp4.ja: 王都の金衛兵が何故ここに？
polysemy_2069318_4.mp4.en: What are Gold Cloaks doing so far from King's Landing?

polysemy_2069318_6.mp4.ja: この刃は今朝磨いたばかりだ
polysemy_2069318_6.mp4.en: Now I sharpened this blade before breakfast.

polysemy_2069318_7.mp4.ja: 彼を引き渡せば王から報酬がもらえる
polysemy_2069318_7.mp4.en: Anyone turning him over will earn the King's reward.

polysemy_2069318_8.mp4.ja: 頭にお怪我をされたそうですね
polysemy_2069318_8.mp4.en: I heard you suffered a terrible head wound.

polysemy_2069318_9.mp4.ja: 私達の甘い出会い話もしたわ
polysemy_2069318_9.mp4.en: And I tell him the story of how we meet.

polysemy_2069318_10.mp4.ja: ヴァリス様は私の魚包みを好まないわ
polysemy_2069318_10.mp4.en: I don't think Lord Varys likes fish pie.

polysemy_2069318_11.mp4.ja: いつか魚ヅツミを作ろう
polysemy_2069318_11.mp4.en: We'll make a fisherman of him yet.

polysemy_2069318_13.mp4.ja: 俺はこの駆け引きの行われ方を心得ている
polysemy_2069318_13.mp4.en: I understand the way this game is played.

polysemy_2069318_14.mp4.ja: 結果がお気に召されませんでしたか？
polysemy_2069318_14.mp4.en: You might be disappointed in the results.

polysemy_2069318_16.mp4.ja: 最近はそれほど野性的でもない

polysemy_2069318_19.mp4.ja: 母は激しい屁をこきベッドを揺らした
polysemy_2069318_19.mp4.en: She farted so hard, the whole bed shook.

polysemy_2069318_20.mp4.ja: あんなに沢山の嫁を持つなんてあまりに贅沢だな
polysemy_2069318_20.mp4.en: Seems a bit greedy for one man to have so many wives.

polysemy_2069318_22.mp4.ja: あの事を考えずにはいられないのです
polysemy_2069318_22.mp4.en: I can't stop thinking about it.

polysemy_2069318_23.mp4.ja: 子供に聞かせていい話だか疑問だ
polysemy_2069318_23.mp4.en: I don't imagine it will be a story fit for children.

polysemy_2069318_26.mp4.ja: 俺が今申し出ている仕事は難しい
polysemy_2069318_26.mp4.en: What I'm offering you is hard.

polysemy_2069318_27.mp4.en: I will fuck this blonde queen and I'll fuck her well.

polysemy_2069318_28.mp4.en: He gave you a future I could never have imagined.

polysemy_2069318_29.mp4.ja: 民はあなたから離れている

polysemy_2069318_30.mp4.ja: あなたの考えなんてどうでもいい
polysemy_2069318_30.mp4.en: I don't care what you think!

polysemy_2069318_31.mp4.ja: 真面目に人の話を聞かない

polysemy_2069318_34.mp4.ja: それが賢明な選択だからです

polysemy_2069318_35.mp4.ja: 光の主のお導きです若き戦士よ
polysemy_2069318_35.mp4.en: The Lord of Light shines through you, young warrior.

polysemy_2069318_36.mp4.ja: そのような軍勢は光の主にとっては玩具も同然
polysemy_2069318_36.mp4.en: These armies are toys for the Lord of Light.

polysemy_2270357_0.mp4.en: We received five numbers this morning.

polysemy_2270357_12.mp4.en: You're in bed with the devil.

polysemy_2270357_20.mp4.en: Not till you let me out of here.

polysemy_2270357_21.mp4.en: I was hoping we could avoid further bloodshed.

polysemy_2368860_1.mp4.en: They had a good run until they got caught taking a jewelry store in' 97.

polysemy_2368860_2.mp4.en: We've got some catching up to do.

polysemy_2368860_3.mp4.en: Finch, looks like Wyler's past has come back to haunt him.

polysemy_2368860_14.mp4.en: Nothing you need to worry about.

polysemy_2385581_1.mp4.en: He's talking about turning Tehran into a parking lot.

polysemy_2385581_4.mp4.en: So I'm burying it out of respect.

polysemy_2385581_15.mp4.en: She overheard her husband talking on a satellite phone.

polysemy_2385581_16.mp4.en: Oh, Finn's told me all about you.

polysemy_2385581_19.mp4.ja: 大変だったと思います

polysemy_2484360_1.mp4.en: I'm gonna keep the rest of your fee, you got it?

polysemy_2484360_2.mp4.en: How'd he get off with so little time?

polysemy_2484360_3.mp4.ja: 別の番号は上がっているのか？
polysemy_2484360_3.mp4.en: Well, do we have another number?

polysemy_2484360_4.mp4.en: But the job's not that interesting anyway.

polysemy_2484360_5.mp4.en: Looks like Mrs. Drake's hit man just found his target.

polysemy_2484360_6.mp4.en: Sometimes you need to break a few eggs to save lives.

polysemy_2484360_7.mp4.en: Maybe it's time to try a different tack.

polysemy_2484360_8.mp4.ja: たとえ助ける価値のない人でも助けるのが私たちの仕事なんです
polysemy_2484360_8.mp4.en: We help people, even when they don't necessarily deserve it.

polysemy_2484360_9.mp4.ja: 目的を実現させようとしているあなたを褒めるべきかもしれない
polysemy_2484360_9.mp4.en: I suppose I should commend you for being so goal-oriented.

polysemy_2484360_11.mp4.en: It was our first day off in weeks.

polysemy_2484360_12.mp4.ja: 終わるとでも思ってたのか、明日までに？

polysemy_2484360_14.mp4.ja: 実際に声に出して言わなかったでしょ？
polysemy_2484360_14.mp4.en: I never actually said it out loud, did I?

polysemy_2243841_5.mp4.en: You're at the corner of Pender and Beatty.

polysemy_2243841_7.mp4.en: It's a little confusing, even for me.

polysemy_2243841_9.mp4.en: I'm getting a lot of interference.

polysemy_2243841_10.mp4.en: Alec, did you sleep in the barn again last night?

polysemy_2243841_12.mp4.ja: 中に放り込んだでしょ
polysemy_2243841_12.mp4.en: You had someone on the inside.

polysemy_2243841_14.mp4.ja: 仲間をヤラレてるから

polysemy_2253598_1.mp4.ja: 食堂にどれくらい閉じ込められていた？
polysemy_2253598_1.mp4.en: How long have you been locked in that cafeteria?

polysemy_2253598_4.mp4.en: We're using that field for crops.

polysemy_2253598_5.mp4.ja: みんなが納得する解決策を探そう
polysemy_2253598_5.mp4.en: Maybe let's try to make this work out so everybody wins.

polysemy_2273955_48.mp4.ja: 未来の俺は悪者かもしれないが今はやり直そうとしてる
polysemy_2273955_48.mp4.en: I'm a guy with a bad future, ready for a fresh start.

polysemy_2273955_49.mp4.ja: 未来永劫生まれない様にしてあげるわ
polysemy_2273955_49.mp4.en: I'll make it my mission to guarantee you're never born in the future.

polysemy_2273955_50.mp4.ja: ケロッグの話じゃ十分合成したって
polysemy_2273955_50.mp4.en: Kellog told me they synthesized enough to last indefinitely.

polysemy_2273955_51.mp4.ja: 女性には秘密があるものよ

polysemy_1942612_0.mp4.ja: 弟の不作法をお許し願いたい
polysemy_1942612_0.mp4.en: May I just apologise for the state of my little brother?

polysemy_1942612_1.mp4.ja: 子供時代を殻に閉じこもって過ごす奴もいる
polysemy_1942612_1.mp4.en: And there is a whole childhood in a nutshell.

polysemy_1942612_2.mp4.en: Then you should be paying more attention.

polysemy_1942612_3.mp4.ja: 仕事によって名前をかえるお気に入りは”ドミネトリックス”
polysemy_1942612_3.mp4.en: There are many names for what she does, she prefers" dominatrix".

polysemy_1942612_4.mp4.ja: 危ない写真も握っているんだな
polysemy_1942612_4.mp4.en: And I assume this Adler woman has some compromising photographs?

polysemy_1942612_5.mp4.ja: 今日はこの辺にしておこう
polysemy_1942612_5.mp4.en: We'd prefer not to say any more at this time.

polysemy_1942612_6.mp4.en: I can tell you it's a young person.

polysemy_1942612_7.mp4.ja: あくまでも想像の範囲でな
polysemy_1942612_7.mp4.en: An imaginative range, we are assured.

polysemy_1942612_8.mp4.ja: 彼女にケチらず金を払えば済むこと
polysemy_1942612_8.mp4.en: Pay her, now and in full.

polysemy_1942612_9.mp4.ja: ジョン、ドアを固めて誰も入れさせるな
polysemy_1942612_9.mp4.en: John, man the door, let no one in.

polysemy_1942612_10.mp4.ja: 最初に押すキーに一番油が付くんだ
polysemy_1942612_10.mp4.en: Heaviest oil deposit is always on the first key used.

polysemy_1942612_11.mp4.en: I see from the make that it's a six-digit code.

polysemy_2351112_1.mp4.ja: カイエン昆布茶が少しは残ってる？

polysemy_2250999_1.mp4.ja: どうしてなったのか調べたほうがいいわね
polysemy_2250999_1.mp4.en: It'd be good to know how that happened.

polysemy_2250999_3.mp4.ja: 大学を出てすぐここに勤め始めたんです
polysemy_2250999_3.mp4.en: He started working here right after college.

polysemy_2250999_4.mp4.ja: 「あんたがやったことを見て私は愛想を尽かした」
polysemy_2250999_4.mp4.en: I saw what you did and I'm disgusted.

polysemy_2250999_5.mp4.ja: 鑑識の検査結果が出ました
polysemy_2250999_5.mp4.en: None of the school's bats show traces of blood.

polysemy_2250999_7.mp4.ja: 優等生名簿に名前がのっている人は手をおろして
polysemy_2250999_7.mp4.en: Put your hand down if you're on the Dean's List.

polysemy_2250999_8.mp4.ja: 受ける予定の人も手をおろして
polysemy_2250999_8.mp4.en: Now put your hand down if you're taking the SATs or planning to take the SATs.

polysemy_2250999_9.mp4.ja: 私が売春してるって言ったら先生ショックを受けてた
polysemy_2250999_9.mp4.en: He freaked when I told him I was turning tricks.

polysemy_2250999_10.mp4.ja: 殺人が起きた夜の映像は調べたが
polysemy_2250999_10.mp4.en: I looked through the footage the night of the murder.

polysemy_2250999_11.mp4.ja: 先生は僕を助けようとしてくれたんだ
polysemy_2250999_11.mp4.en: And he was trying to help me.

polysemy_2169795_0.mp4.ja: 「君の目が真実への入口なんだ」
polysemy_2169795_0.mp4.en: " Your eyes are the gateway to truth"--

polysemy_2169795_1.mp4.ja: 内部グループのことを攻撃してたんだ
polysemy_2169795_1.mp4.en: He was hitting the inner circle hard.

polysemy_2169795_3.mp4.ja: 家主のかわりに私が銀行からお金を借りるの？
polysemy_2169795_3.mp4.en: So I can deal with a bank instead of a landlord?

polysemy_2169795_4.mp4.ja: もう少しで見逃すところでした

polysemy_2169795_6.mp4.ja: 殺人のあった日の出来事を時系列に並べて
polysemy_2169795_6.mp4.en: Put together a timeline of the day of the murder.

polysemy_2169795_7.mp4.ja: 完璧な証拠を揃えるまではだめよ
polysemy_2169795_7.mp4.en: Not until we have an airtight case.

polysemy_2169795_9.mp4.ja: メドウズが書いた記事のファイルはあります
polysemy_2169795_9.mp4.en: I have a file of his stories.

polysemy_2169795_10.mp4.ja: それは君がちょっとばかり経験したことじゃないか
polysemy_2169795_10.mp4.en: That's something you'd know a little bit about.

polysemy_2169795_11.mp4.ja: 学生たちはこのニュースをどう受け取っていますか？
polysemy_2169795_11.mp4.en: How are the students taking the news?

polysemy_2169795_12.mp4.ja: あなたが彼女にお話になるでしょう？

polysemy_2169795_13.mp4.ja: あなた達の間がうまくいってなかったことはわかってる
polysemy_2169795_13.mp4.en: I know you and your brother didn't get along.

polysemy_2169795_14.mp4.ja: 他の幹部にも伝えますが
polysemy_2169795_14.mp4.en: I'll pass it to the other members of the circle.

polysemy_2169795_15.mp4.ja: 私がそれを和らげてあげよう
polysemy_2169795_15.mp4.en: I can help you with that.

polysemy_2169795_16.mp4.ja: 体の中から赤い煙を出してしまうんだ
polysemy_2169795_16.mp4.en: Let the red smoke come out of your body.

polysemy_2169795_17.mp4.ja: 何かメッセージがあると私たちは聞いたんだが
polysemy_2169795_17.mp4.en: We were told you had a message.

polysemy_2169795_18.mp4.ja: 彼はあなたに近づこうとしている
polysemy_2169795_18.mp4.en: He's trying to get to you.

polysemy_2169795_19.mp4.ja: ティモシー・ファラガットについて聞きたいんです
polysemy_2169795_19.mp4.en: I wanted to ask you about Timothy Farragut.

polysemy_2169795_20.mp4.ja: もう少し情報が欲しい
polysemy_2169795_20.mp4.en: I need a little more information.

polysemy_2169795_21.mp4.ja: その画像を引き伸ばしたら思いがけないものを発見したわ
polysemy_2169795_21.mp4.en: We blew up an image and hit pay dirt.

polysemy_2169795_22.mp4.ja: あの血はどこから手に入れたの？

polysemy_2169795_23.mp4.ja: 私が脇に押しのけられるほど弱いと君は本当に思ってるのか？
polysemy_2169795_23.mp4.en: Do you really think that I am weak enough to be pushed aside?

polysemy_2169795_24.mp4.ja: 少しここで見ていてもいいでしょうか？
polysemy_2169795_24.mp4.en: Would it be okay if I stayed to watch a few?

polysemy_2169795_25.mp4.ja: 君と一緒にする仕事はいつも楽しいねえ
polysemy_2169795_25.mp4.en: Always a pleasure doing business with you.

polysemy_2352340_5.mp4.ja: あの男の事を聞き出させる
polysemy_2352340_5.mp4.en: Have him try to get something out of her about the guy's identity.

polysemy_2352340_6.mp4.en: I think he's all we've got.

polysemy_2352340_7.mp4.ja: 見付けたのはここです

polysemy_2352340_8.mp4.ja: 人が集まる場所じゃ無い

polysemy_2352340_9.mp4.ja: 報告書を拝見できますか
polysemy_2352340_9.mp4.en: Sir, can we see your report?

polysemy_2352340_10.mp4.en: I wonder what elected official they were covering up for.

polysemy_2352340_11.mp4.ja: 調べる方法がある筈だ
polysemy_2352340_11.mp4.en: There must be some way you can find out what happened.

polysemy_2352340_13.mp4.ja: 証拠保全チームを支援して
polysemy_2352340_13.mp4.en: Make sure the evidence response team has whatever support they need.

polysemy_2352340_16.mp4.en: Yeah, I don't think she was talking about receipts.

polysemy_2352340_17.mp4.ja: でもCIAの仕事をしてると
polysemy_2352340_17.mp4.en: But he's working for the CIA.

polysemy_2352340_19.mp4.ja: そんな簡単な話では無い
polysemy_2352340_19.mp4.en: Okay, it's, it's not that simple.

polysemy_2312764_0.mp4.ja: 君は目覚まし時計を２つ持ってる

polysemy_2312764_1.mp4.ja: 僕の仕事は嫌ってないけどね
polysemy_2312764_1.mp4.en: You don't hate what I do, though.

polysemy_2312764_2.mp4.ja: 僕らがポークさんに話を聞いた時それはよくわかった
polysemy_2312764_2.mp4.en: That much was obvious when we talked to Mr. Polk.

polysemy_2312764_3.mp4.ja: 君がまだ外科医だった頃手術室に向かう時
polysemy_2312764_3.mp4.en: I imagine it was the same look you wore to the O.R.

polysemy_2312764_5.mp4.ja: あなたの唾液を取ります
polysemy_2312764_5.mp4.en: I'm gonna need your saliva now.

polysemy_2312764_6.mp4.ja: 今朝仕事を始めたくて待ちきれなかった
polysemy_2312764_6.mp4.en: Couldn't wait to get started this morning.

polysemy_2312764_7.mp4.ja: 綿棒で取りますから口を開けて
polysemy_2312764_7.mp4.en: Open you mouth so I can swab it.

polysemy_2312764_8.mp4.ja: 麻薬を摂取してるとカップの一片が青く変わります
polysemy_2312764_8.mp4.en: If you're on anything, the strip on the cup will turn blue.

polysemy_2312764_9.mp4.ja: 犯人には好みのタイプがあると？
polysemy_2312764_9.mp4.en: You think the killer has a type?

polysemy_2312764_11.mp4.en: Just read a book, would you?

polysemy_2312764_12.mp4.ja: 彼女を襲った男の名前はピーター・サルドュア
polysemy_2312764_12.mp4.en: The name of the man who attacked her is Peter Saldua.

polysemy_2312764_13.mp4.ja: 彼は彼女の兄の親友だったんです
polysemy_2312764_13.mp4.en: He was her brother's best friend growing up.

polysemy_2312764_14.mp4.ja: あなたってすっごい嘘つきね
polysemy_2312764_14.mp4.en: You are so full of it.

polysemy_2312764_15.mp4.ja: 警察の管理下にあるってことか？
polysemy_2312764_15.mp4.en: Are you saying he's in police custody?

polysemy_2312764_16.mp4.ja: 郵便配達員が窓越しに死体を見つけて
polysemy_2312764_16.mp4.en: Mailman saw the body through the window.

polysemy_2312764_18.mp4.ja: あの夜彼女が彼を家に入れた理由も説明がつく
polysemy_2312764_18.mp4.en: Explains why she would have let him the other night.

polysemy_2312764_19.mp4.ja: じゃなぜこの仕事をするのかしら？
polysemy_2312764_19.mp4.en: Then why do you do it?

polysemy_2312764_21.mp4.ja: その写真はどこで手に入れたんですか？

polysemy_2312764_22.mp4.ja: その精神科医は2010年に冠状動脈血栓で倒れて死んでいる
polysemy_2312764_22.mp4.en: No,' cause he dropped dead of a coronary, 2010.

polysemy_2312764_23.mp4.ja: それともここ数日僕に注意を払ってなかったのか？
polysemy_2312764_23.mp4.en: Or haven't you been paying attention the last few days?

polysemy_2312764_25.mp4.ja: 外科医は中毒回復支援者になるためにやめる仕事じゃない
polysemy_2312764_25.mp4.en: Surgeons don't just leave to become addict-sitters.

polysemy_2312764_26.mp4.ja: その患者が死んだとどうしてわかるんです？
polysemy_2312764_26.mp4.en: How do you know the patient died?

polysemy_2312764_27.mp4.ja: 君が墓を訪れてたのは明白だ
polysemy_2312764_27.mp4.en: Obviously you were visiting a grave.

polysemy_2312764_28.mp4.ja: グーグル検索の結果じゃご両親は２人とも健在だ
polysemy_2312764_28.mp4.en: Google indicates that they're both alive and well.

polysemy_2312764_29.mp4.ja: それが何を意味すると思う？
polysemy_2312764_29.mp4.en: And what's that supposed to mean?

polysemy_2312764_30.mp4.ja: その精神科医が亡くなって２年になる
polysemy_2312764_30.mp4.en: The guy's been dead almost two years.

polysemy_2312764_32.mp4.ja: 俺に見せてくれたことだっておまえ運がいいんだぞ
polysemy_2312764_32.mp4.en: You're lucky she even let me take a look.

polysemy_2312764_33.mp4.ja: 彼が失くしたと俺は考え始めてる
polysemy_2312764_33.mp4.en: I'm starting to think he lost it.

polysemy_2312764_34.mp4.ja: おいちょっと小便に行く
polysemy_2312764_34.mp4.en: Listen, I got to take a leak.

polysemy_2301469_1.mp4.ja: ここは買い手市場なんだ
polysemy_2301469_1.mp4.en: This here is a buyer's market.

polysemy_2301469_2.mp4.ja: 俺は別の檻を揺さぶって来るよ
polysemy_2301469_2.mp4.en: I'm gonna go rattle some cages.

polysemy_2301469_3.mp4.ja: 書き出してはいないの

polysemy_2301469_4.mp4.ja: あなたが保証したのは、マイクからの安全よ
polysemy_2301469_4.mp4.en: You guaranteed I'd be safe from Mike.

polysemy_2301469_5.mp4.ja: 私なら、指数的にあなたの仕事を拡大できる
polysemy_2301469_5.mp4.en: I can grow your business exponentially.

polysemy_2301469_8.mp4.ja: 彼らはプロでとても従順よ

polysemy_2301469_9.mp4.ja: 仕事相手にはとても慎重なの
polysemy_2301469_9.mp4.en: I'm very careful who I work with.

polysemy_2301469_11.mp4.ja: 暴動に乗じてやるんだ
polysemy_2301469_11.mp4.en: Our boys get it done in a riot.

polysemy_2301469_13.mp4.ja: 離れた三箇所のムショで、二分以内に全員殺せだと？
polysemy_2301469_13.mp4.en: But hitting them in three separate jails all within two minutes?

polysemy_2301469_14.mp4.ja: ビンラディンを叩くのだってこんなに難しくなかったぜ
polysemy_2301469_14.mp4.en: Whacking Bin Laden wasn't this complicated.

polysemy_2301469_15.mp4.ja: できるさ、あんたの望む方法じゃないが
polysemy_2301469_15.mp4.en: It can be done, just not the way you want it.

polysemy_2301469_16.mp4.ja: 俺の望み通りの方法で出来るはずだ
polysemy_2301469_16.mp4.en: It can be done exactly how I want it.

polysemy_2301469_17.mp4.ja: 聞きたいのは、お前はそれが出来る男なのか、だ
polysemy_2301469_17.mp4.en: The only question is, are you the man to do it?

polysemy_2301469_18.mp4.ja: あなたが好きなチキンにしようかと思ってたの
polysemy_2301469_18.mp4.en: And I thought we could have that chicken that you like.

polysemy_2301469_19.mp4.ja: 最近、ますますその仕事の事を考えるようになった
polysemy_2301469_19.mp4.en: Been thinking about that job more and more lately.

polysemy_2301469_20.mp4.ja: 木に印をつけるのは、怪物を追うよりずっとマシだ
polysemy_2301469_20.mp4.en: Tagging trees is a lot better than chasing monsters.

polysemy_2301469_22.mp4.ja: 手段としては凄く役に立つわ
polysemy_2301469_22.mp4.en: It can be so helpful, such a good tool.

polysemy_2301469_23.mp4.ja: 子供たちを戻したいの

polysemy_2301469_24.mp4.ja: どの位積み上げれば良いの？
polysemy_2301469_24.mp4.en: How big does this pile have to be?

polysemy_2301469_25.mp4.ja: お邪魔じゃ無かったらいいんだが、
polysemy_2301469_25.mp4.en: I hope I'm not disturbing you or anything.

polysemy_2301469_28.mp4.ja: ソウルからあんたがした事を聞いたよ
polysemy_2301469_28.mp4.en: Saul told me what you did.

polysemy_2301469_29.mp4.ja: 他に手が無かったんだ、ジェシー
polysemy_2301469_29.mp4.en: There was no other option, Jesse.

polysemy_2301469_30.mp4.ja: ある日バウンダーを見かけた
polysemy_2301469_30.mp4.en: I saw a Bounder the other day.

polysemy_2301469_32.mp4.ja: ドアに弾痕も無かった
polysemy_2301469_32.mp4.en: No bullet holes in the door.

polysemy_2301469_33.mp4.ja: 料理の後、ガソリンが切れたときの事は覚えているか？
polysemy_2301469_33.mp4.en: Remember that time we ran out of gas coming back from a cook?

polysemy_2301469_35.mp4.ja: 大き目のイヤリングで本当に素敵になるわ
polysemy_2301469_35.mp4.en: With some big earrings, it could be really nice.

polysemy_2301469_37.mp4.ja: まとめて醸造する必要がありそうだ
polysemy_2301469_37.mp4.en: Maybe I should brew up a batch.

polysemy_2385583_2.mp4.ja: アブナジールは逃げたばかり

polysemy_2385583_3.mp4.en: We can't leave here without getting what's in there.

polysemy_2385583_8.mp4.ja: そいつから抱き着いて来たのか
polysemy_2385583_8.mp4.en: And just jumped out at you?

polysemy_2385583_10.mp4.ja: パパのカップはクリスの手作り
polysemy_2385583_10.mp4.en: Is that the cup that Chris made for Dad?

polysemy_2385583_12.mp4.ja: ゲティスバーグの仲間が危ない
polysemy_2385583_12.mp4.en: They're very close to finding out about our friend in Gettysburg.

polysemy_2385583_13.mp4.ja: 彼はアナタの秘密を握ってるのよ
polysemy_2385583_13.mp4.en: Must I remind you, he's the one man who knows the truth about you?

polysemy_2385583_17.mp4.en: What time is the debrief with the group?

polysemy_2385583_19.mp4.en: Don't make me say it twice.

polysemy_2385583_20.mp4.ja: 彼氏からメールが来ないの?

polysemy_2385583_22.mp4.en: You think if they caught me that I would talk?

polysemy_2385583_24.mp4.ja: 君をここには入れられない
polysemy_2385583_24.mp4.en: Carrie, you can't be in here.

polysemy_2385583_26.mp4.ja: 任務報告会を外されたと聞いて
polysemy_2385583_26.mp4.en: I hear you were turned away from the debrief at Langley today.

polysemy_2380789_0.mp4.en: I'm encouraging him to show ambition, to climb the HR ladder.

polysemy_2380789_2.mp4.ja: ゴールは何だと思います？
polysemy_2380789_2.mp4.en: Tell me, what do you see as the goal?

polysemy_2380789_5.mp4.ja: 彼女は秘密の火薬庫に座ってるみたいだ
polysemy_2380789_5.mp4.en: Looks like our shrink is sitting on a powder keg of secrets.

polysemy_2380789_6.mp4.ja: 〈店がなく車が少なくてカメラなし〉
polysemy_2380789_6.mp4.en: No storefronts, low foot traffic, no cameras.

polysemy_2380789_11.mp4.ja: 〈友人を助けに行くから君も来るといい〉
polysemy_2380789_11.mp4.en: I suggest you do the same thing.

polysemy_2380789_12.mp4.ja: ジョンは間違いなく君の助けが必要だ
polysemy_2380789_12.mp4.en: John will almost certainly need your help.

polysemy_2380789_14.mp4.ja: たまには一緒に飲むべきだな
polysemy_2380789_14.mp4.en: Well, we should all grab a drink together sometime.

polysemy_2380789_15.mp4.ja: 私をおびき出す為に君が汚職警官に金を払ったんだ
polysemy_2380789_15.mp4.en: You were willing to pay corrupt police officers to target an innocent woman just to draw me out.

polysemy_2380789_16.mp4.en: She was the one who paid HR.

polysemy_2380789_17.mp4.ja: たくさんお話しましょ
polysemy_2380789_17.mp4.en: We've got so much to talk about.

polysemy_2380789_18.mp4.ja: 彼は君の下で働き危険に晒されている
polysemy_2380789_18.mp4.en: He's in danger now because he was working for you.

polysemy_2103217_0.mp4.en: I need to find the restroom.

polysemy_2103217_1.mp4.ja: それから電気もつけたままやるのが好きなの
polysemy_2103217_1.mp4.en: I like to keep the lights on too.

polysemy_2273953_41.mp4.ja: 連中は戦略を変えたのかも

polysemy_2273953_42.mp4.en: I wanted to let you sleep.

polysemy_2169797_1.mp4.ja: 一口の水が高くついたな
polysemy_2169797_1.mp4.en: That drink of water's gonna be pretty expensive.

polysemy_2169797_2.mp4.ja: あなたがレッド・ジョンの仲間だとFBIは考えてるの？
polysemy_2169797_2.mp4.en: The FBI thinks you're working with Red John?

polysemy_2169797_3.mp4.ja: 僕はレッド・ジョンのために動いていません彼女は時間を浪費しています
polysemy_2169797_3.mp4.en: I don't work for Red John, so she's wasting her time.

polysemy_2289155_1.mp4.ja: 〈リース君新しい番号が来た〉
polysemy_2289155_1.mp4.en: Mr. Reese, a new number has come in.

polysemy_2289155_2.mp4.ja: このソフトはどんな通信経路も利用するの
polysemy_2289155_2.mp4.en: This software will exploit any open communication channel.

polysemy_2289155_3.mp4.ja: 彼を止める予定だった
polysemy_2289155_3.mp4.en: I was supposed to stop him.

polysemy_2289155_4.mp4.ja: 誰かと組んでるはずよ
polysemy_2289155_4.mp4.en: He's got to be working with somebody.

polysemy_2289155_5.mp4.ja: でも私はそれが落ちたんだと思う
polysemy_2289155_5.mp4.en: But I guess it just fell off the truck.

polysemy_2289155_6.mp4.ja: 彼の強盗仲間が死んでる
polysemy_2289155_6.mp4.en: It looks like the robbers that were with him are dead.

polysemy_2289155_7.mp4.ja: 彼の保護は考えてない
polysemy_2289155_7.mp4.en: I wasn't thinking of protecting him.

polysemy_2289155_8.mp4.ja: 彼が言ったのここを離れて一緒にカボへ行こうって
polysemy_2289155_8.mp4.en: He said he was going to take me away from all this, and we were gonna go to Cabo together.

polysemy_2289155_9.mp4.ja: リースの事をFBIに話してるだろ
polysemy_2289155_9.mp4.en: We know that you're talking to the FBI about Reese.

polysemy_2289155_10.mp4.en: Is there a law against that?

polysemy_2289155_12.mp4.ja: ジョンの網は狭くなってる
polysemy_2289155_12.mp4.en: We're closing the net on John.

polysemy_2289155_13.mp4.ja: リース君残念ながら君一人です
polysemy_2289155_13.mp4.en: Mr. Reese, I'm afraid you're on your own now.

polysemy_2289155_14.mp4.en: You won't get away with this.

polysemy_2289155_16.mp4.ja: 取られた物を取り返す

polysemy_2289155_18.mp4.ja: リング下の箱にグローブと一緒に入ってる

polysemy_2289155_19.mp4.ja: 君の番だと説得されたんだろ？
polysemy_2289155_19.mp4.en: She convinced you it was time to make your move, didn't she?

polysemy_2289155_20.mp4.ja: 君の人生はもっと価値があるって
polysemy_2289155_20.mp4.en: She said you deserve more from life.

polysemy_2289155_21.mp4.ja: 君はタチの悪い奴らと取引してる
polysemy_2289155_21.mp4.en: You're dealing with some very bad people.

polysemy_2289155_22.mp4.ja: 君が持ってる物を奴らは得ようとする
polysemy_2289155_22.mp4.en: Right now, you have what they want, and they won't stop until they get it.

polysemy_2289155_24.mp4.ja: 俺も同じ命令を受けた
polysemy_2289155_24.mp4.en: I got the same orders as you.

polysemy_2289155_25.mp4.ja: そして君は信号を送った
polysemy_2289155_25.mp4.en: And you just gave them a beacon.

polysemy_2289155_26.mp4.ja: 本当に”何か”を達成したのかな？
polysemy_2289155_26.mp4.en: Did we actually accomplish anything here?

polysemy_2289155_27.mp4.ja: トミーが殺人罪から逃げるのを阻止した
polysemy_2289155_27.mp4.en: We stopped Tommy from getting away with murder.

polysemy_2289155_28.mp4.ja: 常により悪い奴がいる

polysemy_2289155_29.mp4.ja: 〈ようリースの手掛りを得た〉
polysemy_2289155_29.mp4.en: Hey, we got a lead on Reese.

polysemy_1555093_0.mp4.en: Just take your payment and leave.

polysemy_1555093_2.mp4.ja: 許されるとでも思ったのか？
polysemy_1555093_2.mp4.en: Have any ideal of what you've done?

polysemy_1637725_0.mp4.ja: 僕等に雷は落ちないよ分かる？
polysemy_1637725_0.mp4.en: The thunder can't get us, right?

polysemy_1637725_1.mp4.ja: 君の仕事はミスしない事だ
polysemy_1637725_1.mp4.en: All you've got to do is not fuck up.

polysemy_1637725_2.mp4.ja: 女が眠りっ屁をしたんで頭にきて消えた
polysemy_1637725_2.mp4.en: I'm like," I'm out of here, man." I was gone before she woke up.

polysemy_1637725_3.mp4.ja: ローリは君に屁なんかしないだろ
polysemy_1637725_3.mp4.en: Lori ever fart in front of you?

polysemy_1637725_4.mp4.ja: 一緒になったら僕等のベビーは凄いぞ
polysemy_1637725_4.mp4.en: If we were together, our babies would be spectacular.

polysemy_1637725_5.mp4.ja: 残りをお包みしますか？
polysemy_1637725_5.mp4.en: Would you like me to wrap your leftovers?

polysemy_1637725_6.mp4.ja: でも何かスゴイ物を得るまで待って欲しい
polysemy_1637725_6.mp4.en: But I want to wait until I get you something really special.

polysemy_1637725_7.mp4.en: There is a shit on my floor!

polysemy_1637725_9.mp4.ja: 仕事を決めたら後でお祝いだ
polysemy_1637725_9.mp4.en: You get the job, we're celebrating after, okay?

polysemy_1637725_10.mp4.en: Well, he only had three other batches.

polysemy_1637725_11.mp4.ja: あんたは相当問題アリだな？
polysemy_1637725_11.mp4.en: You got a lot of problems, don't you?

polysemy_1637725_12.mp4.en: I think you're being a little more fair to him.

polysemy_1637725_13.mp4.en: Just give me the car keys.

polysemy_1637725_14.mp4.ja: ♂ナシにしちゃ悪くなかったわ
polysemy_1637725_14.mp4.en: Actually, you weren't so bad for a guy with no penis.

polysemy_1637725_15.mp4.ja: 僕達ちょっと話し合えないだろうか？
polysemy_1637725_15.mp4.en: I guess we can't make small talk all day, huh?

polysemy_1853728_0.mp4.en: Badder they are, bigger the reward.

polysemy_1853728_2.mp4.ja: 知られてる仲間は”野郎”の通り
polysemy_1853728_2.mp4.en: Known members of the Smitty Bacall Gang are as follas:"

polysemy_1853728_5.mp4.ja: コーヒーを入れてきて
polysemy_1853728_5.mp4.en: Would you prepare us some coffee?

polysemy_938330_0.mp4.ja: 私を消すことは出来ない

polysemy_938330_1.mp4.ja: 家らしくすれば安心するよ

polysemy_938330_2.mp4.ja: おいちょっと待ってくれ

polysemy_938330_3.mp4.en: I want to see what happened here tonight.

polysemy_2301461_0.mp4.ja: 新品に換えることも可能です。
polysemy_2301461_0.mp4.en: You want me to swap in factory parts, that's fine.

polysemy_2301461_1.mp4.ja: ここにサインしたら終わりですよ。
polysemy_2301461_1.mp4.en: Sign here, you're good to go.

polysemy_2301461_2.mp4.en: No one's talking to the police.

polysemy_2301461_3.mp4.ja: 家を出るのは大学からでいい
polysemy_2301461_3.mp4.en: He's a year away from college.

polysemy_2301461_5.mp4.ja: どれだけキツく締め上げても漏らしません。
polysemy_2301461_5.mp4.en: I mean, not a peep, no matter how hard we squeeze.

polysemy_2301461_6.mp4.ja: 誰かがまだ裏で糸を引いてる。
polysemy_2301461_6.mp4.en: Makes it likely there's somebody keeping them in line.

polysemy_2301461_7.mp4.ja: 彼がフリングの頭で、”企業”のセキュリティです。
polysemy_2301461_7.mp4.en: He's Fring's head of" corporate security."

polysemy_2273949_2.mp4.ja: CMRにアクセスして回路をショートさせた
polysemy_2273949_2.mp4.en: Accessing her CMR code must've shortened her circuitry.

polysemy_2273949_3.mp4.ja: この分野の人は大概一緒に仕事をしてるもの
polysemy_2273949_3.mp4.en: I know or have worked with most of the players in this field.

polysemy_2273949_4.mp4.ja: グレッグの死で終わりよ
polysemy_2273949_4.mp4.en: Greg's death will put an end to that.

polysemy_2273949_5.mp4.ja: 調べが終われば元通りだ
polysemy_2273949_5.mp4.en: Okay, I'll check your story and get back to you.

polysemy_2273949_6.mp4.ja: 暗礁に乗り上げたもっと調べないと
polysemy_2273949_6.mp4.en: It's a dead end, it looks like we need to dig a little deeper.

polysemy_2273949_7.mp4.ja: 別なコードを埋め込んでた
polysemy_2273949_7.mp4.en: Someone is hiding code within the code.

polysemy_2273949_9.mp4.ja: 誰がコードを書いたか教えて
polysemy_2273949_9.mp4.en: Let me guess who wrote the code.

polysemy_2273949_12.mp4.ja: 特集記事を考えてるんです
polysemy_2273949_12.mp4.en: We're thinking about doing a feature article on you.

polysemy_2273949_13.mp4.ja: 止める方法は知らないんだ
polysemy_2273949_13.mp4.en: I have no idea how to stop her.

polysemy_2273949_14.mp4.en: Someone else is connecting to her and rewriting the code.

polysemy_2273949_15.mp4.ja: この時代じゃ不可能だ
polysemy_2273949_15.mp4.en: Which is impossible, especially in this time.

polysemy_2273949_16.mp4.ja: ネッティンジャーがビジュアルコードの事を告白したよ
polysemy_2273949_16.mp4.en: So Nettinger confessed to writing a code that creates a visual wave pattern.

polysemy_2273949_17.mp4.ja: 古いファイルで消した積もりかもしれないが残ってたんだ
polysemy_2273949_17.mp4.en: It was full of old memory traces, stuff that you thought you've deleted but is still there.

polysemy_2239935_0.mp4.ja: 政府はそれを何年も図にしようと試みてて
polysemy_2239935_0.mp4.en: The government had been trying to figure it out for years.

polysemy_2239935_1.mp4.ja: どこまで落ちるか理解できなかった
polysemy_2239935_1.mp4.en: I never realized how far down I could go.

polysemy_2239935_2.mp4.ja: これで全てを溶かして設備を破壊し
polysemy_2239935_2.mp4.en: It'll melt all this into mush, destroy this equipment.

polysemy_2239935_3.mp4.ja: 終わらせる時だと思わないか？
polysemy_2239935_3.mp4.en: Time to finish this, don't you think?

polysemy_903624_0.mp4.ja: これを門に打っておけ
polysemy_903624_0.mp4.en: Be a good lad and put that on the gate.

polysemy_903624_1.mp4.ja: 花火の技を見せるチャンスを逃すもんか
polysemy_903624_1.mp4.en: He wouldn't miss a chance to let off his Whizpoppers.

polysemy_903624_2.mp4.ja: 凄いショーを見せてくれるさ
polysemy_903624_2.mp4.en: He'll give us quite a show, you'll see.

polysemy_903624_3.mp4.ja: あるいは今日はご機嫌な日になりそうだと言うことか？
polysemy_903624_3.mp4.en: Or are you simply stating that this is a morning to be good on?

polysemy_903624_4.mp4.ja: 変わったなそれも悪い方にビルボ･バギンズ
polysemy_903624_4.mp4.en: You've changed, and not entirely for the better, Bilbo Baggins.

polysemy_903624_5.mp4.ja: トゥック爺さんが夏至祭りに招いていた？
polysemy_903624_5.mp4.en: Old Took used to have them on Midsummer's Eve.

polysemy_903624_6.mp4.ja: 頭はお前より冴えとる
polysemy_903624_6.mp4.en: Sharp enough for both of us.

polysemy_903624_7.mp4.ja: それはタオル布巾じゃない
polysemy_903624_7.mp4.en: Excuse me, that is a doily, not a dishcloth.

polysemy_903624_8.mp4.ja: エレボールを取り戻す旅なら我らだけでいいと
polysemy_903624_8.mp4.en: They say this quest is ours and ours alone.

polysemy_903624_9.mp4.ja: 数は少なくとも我らは戦士
polysemy_903624_9.mp4.en: We may be few in number...but we're fighters, all of us, to the last Dwarf.

polysemy_903624_11.mp4.ja: ここに広間に通じる抜け道の事が書いてある
polysemy_903624_11.mp4.en: These runes speak of a hidden passage to the Lower Halls.

polysemy_903624_12.mp4.ja: 入り口を見付けるのは困難じゃ
polysemy_903624_12.mp4.en: Well, if we can find it, but Dwarf doors are invisible when closed.

polysemy_903624_13.mp4.ja: 答えはこの地図に隠されておるがわしには読み取る力が無い
polysemy_903624_13.mp4.en: The answer lies hidden somewhere in this map...and I do not have the skill to find it.

polysemy_903624_14.mp4.ja: お主には14人目を見付けてくれと頼まれた
polysemy_903624_14.mp4.en: You asked me to find the 14th member of this company and I have chosen Mr. Baggins.

polysemy_903624_15.mp4.ja: 決まりだごく普通の契約だ

polysemy_903624_16.mp4.ja: 彼の運命がどうなろうとも
polysemy_903624_16.mp4.en: Nor will I be responsible for his fate.

polysemy_903624_17.mp4.en: Flash of light, searing pain, then poof.

polysemy_903624_18.mp4.ja: わしの知っていた若いホビットは森を駆けていた
polysemy_903624_18.mp4.en: I remember a young Hobbit who was always running off in search of Elves in the woods.

polysemy_903624_19.mp4.ja: その若いホビットの心は村境の向こうにある物で好奇心いっぱいだった
polysemy_903624_19.mp4.en: A young Hobbit who would have liked nothing better...than to find out what was beyond the borders of the Shire.

polysemy_903624_20.mp4.ja: お前の遠い遠い祖先は並外れた大男で
polysemy_903624_20.mp4.en: Did you know that your great-great-great-great-uncle Bullroarer Took...was so large, he could ride a real horse?

polysemy_903624_21.mp4.ja: 緑野の合戦で彼はゴブリン軍と戦い振るった棍棒で敵を倒し
polysemy_903624_21.mp4.en: In the Battle of Green Fields, he charged the Goblin ranks.

polysemy_903624_22.mp4.ja: よい話には脚色が伴うものだ
polysemy_903624_22.mp4.en: Well, all good stories deserve embellishment.

polysemy_903624_23.mp4.ja: お前も人に語れる話を持って戻ってくるだろう
polysemy_903624_23.mp4.en: You'll have a tale or two to tell of your own when you come back.

polysemy_903624_25.mp4.ja: 私の眼にはくろがね連山の戦士より頼もしく見える
polysemy_903624_25.mp4.en: I would take each and every one of these Dwarves...over an army from the Iron Hills.

polysemy_903624_26.mp4.ja: 助けを求めた時に来てくれた
polysemy_903624_26.mp4.en: For when I called upon them, they answered.

polysemy_903624_27.mp4.en: It's not as if it's witchcraft.

polysemy_903624_28.mp4.ja: 人間が鍛えた物とも違うな
polysemy_903624_28.mp4.en: Nor were they made by any smith among Men.

polysemy_903624_29.mp4.ja: これはゴンドールが鍛えた物だそれも太古にじゃ
polysemy_903624_29.mp4.en: These were forged in Gondolin...by the High Elves of the First Age.

polysemy_903624_31.mp4.ja: ドラゴンは気掛かりのタネを得ましたね
polysemy_903624_31.mp4.en: The dragon has long been on your mind.

polysemy_1531901_3.mp4.ja: しみったれでチップがもらえないんだ
polysemy_1531901_3.mp4.en: It's the valley of the stiffs in here.

polysemy_1531901_4.mp4.ja: 君に職業をあげたじゃないか

polysemy_1531901_5.mp4.ja: ほらプロなんだからいいわね？

polysemy_1531901_6.mp4.ja: 金のためだということはねでも...
polysemy_1531901_6.mp4.en: 'Cause there's money to be made, but ...

polysemy_1531901_10.mp4.ja: 女は規則を作ることを許されないから
polysemy_1531901_10.mp4.en: A woman's not permitted to create.

polysemy_1531901_11.mp4.en: We just want to talk to her.

polysemy_1531901_12.mp4.ja: 彼女はどのみち去っていくんだよ
polysemy_1531901_12.mp4.en: She's going to leave you anyway.

polysemy_1531901_13.mp4.ja: これで地球も浄化されるんだ！
polysemy_1531901_13.mp4.en: With this act, I cleanse the earth!

polysemy_1366365_0.mp4.ja: 数時間後にかけ直してもいいですか？
polysemy_1366365_0.mp4.en: Look, could I call you back in a few hours?

polysemy_1366365_1.mp4.ja: すごくくつろいでるね

polysemy_1366365_3.mp4.ja: ジョシュが生まれた頃少しね

polysemy_1366365_4.mp4.ja: 移動だと言われれば従わざるをえなく...
polysemy_1366365_4.mp4.en: You move when the government tells you to move, so not everybody likes it.

polysemy_1366365_6.mp4.ja: 力を合わせ取り組むことが有益になるはずです
polysemy_1366365_6.mp4.en: If we work together on this, I'm sure it's going to be beneficial for both of us.

polysemy_1366365_7.mp4.ja: 明日はきっといい風が吹く
polysemy_1366365_7.mp4.en: It'll be a good wind tomorrow.

polysemy_1366365_9.mp4.en: Oh, my God, are you okay?

polysemy_1366365_10.mp4.ja: 船が荒らされ家族が消えた
polysemy_1366365_10.mp4.en: My boat's been ripped to shit and they're gone!

polysemy_1366365_12.mp4.ja: それは俺の大使館での仕事じゃない
polysemy_1366365_12.mp4.en: It's not the job I do at the Embassy.

polysemy_1366365_13.mp4.ja: 長年政府の仕事をしてるのは本当だ
polysemy_1366365_13.mp4.en: The only thing that's true is that I've worked for the government a long time.

polysemy_1366365_15.mp4.ja: ある政府機関での仕事だ
polysemy_1366365_15.mp4.en: It's a branch of the Agency.

polysemy_1366365_17.mp4.ja: 仕事について話すのは正しいことではない
polysemy_1366365_17.mp4.en: It would have never been right to tell you what I do.

polysemy_1366365_18.mp4.ja: キャラックふざけるんじゃない
polysemy_1366365_18.mp4.en: Carrack, don't fuck with me right now.

polysemy_1366365_20.mp4.ja: 私にお酒を作ろうとして負った傷が
polysemy_1366365_20.mp4.en: You got that making me a martini when you were 10.

polysemy_1366365_21.mp4.ja: 私は助けようとしていたの
polysemy_1366365_21.mp4.en: I was there to help him.

polysemy_1366365_22.mp4.ja: 彼を守ろうとしてたのに彼は聞こうとしなかった
polysemy_1366365_22.mp4.en: I was trying to protect him, but he wouldn't listen to me.

polysemy_1366365_23.mp4.ja: 俺はそれを聞く方だったのでは？
polysemy_1366365_23.mp4.en: I thought you said you were gonna do the talking.

polysemy_1366365_25.mp4.ja: 息子にトムと話がしたいと言え
polysemy_1366365_25.mp4.en: Tell your son I want to speak to Tom.

polysemy_1366365_26.mp4.ja: かばんか家族の死いずれかだ
polysemy_1366365_26.mp4.en: My briefcase or your family's dead.

polysemy_1366365_28.mp4.ja: あなたおびえてる銃を降ろして

polysemy_1366365_29.mp4.ja: 銃を持ったおびえた人が目の前にいると怖いわ
polysemy_1366365_29.mp4.en: You're scared, and scared people holding guns in my face, that scares me.

polysemy_1366365_30.mp4.ja: テロリストの元でしょうね
polysemy_1366365_30.mp4.en: I'm sorry to say that some terrorists do.

polysemy_1366365_32.mp4.ja: 家族救出の障害すべてを取り除く
polysemy_1366365_32.mp4.en: I will pull out all the stops to help you get your family back.

polysemy_1366365_33.mp4.ja: じっとして俺の言うことを聞け
polysemy_1366365_33.mp4.en: Stand still and listen to me!

polysemy_1366365_36.mp4.ja: マクシモ助けてちょうだい

polysemy_1366365_37.mp4.ja: トム・キートンの写真がなぜ携帯に？
polysemy_1366365_37.mp4.en: Why do you have a photo of Tom Keaton on your phone?

polysemy_1366365_38.mp4.en: What he did for a living.

polysemy_1366365_40.mp4.en: I don't know what I'm supposed to think.

polysemy_994495_2.mp4.en: When the exchange is over, you better run for your life.

polysemy_994495_3.mp4.en: And we gonna need some money.

polysemy_994495_5.mp4.ja: 金がもうすぐ届くが、どうやってあの警備員に渡す？
polysemy_994495_5.mp4.en: Now that we have the money, how do we get it to the guard?

polysemy_994495_6.mp4.ja: この金をどう渡せばいい？
polysemy_994495_6.mp4.en: How do you want me to give you this?

polysemy_994495_7.mp4.ja: 仕事のほうで、ちょっとトラブルが。
polysemy_994495_7.mp4.en: I got into a little bit of trouble here at work.

polysemy_994495_8.mp4.ja: レチェロを埋めるために来た。
polysemy_994495_8.mp4.en: I come before you now to bury the man ...

polysemy_994495_11.mp4.ja: この金は、君たちの苦労、家族の苦労で集められてきた。
polysemy_994495_11.mp4.en: Made off of your backs and off the backs of your family!

polysemy_994495_13.mp4.ja: サラと一緒に入れられてた部屋に、置いてあった。
polysemy_994495_13.mp4.en: I found this in the room where Sara and I were held.

polysemy_994495_14.mp4.ja: 飲み物を払ってくれない？
polysemy_994495_14.mp4.en: And you owe him for my drinks.

polysemy_994495_16.mp4.ja: 彼女がそんなに信用できると思うのか?
polysemy_994495_16.mp4.en: She'd better be able to handle a lot more than that.

polysemy_994495_17.mp4.ja: ＬＪ，お前と俺が一緒にどこかに逃げると思っていたが、．．．
polysemy_994495_17.mp4.en: This is the one chance you, me and LJ have of sticking toge ...

polysemy_493464_0.mp4.ja: 機織工が暗殺組織を作った
polysemy_493464_0.mp4.en: A clan of weavers formed a secret society of assassins.

polysemy_493464_2.mp4.ja: 僕の肩書きは会計管理主任
polysemy_493464_2.mp4.en: My job title is account manager.

polysemy_493464_3.mp4.ja: 以前は会計サービス主任と呼ばれていた
polysemy_493464_3.mp4.en: I use to be called an account service representative

polysemy_493464_4.mp4.ja: 親友バリー僕のイケアのテーブルの上で宜しくやっている
polysemy_493464_4.mp4.en: That's my best friend Barry fucking her on an Ikea kitchen table that I picked up for a really good price.

polysemy_493464_5.mp4.ja: 近頃僕は物事に関心を払うのが厄介になってきた
polysemy_493464_5.mp4.en: I'm finding it hard to care about anything these days

polysemy_493464_6.mp4.ja: 実は僕の関心といえば何に対しても関心が無い事さ
polysemy_493464_6.mp4.en: In fact, the only thing I do care about is the fact that I can't care about anything.

polysemy_493464_7.mp4.ja: 僕が7歳の時父は母を追い出した
polysemy_493464_7.mp4.en: My dad walked out my mom when I was seven days old.

polysemy_493464_8.mp4.ja: 同業者は武器を何処から手に入れたのか？
polysemy_493464_8.mp4.en: Where our competitor is getting his ammunition.

polysemy_493464_9.mp4.ja: 友愛会から逃げても無駄だクロス
polysemy_493464_9.mp4.en: No one leaves the fraternity, Cross.

polysemy_493464_10.mp4.ja: 友愛会に新たな未来がある
polysemy_493464_10.mp4.en: I have a new prospective on a fraternity.

polysemy_493464_13.mp4.ja: 体に弾を撃ち込む感触を学ぶのだ
polysemy_493464_13.mp4.en: You need to know what is it like to put a bullet in a body.

polysemy_493464_14.mp4.ja: クロスは近くに迫っている
polysemy_493464_14.mp4.en: Cross gets closer with each hour.

polysemy_493464_15.mp4.ja: これまで僕が何にも関心を示さなかった理由がわかった
polysemy_493464_15.mp4.en: Now I know why I could never care about anything before this.

polysemy_493464_16.mp4.ja: この書庫には友愛会の殺人記録が保管されている
polysemy_493464_16.mp4.en: On these shelves, Wesley, are the records of the fraternity kills.

polysemy_493464_17.mp4.ja: 彼の過去の行動を覚える
polysemy_493464_17.mp4.en: Memorize every move he ever made.

polysemy_493464_19.mp4.ja: 諜報機関によって気密室に閉じ込められ忍耐が切れた事
polysemy_493464_19.mp4.en: When he dropped a patient in an air tight room surrounded by secret service agents.

polysemy_493464_22.mp4.ja: 僕の調査によると彼は決して的を外さなかった
polysemy_493464_22.mp4.en: In fact in all my research I've found he never missed a target.

polysemy_493464_24.mp4.ja: これを宿命の織機と呼んでいる
polysemy_493464_24.mp4.en: We call this the loom of fate.

polysemy_493464_25.mp4.ja: 君の仕事は説明では無く実行だからだ
polysemy_493464_25.mp4.en: Your task is not to interpret, but to deliver.

polysemy_493464_26.mp4.ja: 全ての文明は暗号がある普通の文字で無い暗号がある
polysemy_493464_26.mp4.en: Every culture in history has a secret code, one you won't find in traditional texts.

polysemy_493464_27.mp4.ja: 彼らは友愛会と名乗った

polysemy_493464_29.mp4.ja: これは命令で実行あるのみ
polysemy_493464_29.mp4.en: They are orders and must be executed.

polysemy_493464_30.mp4.ja: 混沌の中に秩序を生み出すために我々に委託された
polysemy_493464_30.mp4.en: Entrusted to us, so that we might forge stability of chaos.

polysemy_493464_31.mp4.ja: クロスを殺すため僕はここへ来たのじゃなかったかな
polysemy_493464_31.mp4.en: Look, I thought you brought me here to kill Cross.

polysemy_493464_32.mp4.ja: 織機は与え私は説明し君が実行する
polysemy_493464_32.mp4.en: The loom provides, I interpret, you deliver.

polysemy_493464_33.mp4.ja: 貴方はローバートディーンダーディンを殺せと命令するのか？
polysemy_493464_33.mp4.en: You want me to kill Robert Dean Darden?

polysemy_493464_34.mp4.ja: ターゲットは会議室の議長席に座っている
polysemy_493464_34.mp4.en: The target will be in the conference room, sitting at the head chair.

polysemy_493464_36.mp4.ja: どうやって宿命か分かるこれは正しい事なのか？
polysemy_493464_36.mp4.en: and we're suppose to take on faith that what we're doing is right?

polysemy_493464_37.mp4.ja: 彼女は父と同じ道を進みたくなかった
polysemy_493464_37.mp4.en: And so she probably had in her mind that she was going to follow in his footsteps.

polysemy_493464_38.mp4.ja: クリスマスの日彼女が家にいると

polysemy_493464_39.mp4.ja: 被告は軽い判決を望んだ
polysemy_493464_39.mp4.en: The defendants want to get a softer judge.

polysemy_493464_40.mp4.ja: そして彼は針金のハンガーを取り円く曲げ．．．
polysemy_493464_40.mp4.en: And then he takes a wire hanger and twists it around ...

polysemy_493464_41.mp4.ja: 父のイニシャルを家族の者たちに彫りこんだ
polysemy_493464_41.mp4.en: And brands his initials at each one of them so they will never ever forget.

polysemy_493464_42.mp4.ja: それから私は友愛会に入った
polysemy_493464_42.mp4.en: After I was recruited into the fraternity

polysemy_493464_43.mp4.ja: 連邦判事が殺される数週間前
polysemy_493464_43.mp4.en: Weeks before the federal judge was killed.

polysemy_493464_44.mp4.ja: また友愛会のメンバーが狙撃に失敗した
polysemy_493464_44.mp4.en: And that a fraternity member had failed to pull the trigger.

polysemy_493464_45.mp4.ja: それが友愛会のコード
polysemy_493464_45.mp4.en: That's the code of the fraternity.

polysemy_493464_47.mp4.ja: ターゲットは黒いリムジンに乗っている
polysemy_493464_47.mp4.en: Your target will be in a black limo.

polysemy_493464_48.mp4.ja: いつも同じ車で6ブロックを移動する
polysemy_493464_48.mp4.en: He always travels the same six blocks on Holsten.

polysemy_493464_50.mp4.ja: どうして何週間も音沙汰なしそしたら突然現れてトイレを使うの？
polysemy_493464_50.mp4.en: What, you don't...for weeks and stopped to use the bathroom?

polysemy_493464_51.mp4.en: Out of the way, out of the way!

polysemy_493464_52.mp4.ja: お前の父は写真を撮るだけじゃない
polysemy_493464_52.mp4.en: Your father was never more than a camera click way.

polysemy_493464_53.mp4.ja: クロスが友愛会から去った時スローンは彼を追い詰めた
polysemy_493464_53.mp4.en: When Cross left the Fraternity, Sloan hunted you down.

polysemy_493464_55.mp4.ja: 君の父はこれを持っていた
polysemy_493464_55.mp4.en: Your father got a hold of this.

polysemy_493464_56.mp4.ja: スローンは自分の利益のためにターゲットを捏造していた
polysemy_493464_56.mp4.en: Sloan began manufacturing targets on his own for profit years ago.

polysemy_493464_58.mp4.ja: または父を殺した愚か者
polysemy_493464_58.mp4.en: Or just another tool, who was mind fucked into killing his father.

polysemy_493464_59.mp4.ja: いまいましいおとりだよ
polysemy_493464_59.mp4.en: This is just a motherfucking decoy.

polysemy_196229_0.mp4.ja: 服をデザインするときはいつもデレクを考えてるんだ
polysemy_196229_0.mp4.en: I think about Derek every time I design a collection.

polysemy_196229_1.mp4.ja: 君は何人の”アボ・デジタル”のモデルを見たことある？
polysemy_196229_1.mp4.en: How many" abo-digitals" do you see modelling?

polysemy_196229_2.mp4.ja: モデル以外にも他のことがいっぱいあると思うんだ
polysemy_196229_2.mp4.en: I'm pretty sure there's a lot more to life than being really, really good-looking.

polysemy_196229_4.mp4.ja: 君たちは今まで陰謀の何を追ってたんだ？
polysemy_196229_4.mp4.en: What with all the intrigue you guys have been dealing with.

polysemy_196229_5.mp4.ja: マチルダ君がこんなに”ガンコ野郎”を心配してるなんて驚きだよ
polysemy_196229_5.mp4.en: You know, Matilda, I'm surprised you're so worried about" Der-rock."

polysemy_196229_6.mp4.ja: 疑問なんて抱かないでくれ

polysemy_196229_8.mp4.ja: それって俺が好きなロコ系じゃん
polysemy_196229_8.mp4.en: You is talkin' loco and I like it.

polysemy_196229_9.mp4.ja: 君に言われたジャコビン・ムガトゥの名前の調査がやっと終わったよ
polysemy_196229_9.mp4.en: Hey, I finally got the results on the name check you asked for on Jacobim Mugatu.

polysemy_196229_10.mp4.ja: そうだ今すぐ見つけ出して来い！
polysemy_196229_10.mp4.en: Good, because I'm a hot little potato right now.

polysemy_196229_11.mp4.ja: 糞ったれお前が正しいよ

polysemy_196229_13.mp4.ja: 彼はキャリアが終わったのにそれを認めることができなかったんだ
polysemy_196229_13.mp4.en: He knew his career was over and he couldn't face it.

polysemy_196229_14.mp4.ja: こいつは１つの決め顔しか持ってないじゃないか！
polysemy_196229_14.mp4.en: The man has only one look, for Christ's sake!

polysemy_457572_0.mp4.ja: 我々の惑星は放射能の雲に覆われた
polysemy_457572_0.mp4.en: A cloud of radiation engulfed our great planet.

polysemy_457572_1.mp4.ja: 私の仕事はキミ達のような若者を安全に守ることだ
polysemy_457572_1.mp4.en: My job at Zomcon is to make things safe for young people just like you.

polysemy_457572_2.mp4.ja: 聞いたことがあるけどな

polysemy_457572_6.mp4.ja: ゾンコムのルールなんか構うもんか
polysemy_457572_6.mp4.en: I don't care about stupid Zomcon rules.

polysemy_457572_7.mp4.ja: 私が躊躇してる間にディーディーが食い止めたんだ
polysemy_457572_7.mp4.en: I'd take Dee Dee's head off in a second if I had to.

polysemy_457430_1.mp4.ja: 金がかかろうと何が必要だろうとかまわない
polysemy_457430_1.mp4.en: I don't care what it costs or what you need.

polysemy_457430_2.mp4.ja: 豚をさばくのはもう手慣れたものよ
polysemy_457430_2.mp4.en: Won't be the first pig I gutted.

polysemy_457430_3.mp4.ja: それなら自ら扉を作るのです
polysemy_457430_3.mp4.en: In that case, create your own door.

polysemy_449010_3.mp4.ja: ガルバトリックスは敗北の仕返しを狙っている
polysemy_449010_3.mp4.en: Galbatorix will try to avenge this defeat.

polysemy_449010_4.mp4.ja: バーディンの人たちは貴方の物語を話しています
polysemy_449010_4.mp4.en: Did your people of The Varden already tell stories about you?

polysemy_831888_0.mp4.ja: 火ってのは妙なモンだ
polysemy_831888_0.mp4.en: What is it about the fire?

polysemy_831888_1.mp4.ja: この宝町って街の持つ空気は独特でな
polysemy_831888_1.mp4.en: Treasure Town has a certain je ne sais quoi.

polysemy_831888_4.mp4.ja: もちろんそれなりの手当は用意してあります
polysemy_831888_4.mp4.en: Of course, we'll compensate you handsomely.

polysemy_831888_5.mp4.ja: おーチョコラもでかくなったな

polysemy_831888_6.mp4.ja: お前は随分といい仕事してんじゃねーかクロ
polysemy_831888_6.mp4.en: Fine work you've been doing lately, Black.

polysemy_831888_11.mp4.ja: 何も無理矢理ジャリ相手のシノギに変える必要はないでしょう
polysemy_831888_11.mp4.en: Why tear it down and replace it with a kid's playground?

polysemy_831888_13.mp4.ja: 得意の大名行列はどうした

polysemy_454921_3.mp4.ja: 私は、その様なことは当然と取って欲しく無いのです
polysemy_454921_3.mp4.en: I want you to know that I do not take that for granted.

polysemy_454921_4.mp4.ja: また、予定を取って頂ければ幸いです
polysemy_454921_4.mp4.en: And I hope that we can reschedule for later.

polysemy_454921_5.mp4.ja: どのように僕の金を取るの？
polysemy_454921_5.mp4.en: How is somebody just gonna just take my money?

polysemy_454921_6.mp4.ja: 子供は泊れる、あんたは何処か他をあたって．．．
polysemy_454921_6.mp4.en: but you have to find someplace else to go.

polysemy_479537_0.mp4.ja: あいつはライフル銃さえ取らなかった
polysemy_479537_0.mp4.en: He didn't even take his rifle.

polysemy_479537_1.mp4.ja: 金を払ってそれで終わりにしよう
polysemy_479537_1.mp4.en: Well, let's just get paid up and be done with it.

polysemy_479537_2.mp4.ja: 覚えておけあのろくでなしが死んだら金をもらえない
polysemy_479537_2.mp4.en: Remember, if you kill this son of a bitch, you will not be paid.

polysemy_479537_4.mp4.ja: 盗むのかアイルランド小僧

polysemy_479537_7.mp4.ja: 金も全く持っていない

polysemy_479537_8.mp4.ja: いずれにせよ金はない

polysemy_479537_10.mp4.ja: とにかくここから得るものはない
polysemy_479537_10.mp4.en: I reckon I ain't getting out of here, anyway.

polysemy_416449_2.mp4.ja: 山と積まれたペルシャ兵の死体は滑りやすい
polysemy_416449_2.mp4.en: And the pile of Persian dead is slippery.

polysemy_416449_4.mp4.ja: 私を王として神として受け入れろ
polysemy_416449_4.mp4.en: Embrace me as your king and as your god.

polysemy_416449_5.mp4.ja: お前に立つのを命令した残酷なレオニダスとは違って
polysemy_416449_5.mp4.en: Unlike the cruel Leonidas that demanded that you stand,

polysemy_416449_6.mp4.ja: 彼は法を破り枢密院の承認無しに出発した
polysemy_416449_6.mp4.en: He's broken our laws and left without the council's consent.

polysemy_416449_7.mp4.ja: 私はたった今貴方の命を断つ事だって出来る
polysemy_416449_7.mp4.en: I could crush the life out of you right now.

polysemy_416449_8.mp4.ja: 貴方は枢密院へ行けるが誰も貴方の言葉を聞かない
polysemy_416449_8.mp4.en: You will go before the council but your words will fall in deaf ears.

polysemy_416449_9.mp4.ja: その引っ掻き傷はどうだ
polysemy_416449_9.mp4.en: I trust that scracth hasn't made you useless.

polysemy_416449_11.mp4.ja: 息子が命を捧げたのは国の為では無い
polysemy_416449_11.mp4.en: It's not that my son gave up his life for his country.

polysemy_416449_12.mp4.ja: 私の心は憎悪で満たされている
polysemy_416449_12.mp4.en: I have filled my heart with hate.

polysemy_416449_14.mp4.ja: スパルタ人はハーキュリーズの子孫と伝わる
polysemy_416449_14.mp4.en: The old ones say we Spartans have descended from Hercules himself.

polysemy_416449_15.mp4.ja: クセルクセスの大軍が消滅の危機にある

polysemy_466399_1.mp4.ja: 男達の旅は終わろうとしていた
polysemy_466399_1.mp4.en: The men are near the end of their journey.

polysemy_466399_3.mp4.ja: 彼が手を動かすのが分かるか?

polysemy_466399_4.mp4.ja: そしてそれで物語は終わりだ
polysemy_466399_4.mp4.en: And that's the end of the story.

polysemy_466399_5.mp4.ja: 待て物語はそこで終わりじゃない
polysemy_466399_5.mp4.en: Wait, that's not the end of the story.

polysemy_994502_1.mp4.ja: ベルサイユ銀行をお願いします。

polysemy_407887_0.mp4.ja: 「ただし、ここマサチューセッツ州警察を除いてだ」
polysemy_407887_0.mp4.en: But you will not be a Massachusetts state trooper.

polysemy_407887_1.mp4.ja: 「捜査だとばれないよう十分な刑期を与える」
polysemy_407887_1.mp4.en: You'll do enough jail time to convince anyone this is no setup.

polysemy_407887_2.mp4.ja: 「おかげで、頭の痛いことばかりだが」
polysemy_407887_2.mp4.en: And this can cause me a lot of problems.

polysemy_407887_7.mp4.ja: 「落ち着け、タマでもにぎって頭冷やせ」
polysemy_407887_7.mp4.en: Calm down, or you'll shoot in your pants.

polysemy_407887_9.mp4.ja: 「てことは、ネズミがいるのは認めんだな」
polysemy_407887_9.mp4.en: Start with you agree there is a rat.

polysemy_407887_13.mp4.en: It's the highest honor we got.

polysemy_407887_14.mp4.ja: 「こんな形で、また現れたりして、本当にすまない、許してくれ」
polysemy_407887_14.mp4.en: I'm sorry to even show up here like this, you know?

polysemy_872022_0.mp4.en: That's all you are eating for lunch?

polysemy_872022_5.mp4.ja: 一応昼間目星はつけておいたんだ
polysemy_872022_5.mp4.en: I found a target this evening.

polysemy_872022_6.mp4.ja: よろしくお願いします

polysemy_872022_8.mp4.ja: （静流）誠人が出すならあたしも出す

polysemy_872022_11.mp4.ja: （誠人の声）そのウソに僕はもう少し触れていたい
polysemy_872022_11.mp4.en: [I want to be fooled by her lies for just a while longer.]

polysemy_804507_0.mp4.ja: ここに来るまで大変だったみたいね
polysemy_804507_0.mp4.en: It seems that you have done a tiring journey.

polysemy_804507_2.mp4.en: Are you sure to go on?

polysemy_462504_0.mp4.ja: 奴等はサインさせるようにと全員に命じている
polysemy_462504_0.mp4.en: They tell that to everyone to get them to sign.

polysemy_462504_1.mp4.ja: それじゃ、聞いてくれ、みんな

polysemy_462504_2.mp4.ja: その後で俺たちが看守を囚人として捕えるんだ
polysemy_462504_2.mp4.en: Then we take the guards as prisoners.

polysemy_462504_3.mp4.ja: 俺のお袋はステーキみたいな厚さの皮でそれを作るんだ

polysemy_405296_19.mp4.en: Actually, I think Arctor would probably kill the guy and then disappear.

polysemy_405296_22.mp4.en: I have the perfect tool for this job.

polysemy_405296_26.mp4.ja: そいで、この男は世界的に有名な詐欺師だって触れて回ったんだよ、いい？

polysemy_405296_32.mp4.ja: なぜ、止められないのか？

polysemy_405296_34.mp4.en: And he sort of sets them up in the first place while he stays out of it.

polysemy_405296_35.mp4.ja: それに、彼の側にいるときあなたもおかしくなってるわ
polysemy_405296_35.mp4.en: And when you're around him, you start acting crazy.

polysemy_405296_36.mp4.ja: 悪くなり始めてると思うんだ
polysemy_405296_36.mp4.en: I think it's starting to get bad.

polysemy_405296_38.mp4.ja: マリファナ巻いて、ずっと騒いでるの？
polysemy_405296_38.mp4.en: Rolling joints and rattling on and on?

polysemy_405296_39.mp4.en: If you're a latent gay, then you'll want me to take the initiative.

polysemy_405296_48.mp4.en: Something big is definitely going down in this house.

polysemy_405296_52.mp4.ja: あなたの脳の左と右半球の間で競合しているんです
polysemy_405296_52.mp4.en: Competition between the left and the right hemispheres of your brain.

polysemy_405296_53.mp4.ja: 経過次第だね長期間、”物質D”を止めた後のね
polysemy_405296_53.mp4.en: Time will tell, and only after you've been off Substance D for a long while.

polysemy_405296_54.mp4.ja: 今、どのくらい取っているの？

polysemy_405296_55.mp4.ja: 明日の夜、南カリフォルニアの残りの半分をやる

polysemy_405296_58.mp4.ja: これは、もちろん、ただの口実であなたの身を守るためです
polysemy_405296_58.mp4.en: This, of course, is just a pretext for your own safety.

polysemy_405296_59.mp4.ja: それに、服用していた量だ
polysemy_405296_59.mp4.en: And from the quantities you were taking ...

polysemy_405296_60.mp4.ja: 生きないことの衝動は生きることの衝動より強い

polysemy_186566_2.mp4.en: She's my friend who has to put up with assholes like you.

polysemy_186566_3.mp4.en: So my friends tell me that they see LeBeau entering the Port-a-Potty.

polysemy_186566_4.mp4.ja: 漏れないようにあそこにくっ付けて使ういいな
polysemy_186566_4.mp4.en: Before starting, make sure you have a tight seal against your skin.

polysemy_186566_5.mp4.ja: 解り切ってることを聞くな
polysemy_186566_5.mp4.en: Plain as the nose on your face.

polysemy_186566_7.mp4.ja: だからそこを何とかお願いします
polysemy_186566_7.mp4.en: It's not about the press right now.

polysemy_1043844_0.mp4.ja: 実際私は他の候補に投票したわ
polysemy_1043844_0.mp4.en: Actually, I voted for the other guy.

polysemy_1043844_1.mp4.ja: そうなら俺たちは同じ立場にいるのだ
polysemy_1043844_1.mp4.en: In that case, we're on the same side.

polysemy_1043844_2.mp4.ja: 小さなミスをほじくって大事にするな
polysemy_1043844_2.mp4.en: Don't let one mistake ruin a great career.

polysemy_1043844_6.mp4.ja: 何が起こったかの唯一の記録なの
polysemy_1043844_6.mp4.en: It's the only proof you'll have of what happened.

polysemy_1043844_7.mp4.en: We have to stop the machine.

polysemy_1043844_8.mp4.ja: 主は私に自分で見ることのできる目を与えられた
polysemy_1043844_8.mp4.en: The Lord gave me my eyes to see for myself.

polysemy_1091254_0.mp4.ja: デュバクはこの件のキーなんだ、ジャック
polysemy_1091254_0.mp4.en: Dubaku is the key to this thing, Jack.

polysemy_1091254_1.mp4.en: That's a chance we're gonna have to take.

polysemy_1091254_2.mp4.ja: 調査は司法長官の指示なんだ
polysemy_1091254_2.mp4.en: Agent moss, The a.G. Personally initiated this investigation.

polysemy_1091254_5.mp4.en: Escort you to a safe house.

polysemy_959184_0.mp4.ja: 逆な立場だったがもう終わりだ
polysemy_959184_0.mp4.en: I played rat for you once, and that was it.

polysemy_959184_1.mp4.ja: 助けてくれるのは、グリーンだ
polysemy_959184_1.mp4.en: If anyone can help Michael and Lincoln, it's him.

polysemy_959184_2.mp4.ja: 首にもできないし、レノルドス大統領に忠義もない
polysemy_959184_2.mp4.en: He has no job to lose, no loyalty to Reynolds.

polysemy_959184_3.mp4.ja: 私は頭にきて悪い言葉を言い放った
polysemy_959184_3.mp4.en: She kept asking and kept asking, and I lost my patience and I snapped at her.

polysemy_959184_4.mp4.ja: 本当に悪い言葉を言い放った
polysemy_959184_4.mp4.en: I snapped at her real bad.

polysemy_959184_5.mp4.ja: 伝えたい言葉があるけど,
polysemy_959184_5.mp4.en: Baby, I want you to do something for me.

polysemy_959184_6.mp4.en: They tell you to meet them at the statue.

polysemy_959184_7.mp4.ja: この男たちは、チェックインした？
polysemy_959184_7.mp4.en: Have either of these men checked in?

polysemy_959184_8.mp4.ja: キャロライン・レノルドズ大統領の犯罪の証拠の話もされてたね
polysemy_959184_8.mp4.en: There is proof of Caroline Reynold's guilt.

polysemy_959184_9.mp4.ja: なんの代わりに、ブラック・メールする？

polysemy_959184_10.mp4.ja: 自らサインしてくれる
polysemy_959184_10.mp4.en: I think she'll sign it with her own hand.

polysemy_959184_11.mp4.ja: エース・チーム、ベタ・チーム、これは、リーダー・ワンだ
polysemy_959184_11.mp4.en: Ace Team, Beta Team- this is Leader One.

polysemy_1091256_1.mp4.ja: 近づかないようにしろ
polysemy_1091256_1.mp4.en: Keep your distance from dubaku's men.

polysemy_1091256_2.mp4.ja: ウォーカー捜査官、聞いてるか?
polysemy_1091256_2.mp4.en: Agent walker, are you still there?

polysemy_1091256_3.mp4.ja: テイラー氏の監禁場所に向かってる
polysemy_1091256_3.mp4.en: On my way to where we think henry taylor's being held.

polysemy_1091256_4.mp4.ja: 入国管理局の友人に調べて貰ったら
polysemy_1091256_4.mp4.en: I checked with someone I know at immigration services,

polysemy_1091256_5.mp4.en: I just want you out of my sister's life.

polysemy_1091256_6.mp4.ja: 収穫はないということですね
polysemy_1091256_6.mp4.en: Then we have nothing to hold over their heads.

polysemy_1091256_7.mp4.ja: ここでの仕事は終わりだ

polysemy_1091256_8.mp4.en: We're going to get you help.

polysemy_994509_0.mp4.ja: ウイスラーも数ヶ月勤めたと思う。
polysemy_994509_0.mp4.en: I could've sworn he worked there for a few months.

polysemy_994509_1.mp4.en: Well, we might need something to extend it.

polysemy_994509_3.mp4.ja: どこで買うか探して、睡眠薬を手に入れて欲しい。
polysemy_994509_3.mp4.en: You need to find out where and put something in that cup.

polysemy_994509_4.mp4.ja: あと3時間だが、ちょっと無理じゃないか？
polysemy_994509_4.mp4.en: You're dropping this on me with three hours to go?

polysemy_994509_8.mp4.en: You are sure you don't mind?

polysemy_994509_9.mp4.ja: 一人の男が、広場の外で争いを解決した。
polysemy_994509_9.mp4.en: Someone went outside the ring to settle a dispute.

polysemy_994509_10.mp4.ja: 金持ちの影響の話をもう一度言おう。
polysemy_994509_10.mp4.en: Now you want to tell me how I favor the rich.

polysemy_994509_12.mp4.en: You can stop it, you know.

polysemy_994509_14.mp4.ja: 誰かに入れられたと思う。
polysemy_994509_14.mp4.en: 'Cause if you did somebody put it there.

polysemy_1486497_3.mp4.ja: 過去を振り払う唯一の方法
polysemy_1486497_3.mp4.en: It's the only way I'll make it through.

polysemy_1486497_8.mp4.ja: 両親の死は過去になるはず人々は自分の命を心配し始めた
polysemy_1486497_8.mp4.en: They don't remember that our parents are dead, because they've got their own lives to deal with.

polysemy_1420898_0.mp4.ja: 先生金曜の聖なる火の儀式は出来ますか？
polysemy_1420898_0.mp4.en: Sir, do we still get to do the sacred fire ceremony on Friday?

polysemy_1420898_1.mp4.ja: 奴らいつもマスクを被ってた

polysemy_1420898_2.mp4.ja: 君たちとちょっと話をしたいそうだ
polysemy_1420898_2.mp4.en: Let's all listen with respectful attention, all right?

polysemy_1420898_3.mp4.ja: ここで済ますことも出来るし次の段階に持っていくことも出来るのよ
polysemy_1420898_3.mp4.en: Orrin, we can let this go, or we can take it to the next level.

polysemy_1420898_4.mp4.ja: メモと身ぶりでしか伝えない
polysemy_1420898_4.mp4.en: We only communicate by note and sign language.

polysemy_1420898_7.mp4.ja: ブライトアーチへ戻る間に話すよ
polysemy_1420898_7.mp4.en: Just tell us your damn theory.

polysemy_1420898_8.mp4.ja: みんなこの森の中で悪いことが行われたことを知ってるね
polysemy_1420898_8.mp4.en: We all know that evil has been done in these woods.

polysemy_361748_0.mp4.ja: 大佐、パイプをやっても構わないでしょうか？
polysemy_361748_0.mp4.en: Herr Colonel, would it disturb you if I smoked my pipe?

polysemy_361748_2.mp4.ja: まあ、腐った卵が一つのカゴに収まる訳だ。
polysemy_361748_2.mp4.en: Basically, we have all our rotten eggs in one basket.

polysemy_361748_4.mp4.ja: そいつの扱いは絶品なんだってな。
polysemy_361748_4.mp4.en: I hear you're pretty good with that.

polysemy_361748_7.mp4.ja: ...私は仲間に入らない、と言うのも大尉が言った通り...
polysemy_361748_7.mp4.en: I didn't join them because you're quite right, Captain.

polysemy_361748_8.mp4.ja: お前が今、しっぽを出したからさ、大尉。
polysemy_361748_8.mp4.en: Because you've just given yourself away, Captain.

polysemy_361748_9.mp4.ja: 二人とも同じだって言いたかったんですよ。
polysemy_361748_9.mp4.en: I was saying that makes two of us.

polysemy_361748_11.mp4.ja: この裏切り者を連れて、俺の前から消えてくれ。
polysemy_361748_11.mp4.en: J ust take that fucking traitor, and get her out of my sight.

polysemy_361748_14.mp4.ja: もう一度お願いできますかな？
polysemy_361748_14.mp4.en: Say it for me once please ...?

polysemy_361748_16.mp4.ja: 私は下に降りて野蛮なブタの相手をしなくちゃいけないの。
polysemy_361748_16.mp4.en: I have to go down and socialize with these Hun pigs.

polysemy_361748_18.mp4.ja: まあ、彼女は相応しい扱いを受けた、とだけ言っておこう。
polysemy_361748_18.mp4.en: Well, let's just say, she got what she deserved.

polysemy_361748_19.mp4.ja: さて、君の仲間のドノヴィッツ軍曹とオマール一等兵だが...
polysemy_361748_19.mp4.en: Now as far as your paesanos, Sergeant Donowitz and Private Omar ...

polysemy_361748_20.mp4.ja: そんなことも想像出来ないようじゃ、お互いをプロと認める信頼関係は築けそうもないな。
polysemy_361748_20.mp4.en: we simply aren't operating on the level of mutual respect I assumed.

polysemy_361748_21.mp4.ja: 戦争を終わらせるためには、その四人の命が必要だ。
polysemy_361748_21.mp4.en: And you need all four to end the war.

polysemy_361748_22.mp4.ja: この取り引きに君が保証を与えることは不可能だ。
polysemy_361748_22.mp4.en: The kind you wouldn't have the authority to make.

polysemy_361748_23.mp4.ja: この話が気にってもらえたならばね。
polysemy_361748_23.mp4.en: If that tastes better going down.

polysemy_361748_24.mp4.ja: 歴史書にはどう書かれるだろうね？
polysemy_361748_24.mp4.en: What shall the history books read?

polysemy_361748_25.mp4.ja: 劇場にカギをかけてから、スクリーンの裏で待機してるよ。
polysemy_361748_25.mp4.en: I should go lock the auditorium and take my place behind the screen.

polysemy_361748_26.mp4.ja: 私の地位に応じた軍人年金と付随する便宜供与をお願いします。
polysemy_361748_26.mp4.en: I want my full military pension and benefits under my proper rank.

polysemy_361748_27.mp4.ja: 私も直接お会いするのを楽しみにしていますよ、将軍。
polysemy_361748_27.mp4.en: I look forward to seeing you face to face as well, sir.

polysemy_361748_28.mp4.ja: ランダ大佐は君とユートビッチを捕虜としてトラックに乗せる。
polysemy_361748_28.mp4.en: Colonel Landa will put you and Private Utivich in a truck as prisoners.

polysemy_361748_29.mp4.ja: それから大佐と彼の通信士は、我々の前線に向かう。
polysemy_361748_29.mp4.en: Then he and his radio operator will get in the truck and drive to our lines.

polysemy_361748_30.mp4.ja: 前線を超えたら、大佐と彼の部下は君に降伏する。
polysemy_361748_30.mp4.en: Upon crossing our lines, Colonel Landa and his man will surrender to you.

polysemy_361748_32.mp4.ja: ダメよ、ここには入れないわ！

polysemy_361748_33.mp4.ja: いや、いや、いや、ちょっと待って。

polysemy_361748_34.mp4.ja: 俺が一人殺した時、もう一人の護衛のところまでお前は9メートル離れてるんだ。
polysemy_361748_34.mp4.en: When I kill that guy, you got 30 feet to get to that guard.

polysemy_361748_37.mp4.ja: あんたたちを殺すこのユダヤ人の顔をじっくり拝んで頭に刻み付けてね。
polysemy_361748_37.mp4.en: And I want you to look deep into the face of the Jew who's going to do it!

polysemy_361748_39.mp4.ja: アメリカ軍の前線を超えました、大佐。
polysemy_361748_39.mp4.en: These are the American lines, Colonel sir.

polysemy_361748_40.mp4.ja: ハーマン、手錠を外してやれ。

polysemy_361748_41.mp4.ja: ユートビッチ、大佐の手を後ろに廻して手錠をしろ。
polysemy_361748_41.mp4.en: Utivich, cuff the Colonel's hands behind his back.

polysemy_361748_42.mp4.ja: お前の将軍と、この男の命を保証することも取り引きしたんだぞ。
polysemy_361748_42.mp4.en: I made a deal with your general for that man's life!

polysemy_361748_43.mp4.ja: ユートビッチと俺は確かにお前がお偉方と取り引きしたのを聞いていたよ。
polysemy_361748_43.mp4.en: You know, Utivich and myself heard that deal you made with the brass.

polysemy_361748_44.mp4.ja: ...ナチの高官全員をバーベキューにするって聞いたら...
polysemy_361748_44.mp4.en: Well, if you're willing to barbecue the whole H igh Command,

polysemy_361748_45.mp4.ja: でも、一つ聞きたいことがある。
polysemy_361748_45.mp4.en: But I do have one question.

polysemy_361748_46.mp4.ja: ...あんたはその格好いいSSの制服を脱ぎ捨てるんだろ？
polysemy_361748_46.mp4.en: I imagine you are going to take off that handsome-looking SS uniform of yours.

polysemy_361748_47.mp4.ja: ...俺はあんたに脱ぎ捨てることが出来ないちょっとしたプレゼントをくれてやるよ。
polysemy_361748_47.mp4.en: I'm going to give you a little something you can't take off.

polysemy_970452_1.mp4.ja: どうしてあの魔女は私に印をつけたの？
polysemy_970452_1.mp4.en: Why did that creature mark me?

polysemy_970452_2.mp4.ja: 印付きの者を連れて行け

polysemy_1352058_0.mp4.ja: 結局あなたはアメリカの秘密を盗んでしまったのだから
polysemy_1352058_0.mp4.en: You did after all steal State's secret.

polysemy_1352058_1.mp4.ja: あなたが作ったと言ってるのは...
polysemy_1352058_1.mp4.en: Are you saying that you created ...

polysemy_1352058_2.mp4.ja: 君はそんなことなかったと願うだろう

polysemy_1352058_3.mp4.ja: 犠牲があったことは理解している
polysemy_1352058_3.mp4.en: I understand there have been sacrifices.

polysemy_1352058_4.mp4.ja: 研究室をあなた仕様に用意しました
polysemy_1352058_4.mp4.en: We've got a lab set to your specifications.

polysemy_1345253_0.mp4.ja: シャトルを取ってから、戻って、ルーメンを助ける
polysemy_1345253_0.mp4.en: Then after we get a shuttle, we'll go back and help the Lurmen.

polysemy_1345253_1.mp4.ja: アイツラは手を汚して、直接戦わないとダメだ
polysemy_1345253_1.mp4.en: Now, they'll have to get their hands dirty and meet us face to face.

polysemy_1345253_2.mp4.ja: シールドを通す前に止めなきゃ
polysemy_1345253_2.mp4.en: We've got to stop them before they get through that shield.

polysemy_1091253_1.mp4.ja: 元兵士や諜報員を使って仕事をしている
polysemy_1091253_1.mp4.en: Enlists ex-military and intelligence operatives, jobs them out to clients.

polysemy_1091253_2.mp4.ja: 俺がCTUを辞めてからずっとエマーソンは俺に目をつけていたらしい
polysemy_1091253_2.mp4.en: Emerson had been keeping tabs on me ever since I left ctu.

polysemy_1091253_3.mp4.ja: そんなことに手は貸せない
polysemy_1091253_3.mp4.en: And I didn't signed up for that.

polysemy_1091253_5.mp4.ja: 信じてくれ俺の中では終わっていたんだが
polysemy_1091253_5.mp4.en: I thought I was done with this, too, believe me.

polysemy_1091253_7.mp4.ja: トニー終わったことだ
polysemy_1091253_7.mp4.en: Tony, you already made your case.

polysemy_1091253_8.mp4.ja: 私が始末をつけたいの
polysemy_1091253_8.mp4.en: I have to make this right.

polysemy_1503672_0.mp4.ja: クレメンテには他のものを与えるさ
polysemy_1503672_0.mp4.en: Clemente's got bigger fish to fry.

polysemy_1503672_1.mp4.ja: それは良いサインだわ
polysemy_1503672_1.mp4.en: Maybe it's a sign of how well this is going.

polysemy_1503672_2.mp4.ja: 誰もがそう考えています

polysemy_1503672_4.mp4.ja: さてともう仕事に行かなくちゃ
polysemy_1503672_4.mp4.en: Speaking of which, I actually have to go to the office now.

polysemy_1503672_5.mp4.ja: 根拠はありませんが重要な証拠だと考えています
polysemy_1503672_5.mp4.en: Now I'm no scientist, but that seems significant to me.

polysemy_1503672_6.mp4.ja: この調査の中心となっていました
polysemy_1503672_6.mp4.en: Seemed to be at the center of the blackout investigation.

polysemy_1503672_7.mp4.ja: 仕事に集中してくれない？
polysemy_1503672_7.mp4.en: Can we focus, please, on what we're doing?

polysemy_1503672_8.mp4.ja: 仕事をしているようでした

polysemy_1503672_9.mp4.ja: ここにその記録があります
polysemy_1503672_9.mp4.en: He was kind enough to provide a transcript of your session.

polysemy_1503672_10.mp4.ja: ああだがお前の話も相当なものだったからな
polysemy_1503672_10.mp4.en: Yeah, but, you know, when you hear it laid out like that, it does sound questionable.

polysemy_1503672_11.mp4.ja: そんなに悪くない響きだな
polysemy_1503672_11.mp4.en: That's starting to sound pretty good right about now.

polysemy_1386231_0.mp4.ja: ポール・クレイガーかしばらく聞いてない名前だな【リンチ・ホルステッド株式ブローカー会社】
polysemy_1386231_0.mp4.en: Paul Krager's a name I haven't heard in a while.

polysemy_1386231_1.mp4.ja: 金が手に入ってうまいワインを飲み始めると男はそうなる
polysemy_1386231_1.mp4.en: Fat wallets and good wine can do that to a man.

polysemy_1386231_2.mp4.ja: ジムはここでたくさんクビを斬る仕事をしてたから
polysemy_1386231_2.mp4.en: Jim did a lot of the ax work here.

polysemy_1386231_3.mp4.ja: どこか静かな場所でちょっと会えないかい？
polysemy_1386231_3.mp4.en: Can we be somewhere private for a moment?

polysemy_1091257_0.mp4.en: I just want you out of my sister's life.

polysemy_1091257_1.mp4.ja: 信用できる奴がいるよ
polysemy_1091257_1.mp4.en: Well, m not sure I can find someone I trust on such short notice.

polysemy_1091257_4.mp4.ja: 私の幸せは全部壊すのよね
polysemy_1091257_4.mp4.en: Every chance I've ever had at happine, you found some way of ruining it.

polysemy_1091257_5.mp4.en: Can you offer any kind of prognosis?

polysemy_1091257_6.mp4.ja: 見通しは良くありません

polysemy_1091257_7.mp4.ja: ロジャーの話を聞かなくてごめんなさい
polysemy_1091257_7.mp4.en: I'm so sorry I didn't listen to you about Roger.

polysemy_1091257_8.mp4.en: Have you had a chance to tell her?

polysemy_1091257_10.mp4.ja: 邪魔になりそうなのか?
polysemy_1091257_10.mp4.en: Is she going to a problem for us?

polysemy_1091257_13.mp4.en: I'm your older ster, and I won't allow it.

polysemy_1091257_15.mp4.ja: 仕事の邪魔をするなんてどんな大事件なの?
polysemy_1091257_15.mp4.en: What is it that's so impornt for my mother to steal me away while I'm trying to do business?

polysemy_1091257_16.mp4.ja: あなたを守るのは止めようかしら
polysemy_1091257_16.mp4.en: Well, maybe I should stop covering for you.

polysemy_1091246_0.mp4.en: I'm here to get you out.

polysemy_1091246_1.mp4.ja: もう少し下がらないと
polysemy_1091246_1.mp4.en: You can drop back a little more.

polysemy_452694_2.mp4.ja: 平静でいる積りだったけどとても無理だわ
polysemy_452694_2.mp4.en: I'm supposed to act normal, but I'm not really acting very normal.

polysemy_452694_3.mp4.ja: 毎回貴方が訪ねて来た時を記録してる
polysemy_452694_3.mp4.en: I wrote down every time that you came to visit me.

polysemy_452694_5.mp4.ja: 何度も貴方は同じ場所に現れたわ
polysemy_452694_5.mp4.en: Seems that you go back to the same places a lot.
