polysemy_988045_41.mp4.en: There is a toxin refined from the nectar of rhododendron ponticum.

polysemy_988045_42.mp4.ja: シークレットサービスが持っています

polysemy_988045_43.mp4.ja: 明らかな事実ほど理解しにくいものはない
polysemy_988045_43.mp4.en: There's nothing more elusive than an obvious fact.

polysemy_4694544_1.mp4.ja: 俺は完全にその反対を行ってる
polysemy_4694544_1.mp4.en: Now me, I'm doing the totally opposite thing.

polysemy_3731562_0.mp4.ja: 都市広い抗議は足踏み状態に議会の会議を持ってきました
polysemy_3731562_0.mp4.en: The city wide protests have brought congressional meeting to a standstill

polysemy_3731562_1.mp4.ja: ビル・ランダここ上院議員ウィリスを確認してください。
polysemy_3731562_1.mp4.en: Bill Randa here to see Senator Willis.

polysemy_3731562_2.mp4.ja: モナークは、外国人の生活のための検索ですぐにそこにランクされています。
polysemy_3731562_2.mp4.en: Monarch ranks right up there in the search for alien life.

polysemy_3731562_3.mp4.ja: そして、彼は72で、ダナンに12人のパイロットを救出しました。
polysemy_3731562_3.mp4.en: And he rescued 12 pilots in Danang, at 72.

polysemy_3731562_5.mp4.ja: 私はどちらかの方法で大丈夫です。

polysemy_3731562_6.mp4.ja: 彼はグリップを失っています。

polysemy_5207756_0.mp4.ja: 上から落ちない限りは...
polysemy_5207756_0.mp4.en: We found the only way in, so ...

polysemy_5350144_0.mp4.ja: それは私に10分かかります回路図を検索します。
polysemy_5350144_0.mp4.en: It should take me ten minutes to retrieve the schematics.

polysemy_5350144_1.mp4.ja: 私はあなたの価値があるようにします。
polysemy_5350144_1.mp4.en: I'll make it worth your while.

polysemy_5350144_2.mp4.ja: あなたは銃を持っていると言った。
polysemy_5350144_2.mp4.en: You said you had a gun, though.

polysemy_5350144_3.mp4.ja: 私はあなたを守ることになっています。
polysemy_5350144_3.mp4.en: I'm supposed to be protecting you.

polysemy_5350144_5.mp4.ja: その後、ポートに注入します。
polysemy_5350144_5.mp4.en: Then inject it into the port.

polysemy_5350144_6.mp4.ja: まだそのリストに取り組んでいます。

polysemy_5350144_7.mp4.ja: 私たちは話すことができますそれはあなたが準備ができているときはいつでも。
polysemy_5350144_7.mp4.en: We can, uh, talk through it whenever you're ready.

polysemy_5350144_8.mp4.ja: 今何をしているのか考えてみてください。
polysemy_5350144_8.mp4.en: Think about what you're doing, now.

polysemy_5350144_9.mp4.ja: だからあなたはテロリストから石油を購入した。
polysemy_5350144_9.mp4.en: So you bought oil from terrorists, then.

polysemy_5350144_10.mp4.ja: 私の監督は、私に言わずに行った。
polysemy_5350144_10.mp4.en: My director did, without telling me.

polysemy_5350144_11.mp4.ja: 息子、私は選択をしました。

polysemy_5350144_12.mp4.ja: 私は恐ろしい、ひどい選択をしました。
polysemy_5350144_12.mp4.en: I made a terrible, terrible choice.

polysemy_5350144_13.mp4.ja: 彼がワイヤーを着ていない限り...
polysemy_5350144_13.mp4.en: Unless he was wearing a wire ...

polysemy_5350144_14.mp4.ja: 戦争は本当に彼を変えた。

polysemy_5350144_15.mp4.ja: 音を立てないでください。

polysemy_5350144_16.mp4.ja: 私は彼に再び話をする必要がある。
polysemy_5350144_16.mp4.en: I need to talk to him again.

polysemy_5350144_17.mp4.ja: すべてを下にロックしてください。

polysemy_1152836_2.mp4.ja: 出してくれて感謝してるレッド
polysemy_1152836_2.mp4.en: Thanks for getting us out, Red.

polysemy_1152836_3.mp4.ja: シカゴに行って金を手に入れる
polysemy_1152836_3.mp4.en: Let's go to Chicago and make some money.

polysemy_1152836_4.mp4.ja: にもかかわらず我々は彼を捕える
polysemy_1152836_4.mp4.en: Well, nevertheless, we will get him.

polysemy_1152836_5.mp4.ja: 銀行強盗の方がやっかいだ
polysemy_1152836_5.mp4.en: Well, robbing banks is getting tougher.

polysemy_1152836_6.mp4.ja: 彼らの動向に関心を持て
polysemy_1152836_6.mp4.en: We gotta care what they think.

polysemy_1152836_8.mp4.ja: ダイスを振ってたシュトイベン・クラブのクローク係よ
polysemy_1152836_8.mp4.en: And I've been a dice girl, and I check coats at the Steuben Club.

polysemy_1152836_9.mp4.ja: これがジョン・デリンジャーを捕らえる我々のやり方だ
polysemy_1152836_9.mp4.en: It is by such methods that our Bureau will get John Dillinger.

polysemy_1152836_10.mp4.ja: 面会のアポ取ってくれカーターとボームと私だ
polysemy_1152836_10.mp4.en: Request appointments for Carter Baum and myself.

polysemy_1152836_11.mp4.ja: ”床の上にキーを置いてくれ”
polysemy_1152836_11.mp4.en: When you drop it, leave the keys on the floorboard.

polysemy_1152836_13.mp4.ja: そこでは刺激的な事は何も起きなかった
polysemy_1152836_13.mp4.en: And nothing exciting ever happened there, either.

polysemy_1152836_14.mp4.ja: バーマンが20分前シェローン・アパートにデソットを止めた
polysemy_1152836_14.mp4.en: Berman dropped the DeSoto at Sherone Apartments 20 minutes ago.

polysemy_1152836_15.mp4.ja: レオナードさん御職業は？
polysemy_1152836_15.mp4.en: And what do you do for a living, Leonard?

polysemy_1152836_16.mp4.ja: では夕食を楽しんでくださいマクヘンリーさん
polysemy_1152836_16.mp4.en: Well, you enjoy the rest of your dinner, Mr. McHenry.

polysemy_1152836_17.mp4.ja: 私が築き上げた物を理解してるはずだ
polysemy_1152836_17.mp4.en: I thought you understood what I'm building.

polysemy_1152836_18.mp4.ja: 若いプロの近代的な能力が最良なのだ
polysemy_1152836_18.mp4.en: A modern force of professional young men of the best sort.

polysemy_1152836_19.mp4.ja: この仕事を辞退します
polysemy_1152836_19.mp4.en: I would have to resign this appointment.

polysemy_1152836_21.mp4.ja: そして彼らは何もせずに立ち去った
polysemy_1152836_21.mp4.en: And then they just drift away into nothing.

polysemy_1152836_22.mp4.ja: 少しは素質に恵まれてる

polysemy_1152836_23.mp4.ja: 乱暴で愚かな少年だった
polysemy_1152836_23.mp4.en: I was a wild boy, and, well, I was foolish.

polysemy_1152836_24.mp4.ja: 俺は仲間に忠実だし仲間は俺に忠実だ
polysemy_1152836_24.mp4.en: I stick with my pals and my pals stick with me.

polysemy_1152836_25.mp4.ja: アルビン・カーピスが君を勧めた
polysemy_1152836_25.mp4.en: You come highly recommended by Alvin Karpis.

polysemy_1152836_26.mp4.ja: 血塗られた怨恨の悪意を感じます！
polysemy_1152836_26.mp4.en: The very air reeks with the bloody rancor of intolerant malice!

polysemy_1152836_27.mp4.ja: 直ちに拘束を解くことを要求します
polysemy_1152836_27.mp4.en: I request the court to direct that those shackles be removed forthwith.

polysemy_1152836_28.mp4.ja: 何か悪い所でも有るのか？
polysemy_1152836_28.mp4.en: What makes you think there's something wrong with it?

polysemy_1152836_29.mp4.ja: この猿に国の金を費やす必要はない
polysemy_1152836_29.mp4.en: Then there's no need to throw away the State's money on this mockery.

polysemy_1152836_30.mp4.ja: ボブとはお互い尊敬し合ってます
polysemy_1152836_30.mp4.en: Bob and I respect each other very much.

polysemy_1152836_32.mp4.ja: 情報提供者は作り出すものだ

polysemy_1152836_33.mp4.ja: ジョン俺たちは仲良くやらなきゃ仕事が出来なくなる
polysemy_1152836_33.mp4.en: John, we gotta all be friends, all right, or this ain't gonna work.

polysemy_1152836_34.mp4.ja: 「自暴自棄な奴とも仕事をしない」
polysemy_1152836_34.mp4.en: " and you don't work when you're desperate."

polysemy_1152836_35.mp4.ja: ネルソンとは手を切る
polysemy_1152836_35.mp4.en: We gotta cut loose from Nelson.

polysemy_1152836_36.mp4.ja: 隠れ家を教えれば打ってやる
polysemy_1152836_36.mp4.en: I'll give you the shot if you tell me where the gang's holed up.

polysemy_1152836_37.mp4.ja: お前は誰も見捨てない

polysemy_1152836_38.mp4.ja: 止めて逃げることも出来る
polysemy_1152836_38.mp4.en: We could go away on it.

polysemy_1152836_39.mp4.ja: いいか自分のした事を考えろ

polysemy_1152836_40.mp4.ja: あんたは彼の居場所を知りたがった愚か者よ
polysemy_1152836_40.mp4.en: You wanted to know where he is, you dumb flatfoot.

polysemy_1152836_42.mp4.ja: ”デンプシー・フィルポで””どんちゃん騒ぎだ”
polysemy_1152836_42.mp4.en: Let's get a load of this Dempsey-Firpo binge, shall we?

polysemy_5350152_0.mp4.ja: 必要なものは何でも,助けるかもしれない何か。
polysemy_5350152_0.mp4.en: Anything you need, anything that might help.

polysemy_5350152_2.mp4.ja: 何もない彼をCTUに直接結びつける。
polysemy_5350152_2.mp4.en: There's nothing that ties him directly to CTU.

polysemy_5350152_3.mp4.ja: だからこそ彼はこの仕事にぴったりです。
polysemy_5350152_3.mp4.en: That's why he's right for this job.

polysemy_5350152_4.mp4.ja: 私はちょうど私の胸からそれを得る必要がありました。
polysemy_5350152_4.mp4.en: I just needed to get that off my chest.

polysemy_5350152_5.mp4.ja: そして彼らがするとき,彼らは私たちはもう必要ないでしょう。
polysemy_5350152_5.mp4.en: And when they do, they ain't gonna need us no more.

polysemy_5350152_6.mp4.ja: あなたは正しい選択をしました。

polysemy_5350152_7.mp4.ja: 長い間,私は彼を非難しました。
polysemy_5350152_7.mp4.en: Like, for a long time I blamed him.

polysemy_5350152_8.mp4.ja: そして彼が終わったら,私は彼を殺すでしょう。
polysemy_5350152_8.mp4.en: And once he's done, I'll kill him.

polysemy_5350152_9.mp4.ja: しかし,あなたはお見逃しなく。

polysemy_5350152_10.mp4.ja: アンディ,あなたはたくさん話しますあなたがストレスを感じているとき。
polysemy_5350152_10.mp4.en: Andy, you talk a lot when you're stressed.

polysemy_5350152_12.mp4.ja: 彼は私の妻と私の兄弟を支配者として。
polysemy_5350152_12.mp4.en: He kidnapped my wife and my brother as leverage.

polysemy_5350152_13.mp4.ja: つまり,私は本当に死ぬことはしません。
polysemy_5350152_13.mp4.en: I mean, I-I really don't want to die.

polysemy_5350152_14.mp4.ja: 彼を結び付ける,アンディ。

polysemy_5350152_15.mp4.ja: うん,きれいだった合併症はない
polysemy_5350152_15.mp4.en: Yeah, it was a clean grab, no complications.

polysemy_5350152_16.mp4.ja: その後,あなたは始めるべきです。

polysemy_5350152_17.mp4.ja: だからこそあなたは仕事をしているのですか？
polysemy_5350152_17.mp4.en: So this is why you're doing the job?

polysemy_5350152_18.mp4.ja: もし誰かがチップを修正できれば,彼はすることができます。
polysemy_5350152_18.mp4.en: If anybody can fix the chip, he can.

polysemy_5350152_19.mp4.ja: 私がしなかったと言ってみましょう彼に選択肢を与えなさい。
polysemy_5350152_19.mp4.en: Let's just say I didn't give him a choice.

polysemy_5350152_20.mp4.ja: 私はあなたにGPSを送ります交換のための座標。
polysemy_5350152_20.mp4.en: I'm sending you GPS coordinates for the exchange.

polysemy_5350152_21.mp4.ja: 彼女が大丈夫だという証拠が必要です。
polysemy_5350152_21.mp4.en: I need proof that she's okay.

polysemy_5350152_22.mp4.ja: CTUがあなたを見つけたら,あなた彼らが離れていることを伝えてください。
polysemy_5350152_22.mp4.en: When CTU finds you, you better tell them to stay away.

polysemy_5350152_25.mp4.ja: NYPDが取り組んでいるトンネルを閉鎖した。
polysemy_5350152_25.mp4.en: NYPD's working on closing down the tunnels.

polysemy_5350152_26.mp4.ja: 私たちは私たちが私たちが彼の外に出すことができるすべて。
polysemy_5350152_26.mp4.en: We determined we'd gotten everything we could out of him.

polysemy_5350152_27.mp4.ja: 私のオフィスで話しましょう。
polysemy_5350152_27.mp4.en: Let's, uh, talk in my office.

polysemy_5350152_29.mp4.ja: 私たちはこれを終える必要があります人の会話。
polysemy_5350152_29.mp4.en: We need to finish this conversation in person.

polysemy_5207746_0.mp4.ja: 取引相手でも友人でもない
polysemy_5207746_0.mp4.en: We aren't trade partners, we aren't friends.

polysemy_5207746_4.mp4.en: And I owe my life to you all, twice over.

polysemy_5207746_5.mp4.ja: 決心できたから導いて
polysemy_5207746_5.mp4.en: Well, Enid says you could show us the way.

polysemy_5207746_7.mp4.ja: 他のグループも必要だ
polysemy_5207746_7.mp4.en: We need more hands, another group.

polysemy_5207746_8.mp4.en: We can listen in, keep track of them.

polysemy_5207746_9.mp4.en: How long do you think that's gonna last?

polysemy_5207754_0.mp4.en: Did it work the other way around?

polysemy_5207754_1.mp4.ja: 丸め込まれちまったか

polysemy_5207754_2.mp4.ja: ユージーン博士面白いものを見せてね
polysemy_5207754_2.mp4.en: Dr. Eugene, can you please just show us some good shit?

polysemy_5655178_0.mp4.ja: 生き残りたければ手を組むべきだ
polysemy_5655178_0.mp4.en: We must be allies now, if we wish to survive.

polysemy_5655178_2.mp4.ja: 治療方法を見つけなさい
polysemy_5655178_2.mp4.en: I command you to find the cure.

polysemy_5655178_3.mp4.ja: 女性の心を掴む確実な方法は贈り物だ
polysemy_5655178_3.mp4.en: The surest way to a woman's heart is with a gift.

polysemy_5655178_4.mp4.ja: それを得るまでキングズランディングには戻らない
polysemy_5655178_4.mp4.en: I won't return to King's Landing until I have that for you.

polysemy_5655178_6.mp4.ja: 故郷という気がしない

polysemy_5655178_7.mp4.ja: サーシーは七王国の半分も統べていません
polysemy_5655178_7.mp4.en: Cersei controls fewer than half the Seven Kingdoms.

polysemy_5655178_8.mp4.ja: ウェストロスの諸侯は彼女を軽蔑している
polysemy_5655178_8.mp4.en: The lords of Westeros despise her.

polysemy_5655178_9.mp4.ja: 陛下の到着を待つまでもなく反乱が起きかねない
polysemy_5655178_9.mp4.en: Even before your arrival, they plotted against her.

polysemy_5655178_12.mp4.ja: 優しくレバー引いていただければ
polysemy_5655178_12.mp4.en: If you'll kindly pull that lever.

polysemy_5655178_13.mp4.ja: ティリオン公は女王の手だ
polysemy_5655178_13.mp4.en: Lord Tyrion is Hand of the Queen.

polysemy_5655178_14.mp4.ja: しかしあなた方は私に付く事を選んだ
polysemy_5655178_14.mp4.en: But you have chosen to follow me.

polysemy_5655178_15.mp4.ja: グレイ・ワームとアンサリードがロックを押さえる
polysemy_5655178_15.mp4.en: Grey Worm and the Unsullied will sail for the Rock and take it.

polysemy_5655178_16.mp4.ja: オレナ夫人二人だけでお話を？
polysemy_5655178_16.mp4.en: Lady Olenna, may I speak with you alone?

polysemy_5655178_18.mp4.ja: 割って入ってくるのね

polysemy_6261068_0.mp4.ja: 俺も貧乏くじを引いた
polysemy_6261068_0.mp4.en: Lavender wasn't the only one holding the shitty end of the stick.

polysemy_6261068_1.mp4.ja: 海賊版の在庫を燃やすだけでなく
polysemy_6261068_1.mp4.en: So, not only did I have to torch the entire fucking pirate ET stock,

polysemy_1393554_0.mp4.ja: ちょっと不機嫌なのはパパがポニーを買ってくれなかったから？
polysemy_1393554_0.mp4.en: A little grumpy' cause daddy didn't buy you a pony?

polysemy_1393554_1.mp4.ja: ああ大雨が降って山には１０センチ雪が積った
polysemy_1393554_1.mp4.en: Yeah, a lot of rain. 4 inchespof snow up in the mountains.

polysemy_1393554_2.mp4.ja: 川の水位が上がればこの場所は水の中だわ
polysemy_1393554_2.mp4.en: When the river rises, this spot must be underwater.

polysemy_1393554_3.mp4.ja: 安い賞品として配られてる
polysemy_1393554_3.mp4.en: They give' em away as cheap prizes.

polysemy_1393554_4.mp4.ja: ゲームセンターを見つければ情報が得られる
polysemy_1393554_4.mp4.en: We find the arcade, we find the information.

polysemy_1393554_5.mp4.ja: 君の態度に少し不機嫌さが混じってる気がするんだけど
polysemy_1393554_5.mp4.en: Uh, do I detect a slight residue of grumpiness in your demeanor?

polysemy_1393554_6.mp4.ja: 本当だよリズボン君へのプレゼントは発送中なんだ
polysemy_1393554_6.mp4.en: I swear to you, Lisbon, your gift is on its way.

polysemy_1393554_7.mp4.ja: 私機嫌悪くないわあなたの想像上のプレゼントのことなんて気にしてない
polysemy_1393554_7.mp4.en: Uh, I'm not grumpy, and i don't give a damn about your supposed gift.

polysemy_1393554_8.mp4.ja: 正確に言うとここでの彼の仕事は？
polysemy_1393554_8.mp4.en: And what was his position here, exactly?

polysemy_1393554_9.mp4.ja: 君たちこれがどんなふうに終わるのか見たくない？
polysemy_1393554_9.mp4.en: You want to see how it's supposed to be done?

polysemy_1393554_10.mp4.ja: それって「公共交通機関をぶっ壊せ」って言ってるようなもんだ
polysemy_1393554_10.mp4.en: It's like saying," screw the public transport system."

polysemy_1393554_11.mp4.ja: 人に干渉しない金も貸してくれる
polysemy_1393554_11.mp4.en: Or you could borrow money from him.

polysemy_1393554_12.mp4.ja: 奴はどんな無礼な行動も許さない
polysemy_1393554_12.mp4.en: He won't tolerate any kind of diss.

polysemy_1393554_13.mp4.ja: いつもフランス語か何かでののしったり仕事したりしてる
polysemy_1393554_13.mp4.en: He cusses him out in French or something and goes about his business.

polysemy_1393554_15.mp4.ja: とりあえずみんな安心出来るわ
polysemy_1393554_15.mp4.en: In the meantime, we'll all relax.

polysemy_1393554_16.mp4.ja: ベルが鳴ったので駆けつけたんだ
polysemy_1393554_16.mp4.en: You know, we hear the bell, come running.

polysemy_1393554_17.mp4.ja: 悪く思わないでくれよ

polysemy_1393554_19.mp4.ja: あなた達の保護下にあるのに彼が行方不明なのを知らなかったの？
polysemy_1393554_19.mp4.en: You didn't know he was missing, and he was under your protection?

polysemy_1393554_20.mp4.ja: 彼はバタリヤ・ファミリーの違法ギャンブルの仕事をしてて
polysemy_1393554_20.mp4.en: He ran numbers for the Battaglia family ...

polysemy_1393554_21.mp4.ja: それでロッソと妻は証人保護プログラムで我々の監督下ここに移って来たんだ
polysemy_1393554_21.mp4.en: Russo and his wife moved down here under our supervision with the witness relocation program.

polysemy_1393554_22.mp4.ja: であなた達はここで何が起きたと考えてるの？

polysemy_3922818_1.mp4.ja: 骨はもろく大きすぎる
polysemy_3922818_1.mp4.en: Bones will be brittle, probably oversized.

polysemy_3922818_2.mp4.ja: 隠さなければ全責任を負うことになる
polysemy_3922818_2.mp4.en: Unless we don't cover up, we take full responsibility.

polysemy_3922818_3.mp4.ja: そのリスクを抱えていればどうなるというんだ？
polysemy_3922818_3.mp4.en: And what if I'm willing to take that risk?

polysemy_3922818_4.mp4.ja: 子供はまだ間違いを起こさないだろう
polysemy_3922818_4.mp4.en: The child wouldn't even make the trip.

polysemy_3922818_5.mp4.ja: 子供は秘密にしておくの？

polysemy_3922818_6.mp4.ja: 車を持ってきましょうかシェパードさん？
polysemy_3922818_6.mp4.en: Can I bring your car around, Mr. Shepherd?

polysemy_3922818_8.mp4.ja: コロニー52ブラボー自動エアロックまで報告してください
polysemy_3922818_8.mp4.en: Colony 52 Bravo, report to the automatic air lock.

polysemy_3922818_9.mp4.ja: スイッチを入れたらどう
polysemy_3922818_9.mp4.en: Works better if you turn it on.

polysemy_3922818_10.mp4.en: Are you checking up on me?

polysemy_3922818_14.mp4.ja: サンダーズ農場の手入れをしなきゃ
polysemy_3922818_14.mp4.en: You gotta do the Sanders farm.

polysemy_3922818_15.mp4.ja: 命があって良かったわ！
polysemy_3922818_15.mp4.en: Good to know what my life's worth to ya!

polysemy_3922818_16.mp4.ja: どうやって電子ロックを破ったの？
polysemy_3922818_16.mp4.en: How did you get past the electronic lock?

polysemy_3922818_17.mp4.ja: 彼女の灰は太平洋に撒かれた
polysemy_3922818_17.mp4.en: Her ashes were spread across the Pacific Ocean.

polysemy_3922818_18.mp4.ja: シェパードさんは彼の賢さを分かってません
polysemy_3922818_18.mp4.en: Mr. Shepherd, you have no idea how smart he is.

polysemy_3922818_19.mp4.ja: 彼は接続を拒否しています

polysemy_3922818_20.mp4.ja: ミス・ウィンダム君の気遣いに感動した
polysemy_3922818_20.mp4.en: Miss Wyndham, I'm touched by your concern, I really am.

polysemy_3922818_21.mp4.ja: だが彼が生き残れなければ何の意味もない
polysemy_3922818_21.mp4.en: But none of this matters if he can't survive.

polysemy_3922818_22.mp4.ja: 彼らが治療法を見つけたみたいだ
polysemy_3922818_22.mp4.en: They may have found a cure for my disease.

polysemy_3922818_24.mp4.ja: 母になることよりも追い求めているものがあったの
polysemy_3922818_24.mp4.en: And, uh, motherhood wasn't a dream I was chasing at that time.

polysemy_3922818_25.mp4.ja: そいつはすげえ奴だった

polysemy_3922818_28.mp4.ja: チップはもらえるかい
polysemy_3922818_28.mp4.en: Pay for my wrap and I won't tell.

polysemy_3922818_31.mp4.ja: 君と恋に落ち地球に落ちる
polysemy_3922818_31.mp4.en: I'm gonna fall in love with you and I'll fall to Earth.

polysemy_3922818_32.mp4.ja: ここはにせものでも本当になれるんだ
polysemy_3922818_32.mp4.en: This isn't real, but we can be real.

polysemy_3922818_33.mp4.en: All right, let's buckle you in.

polysemy_3922818_34.mp4.ja: 本気で伝えたいことがあるんだ
polysemy_3922818_34.mp4.en: But the last thing I'm gonna do is actually tell you that.

polysemy_3922818_35.mp4.ja: つまり地球の生活に慣れるのは大変なの
polysemy_3922818_35.mp4.en: I mean, getting re-accustomed to living on this planet's been a little trying.

polysemy_3717490_1.mp4.en: Send the meteor to my coordinates.

polysemy_3717490_2.mp4.ja: 僕を助けてくれたら君は何時間か車乗れるよ
polysemy_3717490_2.mp4.en: And If you decide to help me, you can have the car for a few hours.

polysemy_3717490_3.mp4.ja: ユーモアや皮肉を理解することが僕には出来ないんだ
polysemy_3717490_3.mp4.en: It's just that I can't read humor or sarcasm.

polysemy_3717490_4.mp4.ja: なんで私の名前を叫んでるの？
polysemy_3717490_4.mp4.en: It's strange to hear you say my name.

polysemy_3717490_5.mp4.ja: 俺たちは岩の上でカラテキッドみたいなことしはしてないぜ
polysemy_3717490_5.mp4.en: As in...we shouldn't be standing on a crazy rock doing some Karate kid moves right.

polysemy_3717490_7.mp4.ja: リタは地球を創造し破壊する力をクリスタルから得る
polysemy_3717490_7.mp4.en: With the Crystal, Rita will have the power to create and destroy worlds.

polysemy_3717490_9.mp4.ja: お互いのことを考えろそうすれば変身装置は開かれる
polysemy_3717490_9.mp4.en: Think only of each other and the morphing grid will open to you.

polysemy_3717490_10.mp4.ja: 恐怖が町を覆っています
polysemy_3717490_10.mp4.en: Fear has the town on edge.

polysemy_3717490_12.mp4.ja: 君たちがこの壁を超えて見つけるものは永遠に君たちの人生を変えるよ
polysemy_3717490_12.mp4.en: What you will find beyond this wall will forever change your life.

polysemy_3717490_13.mp4.ja: これが作られた時は恐竜が最強の支配者だったんだ
polysemy_3717490_13.mp4.en: When these Zords formed, dinosaurs reigned supreme.

polysemy_3717490_14.mp4.ja: もし変身できたらアーマーが君たちにゾードを１つ与えると思う
polysemy_3717490_14.mp4.en: When you morph, your armor will make you one with the zords.

polysemy_3717490_15.mp4.ja: この壁から私を解放する方法はないのか？
polysemy_3717490_15.mp4.en: There must be a way to free me from this wall.

polysemy_3717490_17.mp4.ja: 私が美しい生き物を育てるのにとても長くかかったわ
polysemy_3717490_17.mp4.en: It's been too long since I raised my beautiful creatures.

polysemy_3717490_18.mp4.ja: 「お互いのことを考えろそうすれば変身装置は開かれる」
polysemy_3717490_18.mp4.en: " Think only of each other and the morphing' grid will open to you".

polysemy_3717490_19.mp4.ja: 君の最大の秘密はなぜ捕まったかだよ
polysemy_3717490_19.mp4.en: Biggest secret is why're you in detention.

polysemy_3717490_22.mp4.ja: ちがう俺が押し付けたんだ！

polysemy_3717490_25.mp4.ja: 彼女どんだけ出してくるんだ
polysemy_3717490_25.mp4.en: How many of this you need?

polysemy_5207772_0.mp4.ja: 同盟者と手を組まなければ
polysemy_5207772_0.mp4.en: We must seek allies in this endeavor.

polysemy_5207772_6.mp4.ja: 見知らぬグレンを助けた
polysemy_5207772_6.mp4.en: Glenn didn't know you, but he helped you.

polysemy_5350174_2.mp4.ja: まあ、あなたは持っているようですそれだけでうまく住んでいた。
polysemy_5350174_2.mp4.en: Well, you seem to have lived with it just fine.

polysemy_5350174_3.mp4.ja: 私は杉のことを父に伝えます。
polysemy_5350174_3.mp4.en: I'll tell Father about the cedars.

polysemy_5350174_4.mp4.ja: どのくらいの半径がカバーしていますか？
polysemy_5350174_4.mp4.en: How wide a radius does it cover?

polysemy_5350174_5.mp4.ja: 私もそれを持っているから。

polysemy_5350160_0.mp4.ja: どのようにあなたは私の番号を取得しましたか？
polysemy_5350160_0.mp4.en: How the hell did you get my number?

polysemy_5350160_2.mp4.ja: 彼女は前者を募集した彼女を助けるための軍隊レンジャー。
polysemy_5350160_2.mp4.en: She enlisted a former Army Ranger to help her.

polysemy_5350160_4.mp4.ja: テロリストはレベッカを持つかもしれない。

polysemy_5350160_5.mp4.ja: 私は彼女を聞いたと思う、私はあなたにパッチを当てています。
polysemy_5350160_5.mp4.en: I think I heard her, I'm patching you in.

polysemy_5350162_1.mp4.ja: 私はレベッカを得ることができない私の頭からの声。
polysemy_5350162_1.mp4.en: I can't get Rebecca's voice out of my head.

polysemy_5350162_2.mp4.ja: 私は実際に電話しているあなたにヘッドアップを与える。
polysemy_5350162_2.mp4.en: I'm actually calling to give you a heads up.

polysemy_5350162_3.mp4.ja: はい、空きがあります2階にアップ。
polysemy_5350162_3.mp4.en: Yes, we have a vacant one up on the second floor.

polysemy_5350162_4.mp4.ja: 何、私は取るべきですかその中にある種の快適さ？
polysemy_5350162_4.mp4.en: Am I supposed to take some kind of comfort in that?

polysemy_5350162_5.mp4.ja: シェイクは実行を望んでいるそれが起こっている間オンライン。
polysemy_5350162_5.mp4.en: The sheik wants the execution online while it's happening.

polysemy_5350162_6.mp4.ja: 私は衛星を持っていた家でゼロになった。
polysemy_5350162_6.mp4.en: I had the satellite zeroed in on the house.

polysemy_6597090_0.mp4.ja: メリッサが薬を飲んだ
polysemy_6597090_0.mp4.en: Melissa, you just took a pill.

polysemy_6597090_1.mp4.ja: イカれた家族写真を撮りましょ
polysemy_6597090_1.mp4.en: Let's take your dumb-ass family photo.

polysemy_6597090_2.mp4.ja: 集まり頂きありがとうございます

polysemy_6597090_4.mp4.ja: ルイスは皆のために医者を見つけようと命を捧げた
polysemy_6597090_4.mp4.en: Look, Lewis gave his life trying to find a doctor for us.

polysemy_6597090_5.mp4.ja: 双眼鏡と写真を忘れた
polysemy_6597090_5.mp4.en: Oh, left my friggin binoculars and my picture.

polysemy_6597090_6.mp4.ja: どうやって私達に伝えるの？
polysemy_6597090_6.mp4.en: How will you let us know?

polysemy_6597090_7.mp4.en: Okay, I'll make a wind sound.

polysemy_6597090_8.mp4.en: I think he's making his wind sound.

polysemy_6597090_9.mp4.ja: 今曲が頭の中にあるの
polysemy_6597090_9.mp4.en: I got this Thin Lizzy song stuck in my head,

polysemy_6597090_10.mp4.ja: 言う相手を間違えてる
polysemy_6597090_10.mp4.en: You forget who you're dealing with here.

polysemy_6597090_11.mp4.en: But no marbles for them to eat.

polysemy_6597090_12.mp4.ja: 君が読んだ時あっただろ
polysemy_6597090_12.mp4.en: You can take that from someone who's read one.

polysemy_6597090_13.mp4.ja: ここの子供も同じだよ
polysemy_6597090_13.mp4.en: And I don't think this kid wants us messing with his.

polysemy_6597090_14.mp4.ja: 僕たちに去ってもらいたいんだ

polysemy_6597090_18.mp4.ja: 車で行ったのを見ただろ

polysemy_6597090_20.mp4.ja: 僕も以前は君と同じだった！
polysemy_6597090_20.mp4.en: See, not too long ago, I was exactly like you!

polysemy_5775840_1.mp4.ja: 彼に意味のないものを与えることで実を与える
polysemy_5775840_1.mp4.en: Give him something by giving him nothing.

polysemy_5775840_2.mp4.ja: 我々の手が回らない間彼等の手を塞ぐのです
polysemy_5775840_2.mp4.en: Keep him occupied while we focus on the task at hand ...

polysemy_5775840_5.mp4.ja: メイスター・ルウィンの記録を当たってみます

polysemy_5775840_6.mp4.ja: 彼等は胸当てに革を当てるの？
polysemy_5775840_6.mp4.en: Are they covering those breastplates in leather?

polysemy_5775840_7.mp4.ja: どちらか一つが起きる
polysemy_5775840_7.mp4.en: One of two things will happen ...

polysemy_5775840_8.mp4.ja: おぬしへの報酬は城塞都市から追放されないことだ
polysemy_5775840_8.mp4.en: Your reward is not being immediately expelled from the Citadel.

polysemy_5775840_9.mp4.ja: ロックには歓迎されなかった
polysemy_5775840_9.mp4.en: They weren't welcome at the Rock.

polysemy_5775840_11.mp4.ja: 実際はキャストリーロックにそれほどの価値はなかった
polysemy_5775840_11.mp4.en: The truth is Casterly Rock isn't worth much anymore.

polysemy_5775840_12.mp4.ja: だからただ取らせたの？
polysemy_5775840_12.mp4.en: So you just let them take it?

polysemy_5775840_13.mp4.ja: 生皮を剥いで城壁に吊るす
polysemy_5775840_13.mp4.en: Flaying you alive and hanging you from the walls of King's Landing.

polysemy_5273624_1.mp4.en: Let me stoke your fires a little.

polysemy_5273624_2.mp4.ja: 師匠の相手は兄貴じゃねぇぞ
polysemy_5273624_2.mp4.en: That's not Brother Monkey he's embracing.

polysemy_5273624_7.mp4.en: My love abandoned me and fled.

polysemy_5273624_8.mp4.ja: この世の嘘つき化け物どもがその姿を現すことじゃ
polysemy_5273624_8.mp4.en: I want all the world's liars and monsters to show their true colours.

polysemy_5273624_10.mp4.ja: お前は分裂を促し我々は抵抗する
polysemy_5273624_10.mp4.en: Your stratagem is to sow discord, but we have a counter-stratagem.

polysemy_5273624_11.mp4.ja: だが悟空の眼力を見損なったな

polysemy_5273624_12.mp4.ja: お前の正体を暴く仕掛けだ
polysemy_5273624_12.mp4.en: We tricked you into revealing yourself.

polysemy_5273624_14.mp4.ja: 彼女がまだ師匠を悩ましているから時々あんたを彼女と間違える
polysemy_5273624_14.mp4.en: The memory of her still haunts Master so he sometimes takes you for her.

polysemy_947798_0.mp4.ja: 金を得るためだ笑顔を絶やすな
polysemy_947798_0.mp4.en: We need our cash, so please don't forget to smile.

polysemy_947798_1.mp4.en: Could you please turn the lights back on?

polysemy_1245526_3.mp4.ja: モーゼスに潰される・・

polysemy_1628065_0.mp4.ja: 遠くの山までは来なかった
polysemy_1628065_0.mp4.en: They never come this far up the mountain.

polysemy_1628065_1.mp4.ja: 肉を使って料理を作ってくれ

polysemy_1628065_2.mp4.ja: 穏やかに話し合いたい
polysemy_1628065_2.mp4.en: I'd like to have a calm discussion on this topic.

polysemy_1628064_0.mp4.ja: ビルから下に降りる唯一の場所だ
polysemy_1628064_0.mp4.en: It's the only thing in the building that goes down.

polysemy_1628064_1.mp4.ja: 次は安全装置を切っとけよ
polysemy_1628064_1.mp4.en: Next time though, take the safety off.

polysemy_1628064_2.mp4.ja: 頭がガンガンしてくる
polysemy_1628064_2.mp4.en: You're giving me a headache, boy.

polysemy_1628064_3.mp4.ja: そこの道具箱に金鋸があるか見てくれよ
polysemy_1628064_3.mp4.en: Hey, see that hacksaw over there in that toolbag?

polysemy_1628064_4.mp4.ja: こいつをぶった切ってくれ
polysemy_1628064_4.mp4.en: Get me out of these things.

polysemy_1628064_6.mp4.ja: 略奪になっちゃうかしら?

polysemy_1628064_7.mp4.ja: 決して皮膚に触れたり目に入れたりするなよ
polysemy_1628064_7.mp4.en: Don't get any on your skin or in your eyes.

polysemy_5775854_2.mp4.ja: 我々にはタイレルの金があり鉄の銀行の後ろ盾もある
polysemy_5775854_2.mp4.en: We have the Tyrell gold, we have the Iron Bank behind us.

polysemy_5775854_3.mp4.ja: ウェストロスの人はあなた方を尊敬し信頼しています
polysemy_5775854_3.mp4.en: Everyone in Westeros trusts and respects you.

polysemy_5775854_4.mp4.ja: 何かお持ちしましょう

polysemy_5775854_5.mp4.ja: ティリオンは証拠を持ってくると言ってた

polysemy_5775854_6.mp4.ja: 獅子は羊の意見を関知しない
polysemy_5775854_6.mp4.en: The lion does not concern himself with the opinions of the sheep.

polysemy_5775854_7.mp4.ja: 陛下のお父上にも店で会いました
polysemy_5775854_7.mp4.en: I met yours in my shop.

polysemy_5775854_8.mp4.ja: 彼等の物語を聞いて育った
polysemy_5775854_8.mp4.en: I grew up on stories about them.

polysemy_5775854_9.mp4.ja: 私が聞いたのは一緒に戦って勝ったということです
polysemy_5775854_9.mp4.en: All I ever knew is that they fought together and won.

polysemy_5775854_10.mp4.ja: ダヴォス卿から話は聞いています
polysemy_5775854_10.mp4.en: Ser Davos told me where you're going, Your Grace, and why.

polysemy_5775854_12.mp4.ja: あなたには命を救われた

polysemy_5775854_15.mp4.ja: 今頃は別れの言葉をかわしているべきだ
polysemy_5775854_15.mp4.en: We should be better at saying farewell by now.

polysemy_5775854_16.mp4.ja: メイナード司祭は全て記録したの
polysemy_5775854_16.mp4.en: This High Septon Maynard, he recorded everything.

polysemy_5775854_17.mp4.ja: 自分の内臓の動きまで記録している
polysemy_5775854_17.mp4.en: He even recorded his own bowel movements.

polysemy_5775854_18.mp4.ja: メイナード司祭は”ラッガー”王子の離婚を取り行い
polysemy_5775854_18.mp4.en: Maynard says here that he issued an annulment for a Prince" Ragger"

polysemy_5775854_19.mp4.ja: 別の女性とドーンで秘密裏に再婚した
polysemy_5775854_19.mp4.en: and remarried him to someone else at the same time in a secret ceremony in Dorne.

polysemy_5775854_20.mp4.en: Is that a common thing in the south or ...?

polysemy_5775854_21.mp4.ja: その数字は階段の段数

polysemy_5775854_22.mp4.ja: 自分より優れた人物の話を読むのに疲れた
polysemy_5775854_22.mp4.en: I'm tired of reading about the achievements of better men.

polysemy_5775854_23.mp4.ja: 他に写しなどはないな？
polysemy_5775854_23.mp4.en: You're sure this is the only copy in Winterfell?

polysemy_5775854_24.mp4.ja: その仕事は失敗続きだ
polysemy_5775854_24.mp4.en: I've been failing at that job of late.

polysemy_5775854_26.mp4.ja: お前達の助けを借りたい
polysemy_5775854_26.mp4.en: We were hoping some of your men could help.

polysemy_5775854_27.mp4.ja: 斥候が壁の南一マイルのところで見つけた
polysemy_5775854_27.mp4.en: My scouts found them a mile south of the Wall.

polysemy_5775854_28.mp4.ja: あいつらの誰も信用するな

polysemy_5775854_30.mp4.ja: 奴は動物のように俺らを狩った

polysemy_5775854_31.mp4.ja: 仕返しはしたと聞いたが？
polysemy_5775854_31.mp4.en: You returned the favor, as I recall.

polysemy_5775854_32.mp4.ja: 歩くのは我々であるが実は光の主が・・・
polysemy_5775854_32.mp4.en: We may take the steps, but the Lord of Light ...

polysemy_4630562_0.mp4.ja: ドミニク・トレット噂は聞いている
polysemy_4630562_0.mp4.en: Dominic Toretto, I heard about you

polysemy_4630562_1.mp4.en: It ain't the motor, take it off

polysemy_4630562_2.mp4.ja: 相手を上がらせるなマークしろ
polysemy_4630562_2.mp4.en: You can't let her run by you like that

polysemy_4630562_3.mp4.ja: それを認めればこの件は収束する
polysemy_4630562_3.mp4.en: You do that, we close the case

polysemy_4630562_4.mp4.ja: これが友人に対する扱い？
polysemy_4630562_4.mp4.en: This is how you treat old friends?

polysemy_4630562_6.mp4.ja: 先導車両と追尾車両も排除
polysemy_4630562_6.mp4.en: Take out the lead and follow cars

polysemy_4630562_8.mp4.ja: あなたのした選択は彼女を見逃すこと
polysemy_4630562_8.mp4.en: You made the choice to let her go

polysemy_4630562_9.mp4.ja: これはその結果よドム

polysemy_4630562_10.mp4.ja: 受け入れなくてもいい
polysemy_4630562_10.mp4.en: You don't have to accept it

polysemy_4630562_12.mp4.ja: 私のチームを２つ潰しておいて何も起こらないと

polysemy_3387542_2.mp4.ja: 発見した遺体はここで保管します
polysemy_3387542_2.mp4.en: Keep the bodies here when we find.

polysemy_3387542_3.mp4.en: If bodies alone, the spirit scream all night.

polysemy_3387542_8.mp4.ja: 彼女は自分の悪魔と戦ってると思うの
polysemy_3387542_8.mp4.en: I think she's struggling with her demons.

polysemy_3387542_9.mp4.ja: 時には再び戻って来る者もいる
polysemy_3387542_9.mp4.en: Sometimes they come back out again.

polysemy_3387542_10.mp4.ja: 明日記事を書くために公園自然監視員と行くから
polysemy_3387542_10.mp4.en: I have clearance to go with the park nature guard tomorrow for my article.

polysemy_3387542_11.mp4.ja: 彼は数日ごとに行く自殺監視員みたいに
polysemy_3387542_11.mp4.en: He goes on rounds every few days, kinda like a suicide watch.

polysemy_3387542_13.mp4.ja: そして君は彼女と神秘的な繋がりを持ってると信じてる
polysemy_3387542_13.mp4.en: And you believe she's okay because you have this kind of mystical twin connection.

polysemy_3387542_14.mp4.ja: 何かがあると相手に伝わるの
polysemy_3387542_14.mp4.en: It's just when something happens to one of us, the other one can tell.

polysemy_3387542_15.mp4.ja: いつも私が彼女を助けるんだけれどでも...
polysemy_3387542_15.mp4.en: I mean, usually it's something happening to her and me coming to bail her out, but ...

polysemy_3387542_16.mp4.ja: ご両親に何があったか聞いても気にしないかい？
polysemy_3387542_16.mp4.en: Do you mind if I ask what happened to your parents?

polysemy_3387542_17.mp4.ja: 撃った後ターンして走っていった
polysemy_3387542_17.mp4.en: Hit them right as they turned into the driveway.

polysemy_3387542_18.mp4.en: Jess told me later their bodies were right there on the lawn.

polysemy_3387542_19.mp4.ja: 私は目を閉じてたけど彼女はそれをすべて見たの
polysemy_3387542_19.mp4.en: I kept my eyes closed, but she saw it all.

polysemy_3387542_20.mp4.en: But you going into this forest alone, it sounds really dangerous.

polysemy_3387542_21.mp4.en: Michi does these suicide watch hikes off the books.

polysemy_3387542_24.mp4.ja: 人々は時々森の中で色んなことを見るけど
polysemy_3387542_24.mp4.en: People sometimes see things in the forest.

polysemy_3387542_25.mp4.en: If you bring a tent, you're not sure.

polysemy_3387542_26.mp4.ja: 彼女が消えた森をどう感じる？

polysemy_3387542_28.mp4.ja: 遊歩道から数時間経った
polysemy_3387542_28.mp4.en: We're several hours from the trail.

polysemy_5595168_0.mp4.en: Lucis, a peaceful kingdom of great magic kept safe by the power of the crystal.

polysemy_5595168_1.mp4.en: Long has war raged between the two.

polysemy_5595168_2.mp4.ja: 彼は父親、キングレジスと一緒に長い旅をしました。
polysemy_5595168_2.mp4.en: He made the long journey together with his father, King Regis.

polysemy_5595168_5.mp4.ja: ニヴルヘイム攻撃は訪問ルシアン王族の生活に試みでした。
polysemy_5595168_5.mp4.en: The Niflheim attack was an attempt on the lives of the visiting Lucian royalty.

polysemy_5595168_7.mp4.ja: キングレジスは、帝国の脅威に対抗するために強大な戦士の力を組み立てます。
polysemy_5595168_7.mp4.en: King Regis assembles a force of mighty warriors to combat the imperial menace.

polysemy_5595168_9.mp4.ja: Pelnaは、フォールバックし、他の人と再編成します。
polysemy_5595168_9.mp4.en: Pelna, fall back and regroup with the others.

polysemy_5595168_10.mp4.ja: マジック、ヒーローに簡単に移動します。
polysemy_5595168_10.mp4.en: Go easy on the magic, hero.

polysemy_5595168_11.mp4.ja: 私は待つだけの価値です。

polysemy_5595168_12.mp4.ja: 私はこのがらくたのための胃を持っていません知っています。
polysemy_5595168_12.mp4.en: You know I ain't got the stomach for this crap.

polysemy_5595168_13.mp4.ja: 帝国軍は、先生を引き出すことがために見て。
polysemy_5595168_13.mp4.en: The imperial forces look to be withdrawing, sir.

polysemy_5595168_14.mp4.ja: 限り、私は私の体に力を得たように、私はその命令に従います。
polysemy_5595168_14.mp4.en: As long as I got strength in my body, I obey that order.

polysemy_5595168_15.mp4.ja: あなたが持っているどのような強王からの融資です。
polysemy_5595168_15.mp4.en: Whatever strength you have is on loan from the king.

polysemy_5595168_16.mp4.ja: あなたが持っているどのような強王からの融資です。
polysemy_5595168_16.mp4.en: Whatever strength you have is on loan from the king.

polysemy_5595168_17.mp4.ja: ねえ、それは簡単、大きな男を取ります。
polysemy_5595168_17.mp4.en: Hey, take it easy, big guy.

polysemy_4190530_2.mp4.ja: 多分見せかけの希望さ
polysemy_4190530_2.mp4.en: Maybe there's hope in the pretense.

polysemy_4190530_3.mp4.ja: 修理工が毎日出勤時にその日の予定を落としていく
polysemy_4190530_3.mp4.en: The repairman could drop off the timetable every day before work.

polysemy_6123962_0.mp4.ja: ちょっと触ってわかるかな、
polysemy_6123962_0.mp4.en: I don't know if you know this but ...

polysemy_4680182_1.mp4.ja: しっかり拭き取っとけ

polysemy_4680182_2.mp4.ja: 「仕事見つけて自立できる」なら
polysemy_4680182_2.mp4.en: Except find a job and take care of myself, right?

polysemy_4680182_3.mp4.ja: ビールを出し代金をもらうところから...
polysemy_4680182_3.mp4.en: You get your friends to buy you beers, cause they have money.

polysemy_4680182_4.mp4.ja: せっかく来たし構わん
polysemy_4680182_4.mp4.en: I am here, I don't mind.

polysemy_4680182_5.mp4.en: No, I mean, it's as worthy job as anything else.

polysemy_4680182_6.mp4.ja: オレが今ここに立ちキミに尻を見せる
polysemy_4680182_6.mp4.en: Imagine I were to stand up right here and show you my ass.

polysemy_5595026_0.mp4.en: Did you give yourself a little haircut there?

polysemy_6134630_1.mp4.en: Can you imagine indoor plumbing again?

polysemy_4699978_0.mp4.ja: でも結果は知ってるよな
polysemy_4699978_0.mp4.en: We both know how that ended.

polysemy_4699978_1.mp4.ja: FBIから仕事を依頼された

polysemy_4699978_2.mp4.ja: 過去を逃れることなんて出来ない
polysemy_4699978_2.mp4.en: There's no such thing as a clean slate.

polysemy_4699978_3.mp4.ja: その前も数十人の犠牲者が...

polysemy_4699978_4.mp4.ja: 昔のあなたの射撃の腕は知ってる
polysemy_4699978_4.mp4.en: I saw you shoot at Quantico.

polysemy_4699978_5.mp4.ja: でも人から命令されると別だ
polysemy_4699978_5.mp4.en: And yet I can do it when someone makes me do it.

polysemy_4699978_6.mp4.ja: イライアスの言った事は本当だった

polysemy_4699978_9.mp4.ja: ただ違う意味で君を救える

polysemy_4699978_10.mp4.ja: ちょっと聞きたい事が...

polysemy_4699978_11.mp4.ja: それに弁護側が手強い場合容疑者と話もできない
polysemy_4699978_11.mp4.en: When you work an airtight case, you don't even talk to the suspects.

polysemy_4699978_12.mp4.ja: 罪状を認めた場合も弁護士が相手だ
polysemy_4699978_12.mp4.en: You talk to their lawyers when they plead out.

polysemy_4699978_13.mp4.ja: シカゴでも同じことが？
polysemy_4699978_13.mp4.en: Is that what happened in Chicago?

polysemy_4699978_15.mp4.ja: まだ詳しい話を聞かされてないわ
polysemy_4699978_15.mp4.en: I never got the full story from either of you.

polysemy_4699978_16.mp4.ja: ある武装集団がターゲットだった
polysemy_4699978_16.mp4.en: Yeah, well, we were working a militia group.

polysemy_4699978_17.mp4.en: So no one got hurt in this raid?

polysemy_4699978_18.mp4.ja: 仕事が続けられて良かったですね
polysemy_4699978_18.mp4.en: Oh, um, I'm glad you kept your job.

polysemy_4699978_19.mp4.ja: 仲間の捜査官と意見が違うと？
polysemy_4699978_19.mp4.en: So you're contradicting your fellow agent?

polysemy_4699978_21.mp4.ja: 私の命を奪う事で自分は解放されると？
polysemy_4699978_21.mp4.en: So you think taking my life is gonna set you free?

polysemy_4699978_22.mp4.ja: 毎朝銃口をくわえる時と同じ
polysemy_4699978_22.mp4.en: Just like you would have done to yourself.

polysemy_4699978_23.mp4.ja: あなたは出口が欲しいんじゃない
polysemy_4699978_23.mp4.en: You don't just want a way out.

polysemy_4699978_24.mp4.ja: 過去の事はやり直せない

polysemy_4699978_25.mp4.ja: 捜査の仕事は暇だもの
polysemy_4699978_25.mp4.en: It's not like I have a heavy case load.

polysemy_4699978_27.mp4.ja: 私とミランダの件なら素直に聞けばいいわ
polysemy_4699978_27.mp4.en: Why don't you just ask me what happened between me and Miranda?

polysemy_4699978_28.mp4.ja: この話は私の部屋でやろう
polysemy_4699978_28.mp4.en: We can discuss this in my office.

polysemy_4699978_29.mp4.ja: 流れがつかめてるかどうかチェックしてくれ
polysemy_4699978_29.mp4.en: Maybe you can tell me if I have all the pieces now, though, okay?

polysemy_4699978_30.mp4.ja: シカゴ警察が強盗を駅まで追い詰めた
polysemy_4699978_30.mp4.en: Chicago P.D. stops an armed robbery on the" L" train.

polysemy_4699978_31.mp4.ja: ペラレス話がそれてるわ
polysemy_4699978_31.mp4.en: Mr. Perales, you are way out of line.

polysemy_4699978_32.mp4.ja: シカゴで起こった事は悲劇だった
polysemy_4699978_32.mp4.en: What happened in Chicago was a tragedy.

polysemy_4699978_33.mp4.ja: 自分からNFLに入ったのに訴訟を起こしたな
polysemy_4699978_33.mp4.en: Suing the NFL when no one forced you to play football.

polysemy_4699978_34.mp4.ja: 数百万ドルの契約金を進んで得たくせに
polysemy_4699978_34.mp4.en: No one made you take a multi-million-dollar contract.

polysemy_4699978_36.mp4.ja: 証言台で嘘はつけない
polysemy_4699978_36.mp4.en: I'm not gonna lie on the stand.

polysemy_4699978_37.mp4.ja: 万事円満に解決すべきなんて子供の考えよ
polysemy_4699978_37.mp4.en: Only a child thinks everything is going to work out.

polysemy_4699978_38.mp4.ja: アカデミーでは彼に冷たかったのに
polysemy_4699978_38.mp4.en: You had it out for him at Quantico.

polysemy_4699978_39.mp4.ja: その人は可愛くて面白くてちょっと間が抜けてる
polysemy_4699978_39.mp4.en: She was sweet and funny and a little goofy.

polysemy_3658014_0.mp4.ja: 夫である国王が心配されている

polysemy_3658014_2.mp4.ja: ご飯を持ってきたわけではない
polysemy_3658014_2.mp4.en: We're not here to feed you.

polysemy_3658014_3.mp4.ja: 私の小鳥たちは既に翼を広げた
polysemy_3658014_3.mp4.en: My little birds have already taken wing.

polysemy_3658014_4.mp4.ja: ウェストロスに旅立つまでにはまだかかりそうだ
polysemy_3658014_4.mp4.en: Well, we won't be sailing to Westeros anytime soon.

polysemy_3658014_5.mp4.ja: 他にヒツジの角を溶かせるやつがいるか
polysemy_3658014_5.mp4.en: Don't know anything else that can melt a ram's horn.

polysemy_3658014_6.mp4.en: Perhaps she's tired of being queen.

polysemy_4786282_1.mp4.ja: だから彼女の為に光を避けてるの
polysemy_4786282_1.mp4.en: As long as I keep my head clear and you keep the lights out.

polysemy_4786282_2.mp4.ja: そんな話し聞いてないぞ
polysemy_4786282_2.mp4.en: You just never talked about it, is all.

polysemy_4786282_5.mp4.ja: 全体の話が狂って聞こえます
polysemy_4786282_5.mp4.en: I know, this all sounds a little crazy.

polysemy_4786282_8.mp4.ja: それ長く持たないんだ

polysemy_2660888_1.mp4.en: You know, in case you got displaced.

polysemy_2660888_2.mp4.en: I am detecting a weary trace of mount of vokaya.

polysemy_4172430_1.mp4.en: Yeah, those guys usually don't hold a grudge.

polysemy_3691740_2.mp4.en: Those giants, they'd swallow you up like a piece of frumpkin fry.

polysemy_3691740_3.mp4.ja: もし巨人が来るなら私の命はあなたの手の中よ
polysemy_3691740_3.mp4.en: Flesh Head, he'll come and eat me, my blood will be on your hands.

polysemy_4283074_0.mp4.ja: 誰が包囲線を超えて城に入る許可を出した？
polysemy_4283074_0.mp4.en: Who gave you permission to cross the siege line and enter the castle?

polysemy_4283074_2.mp4.en: The Lannister, outraged, shoves the cup aside and demands another.

polysemy_4283074_4.mp4.ja: キャストリー・ロックでの快適な生活
polysemy_4283074_4.mp4.en: Comfortable rooms for you at Casterly Rock.

polysemy_2119532_0.mp4.ja: 聞くよどっさりと真心込めて
polysemy_2119532_0.mp4.en: Well, I'm asking you, with all my heart and then some.

polysemy_2119532_1.mp4.ja: 何か変な物が付いてるな二等兵
polysemy_2119532_1.mp4.en: There's something off in your presentation, private.

polysemy_2119532_3.mp4.ja: 沖縄が落ちれば日本が落ちる
polysemy_2119532_3.mp4.en: We get okinawa, we take Japan.

polysemy_918940_0.mp4.ja: そしてあなたはダイヤモンドを持つことになる
polysemy_918940_0.mp4.en: And you shall have your diamonds.

polysemy_918940_2.mp4.ja: レオポルド国王はコンゴを支配してます

polysemy_918940_3.mp4.ja: あなたへの招待状は女王陛下の政府を取り込む絶好の機会です
polysemy_918940_3.mp4.en: Your invitation is a perfect opportunity for her majesty's government to get involve.

polysemy_918940_4.mp4.ja: 私たちが作成したコンゴの貧しい先住民の雇用を考えて下さい
polysemy_918940_4.mp4.en: Consider the jobs we would create for the poor natives of the Congo.

polysemy_918940_6.mp4.ja: 女王の特使に加わってほしい
polysemy_918940_6.mp4.en: Join up with the Queen's emissary.

polysemy_918940_7.mp4.en: You know, America was the first country to recognize King Leopold's claim on Congo.

polysemy_918940_10.mp4.ja: 私が間違っていることを願うしかし私は知る必要がある
polysemy_918940_10.mp4.en: I hope I'm wrong, but I need to know.

polysemy_918940_12.mp4.ja: レオポルドの招待を受け入れてあなたと一緒に私も行く
polysemy_918940_12.mp4.en: Accept Leopold's invitation and take me with you.

polysemy_918940_13.mp4.ja: 私は守るためにできること全てをやった
polysemy_918940_13.mp4.en: I've done all I can to protect them.

polysemy_918940_14.mp4.ja: 私たちは難破以来捕食動物に囲まれている
polysemy_918940_14.mp4.en: We have been surrounded by predators since the shipwreck.

polysemy_918940_15.mp4.ja: それは古いもの病人負傷者弱いものを餌食にする
polysemy_918940_15.mp4.en: It preys on the old, the sick, the wounded, the weak.

polysemy_918940_16.mp4.ja: 今日私はアリスを埋めた

polysemy_918940_19.mp4.ja: 上の階に行くときのように

polysemy_918940_20.mp4.ja: いつもはカーテンを取る

polysemy_918940_22.mp4.ja: 外交官はどれくらいのコルセットを持ってきますか？
polysemy_918940_22.mp4.en: How many corsets does a diplomat bring?

polysemy_918940_23.mp4.ja: それが君の今までで最も大きなストレスだ
polysemy_918940_23.mp4.en: The last thing you need is more stress.

polysemy_918940_24.mp4.ja: 君はグレイストークの相続人であり私たちの未来だ
polysemy_918940_24.mp4.en: You are the heir to Greystoke, our future.

polysemy_918940_25.mp4.ja: 実際のところ彼らは流行遅れだ
polysemy_918940_25.mp4.en: As a matter of fact, that's why they went out of style.

polysemy_918940_26.mp4.ja: あなたのような美しい女性がこんな険しいところを
polysemy_918940_26.mp4.en: Pretty little ladies like you kept knocking themselves in the face with it.

polysemy_918940_27.mp4.ja: 彼はあなたからうまく逃げた

polysemy_918940_28.mp4.ja: あなたは何かを求める立場じゃないロムさん
polysemy_918940_28.mp4.en: You are not in position to ask for anything, Mr. Rom.

polysemy_918940_29.mp4.ja: あなたの王の支払いは3ヶ月前の予定だった
polysemy_918940_29.mp4.en: Your king's payment was due 3 months ago.

polysemy_918940_30.mp4.ja: 私に残りを持ってきてくださいそしてあなたには傭兵がいます
polysemy_918940_30.mp4.en: Bring me the rest and you'll have your mercenaries.

polysemy_918940_31.mp4.ja: 彼女の父は村の中で英語を教えてた
polysemy_918940_31.mp4.en: Her father taught English in the village.

polysemy_4575388_1.mp4.ja: 生かす価値がありそうだ
polysemy_4575388_1.mp4.en: But you seem like reasonable people.

polysemy_4575388_2.mp4.ja: 殺した奴の仲間と相乗りするとはな
polysemy_4575388_2.mp4.en: I mean, do you know how awkward it is carpooling with someone whose friend or friends you've just killed?

polysemy_4575388_3.mp4.en: Let's get you fixed up at home.

polysemy_4575388_4.mp4.ja: 彼に連れ去られたのね

polysemy_4575388_5.mp4.ja: エイデンやヒースは何か見落としたかも
polysemy_4575388_5.mp4.en: Depends if it was Aiden or Heath's group who went through it.

polysemy_4575388_6.mp4.en: Maybe something to start a fire.

polysemy_4575388_8.mp4.en: Who are those people to you?

polysemy_4575388_10.mp4.en: I'll make her something to climb down.

polysemy_4575388_11.mp4.ja: 君のことも変えてみせる
polysemy_4575388_11.mp4.en: And now I want to help you change.

polysemy_4575388_12.mp4.ja: 診療所で助けてあげるから
polysemy_4575388_12.mp4.en: You get me to the infirmary, I save your life.

polysemy_4575388_15.mp4.ja: 点滴とタオルも用意して
polysemy_4575388_15.mp4.en: Two IVs from the fridge and all the clean towels you can find.

polysemy_4575388_17.mp4.en: Guys, it's thinning out there in front.

polysemy_4575388_18.mp4.en: Yeah, she made it to the infirmary.

polysemy_4575388_19.mp4.ja: 誘導したいが散らばってる
polysemy_4575388_19.mp4.en: Listen...we can-- we can lead some of them away, but they're scattered.

polysemy_4575388_22.mp4.ja: お前のために世界を作りたいんだ
polysemy_4575388_22.mp4.en: I want to make it a reality for you.

polysemy_5640450_0.mp4.en: You would rather keep it to yourself.

polysemy_5640450_1.mp4.en: Do the same thing, expect different results?

polysemy_4196776_1.mp4.ja: テーブルの上に全部出せ

polysemy_2140479_0.mp4.ja: なあ、ホントに止めてくれ

polysemy_2140479_3.mp4.ja: いじめも”奇人”というのも止めてくれると
polysemy_2140479_3.mp4.en: Stop picking on you, calling you" freak."

polysemy_2140479_4.mp4.ja: なあ、ホントに止めてくれ

polysemy_5220026_1.mp4.en: It would signal a change, a level of empathic response outside what she's programmed to exhibit.

polysemy_5220026_2.mp4.en: What makes you think they'd trust you?

polysemy_3783958_0.mp4.en: I could be on tour with this ...

polysemy_6001266_2.mp4.ja: 心配するなすぐに応援が来る

polysemy_2404233_0.mp4.en: That's no way for a queen to behave.

polysemy_2404233_3.mp4.ja: ホルスが君を戻してくれる
polysemy_2404233_3.mp4.en: Horus is going to bring you back.

polysemy_2404233_5.mp4.ja: ザヤはあなたが創造物で最高だと考えてた
polysemy_2404233_5.mp4.en: Zaya thought you were the greatest thing in all of creation.

polysemy_2404233_6.mp4.ja: あなたが気にしてるのは愚かな復讐だけだ
polysemy_2404233_6.mp4.en: All you care about is your stupid vengeance.

polysemy_2404233_7.mp4.ja: あなたを見間違ってたと考え始めた
polysemy_2404233_7.mp4.en: I started to think I was wrong about you.

polysemy_2404233_8.mp4.ja: この人間の最愛の者は審判に耐えられる程の宝を持ってない
polysemy_2404233_8.mp4.en: This mortal's beloved bears no treasure for the scales.

polysemy_2404233_9.mp4.ja: 彼女が通過するためにこれを彼に与える
polysemy_2404233_9.mp4.en: Grant him passage to give it to her himself.

polysemy_2404233_10.mp4.ja: 危害を与える者から護る
polysemy_2404233_10.mp4.en: May they protect him from those who would harm.

polysemy_2404233_12.mp4.ja: あなたが尊敬された様に私は尊敬される
polysemy_2404233_12.mp4.en: Then honor me as I've honored you.

polysemy_2404233_13.mp4.ja: そしてあなたは命を与える機会を拒否した
polysemy_2404233_13.mp4.en: And yet you denied me the chance to even give life.

polysemy_2404233_14.mp4.ja: それでどうやって奴を止める？
polysemy_2404233_14.mp4.en: So how do we stop him?

polysemy_2404233_15.mp4.ja: 死んでも助けようとしてくれる
polysemy_2404233_15.mp4.en: Even beyond death, she's trying to help us.

polysemy_2404233_16.mp4.ja: セトがラーの槍を持ってる

polysemy_2404233_17.mp4.ja: あなたに助けを求めに来ました
polysemy_2404233_17.mp4.en: I come in your service, I ask for your help.

polysemy_4283060_0.mp4.ja: それに俺はマンスと同じ炭となっていた
polysemy_4283060_0.mp4.en: And I'd be a pile of charred bones just like Mance.

polysemy_4283060_1.mp4.ja: 残りの家族は愛想を尽かした
polysemy_4283060_1.mp4.en: The rest of your family have abandoned you.

polysemy_4283060_2.mp4.ja: なんて惨めな包囲陣だ
polysemy_4283060_2.mp4.en: Now, that is a sorry attempt at a siege.

polysemy_4283060_3.mp4.ja: 騎士には給料が払われない

polysemy_85271_16.mp4.ja: 聞きなさい、スタンフォードであなたがやった事を！
polysemy_85271_16.mp4.en: Listen, you were a hack at Stanford and a hack at Bell!

polysemy_85271_18.mp4.en: Now, you don't want to get left behind, Hal.

polysemy_118789_0.mp4.ja: 俺はちょっと降りるから
polysemy_118789_0.mp4.en: I'm gonna step outta the car for one minute.

polysemy_118789_1.mp4.ja: みんなに同じくらいだ

polysemy_118789_3.mp4.ja: その限りじゃないがな
polysemy_118789_3.mp4.en: Now, get the fuck out of my sight.

polysemy_118789_4.mp4.ja: わざとミスって金をもらったんだいいか？
polysemy_118789_4.mp4.en: That he got paid money and he missed it on purpose, okay?

polysemy_118789_5.mp4.ja: ママが作ってるとこだから
polysemy_118789_5.mp4.en: My mom's makin'- she's cookin' dinner.

polysemy_45877_0.mp4.ja: ...ホワイトハウスで明朝10時の予定です
polysemy_45877_0.mp4.en: Scheduled for 10am at the White House.

polysemy_45877_2.mp4.ja: ボーエンその時計どこで手に入れた？

polysemy_45877_4.mp4.en: Throw the tools in the back.

polysemy_533501_0.mp4.en: OK, this is where I have a problem.

polysemy_533501_1.mp4.ja: その恐ろしい機械から情報をねじ取れるかも
polysemy_533501_1.mp4.en: It may be that you can wrest some information from that dread machine.

polysemy_533501_2.mp4.ja: 今夜はバンドがないと思った。
polysemy_533501_2.mp4.en: I thought there wasn't any band tonight.

polysemy_533501_3.mp4.ja: 出口をクリアにしてみんなを出させて。
polysemy_533501_3.mp4.en: You get the exit cleared and the people out.

polysemy_533501_4.mp4.ja: 彼を見ると実際にジェシーじゃないね
polysemy_533501_4.mp4.en: When you see him, you're not looking at your friend.

polysemy_533501_6.mp4.ja: このパーティーを見逃すと思った？
polysemy_533501_6.mp4.en: You didn't think I'd miss this, did you?

polysemy_533501_8.mp4.ja: でも全員の顔は醜かったね。
polysemy_533501_8.mp4.en: But all I can tell you is, they were an ugly way of looking.

polysemy_533501_9.mp4.en: The next threat we face may be something quite different.

polysemy_116985_0.mp4.ja: 私を消すつもりなら別だけど
polysemy_116985_0.mp4.en: As there is no process of elimination.

polysemy_117060_1.mp4.ja: 686プロトタイプ、人工知能のRISCチップを搭載しました。
polysemy_117060_1.mp4.en: The 686 prototypes, with the artificial intelligence Risc chip.

polysemy_117060_2.mp4.ja: それは黒ボールトのロックダウンです。
polysemy_117060_2.mp4.en: It's in a black vault lock-down.

polysemy_117060_3.mp4.ja: 侵入対策は、電子キーカードにより不活性化されている。
polysemy_117060_3.mp4.en: And the intrusion countermeasures are deactivated by an electronic key card.

polysemy_117060_4.mp4.ja: そのベントは、レーザネットによって守られている。
polysemy_117060_4.mp4.en: That vent is guarded by a laser net.

polysemy_117060_6.mp4.ja: 私が試してみて、いくつかの睡眠を得るつもりです。
polysemy_117060_6.mp4.en: I'm going to try and get some sleep.

polysemy_46250_1.mp4.ja: なかなか鋭い意見じゃないか

polysemy_46250_6.mp4.en: You wouldn't run away for nothing.

polysemy_46250_7.mp4.ja: ほんの数時間のつもりだったのよ
polysemy_46250_7.mp4.en: It was only meant to be for a few hours.

polysemy_46250_15.mp4.ja: 今じゃある種の聖地でね

polysemy_46250_18.mp4.en: I thought a little wine might be good.

polysemy_46250_19.mp4.en: This is the American Hour with a special news bulletin.

polysemy_46250_20.mp4.ja: 残念だわ夕食を作ってあげられなくて
polysemy_46250_20.mp4.en: I'm sorry I couldn't cook us some dinner.

polysemy_133093_1.mp4.ja: みんな最初は落ちんのよ

polysemy_133093_2.mp4.ja: こいつはエンジンにも頭にもキくんだ
polysemy_133093_2.mp4.en: Degreasing engines and killing brain cells.

polysemy_133093_7.mp4.en: I want Morpheus back too, but what you're talking about is suicide.

polysemy_133093_8.mp4.en: Morpheus believed something, and he was ready to give his life for it.

polysemy_133093_12.mp4.en: That is the sound of inevitability.

polysemy_101640_2.mp4.en: After a few days, you won't want to leave.

polysemy_572220_0.mp4.en: This ship is not only from another universe, it's from another time.

polysemy_572245_0.mp4.en: I believe I'm aware of the broad strokes.

polysemy_100814_10.mp4.en: Just doing jobs like this is you dragging your feet.

polysemy_572180_1.mp4.en: My allegiance is to myself alone.

polysemy_572180_2.mp4.en: So he wants Starfleet to construct mining facilities.

polysemy_572180_8.mp4.en: That's how you convinced Kelby to sabotage our engines.

polysemy_572180_9.mp4.en: No one is coming to attack your ship.

polysemy_572180_10.mp4.en: I don't want to be a sitting duck when Harrad-Sar gets here.

polysemy_572180_12.mp4.en: There have been altercations throughout the ship.

polysemy_572180_13.mp4.en: The Syndicate wants your head, Captain.

polysemy_367594_1.mp4.en: I vowed I would keep searching until I could give her what she wanted.

polysemy_572260_0.mp4.en: You're certain it won't be a problem?

polysemy_572200_0.mp4.en: The drafting of a charter in six weeks?

polysemy_519774_1.mp4.ja: あの、風邪引きそうなんだけど
polysemy_519774_1.mp4.en: You know, I do get cold.

polysemy_121765_0.mp4.en: I was relieved when my two terms were up.

polysemy_121765_1.mp4.en: Apart from his pay, which is considerable ...

polysemy_121765_2.mp4.en: I will not let you give up your future for me.

polysemy_278504_0.mp4.en: I can't wait to see what they got for dessert.
