polysemy_421994_0.mp4.en: He did say that he was onto a promise at the wedding before she bailed.

polysemy_421994_4.mp4.ja: これはたくさんの星たちと、たくさんの天空のゲン・・・
polysemy_421994_4.mp4.en: It's made up of lots of stars and lots of celestial phenona ...

polysemy_421994_5.mp4.ja: いったいどうやって、全てがうまくいくとわかっていたのかと聞かれると、
polysemy_421994_5.mp4.en: " When asked how they could possibly have known it would all work out ...

polysemy_421994_6.mp4.ja: 男性は引いちゃうから。

polysemy_421994_7.mp4.ja: 僕の代わりに、レイチェルのお世話してくれるとすごくいいんだけど。
polysemy_421994_7.mp4.en: You know, it'll be really great if you could look after Rach for me.

polysemy_421994_8.mp4.ja: ユリは、「勇気を出して私を愛して」
polysemy_421994_8.mp4.en: The lily means," I dare you to love me."

polysemy_421994_9.mp4.ja: 実は、今、１００％安定してるとは思わないんだ。
polysemy_421994_9.mp4.en: Actually things don't feel totally 100% stable at the moment.

polysemy_59749_1.mp4.en: We want to talk to you.

polysemy_59749_2.mp4.ja: 役には立たん帰してやれ
polysemy_59749_2.mp4.en: She's no good to you, send her home.

polysemy_59749_3.mp4.ja: ムントを助けたイギリスのスパイを！
polysemy_59749_3.mp4.en: He's saved Mundt, and Mundt is London's man!

polysemy_59749_6.mp4.ja: リーマスと女は拘留のまま
polysemy_59749_6.mp4.en: The man Leamas and the girl are under arrest.

polysemy_59749_7.mp4.en: The boy will meet you there.

polysemy_59749_8.mp4.ja: 監獄の扉が開いていて車もない
polysemy_59749_8.mp4.en: Open doors, escaped prisoners, a car missing.

polysemy_59749_9.mp4.ja: 誰に罪を着せて共犯者を誰にするかだ
polysemy_59749_9.mp4.en: I shall have to find the guilty ones, the accomplices.

polysemy_59749_10.mp4.ja: フィードラーの仲間だよ

polysemy_59749_11.mp4.ja: ムントは敵じゃないの？
polysemy_59749_11.mp4.en: You and Mundt are enemies, aren't you?

polysemy_59749_12.mp4.en: Why did Mundt let you go?

polysemy_59749_13.mp4.ja: イギリスにいる間に買収されていた
polysemy_59749_13.mp4.en: They bought him while he was in England.

polysemy_59749_14.mp4.ja: フィードラーひとりを消すだけでは効果がない
polysemy_59749_14.mp4.en: London knew it was no good just killing Fiedler.

polysemy_59749_15.mp4.ja: 醜悪な作戦だが効果があった
polysemy_59749_15.mp4.en: It was a foul, foul operation, but it paid off.

polysemy_59749_16.mp4.ja: 愚かで卑しい男達の一群だ
polysemy_59749_16.mp4.en: They're just a bunch of seedy, squalid bastards like me.

polysemy_59749_17.mp4.ja: 仲間を殺すにはよほどの理由がいるんだぞ？
polysemy_59749_17.mp4.en: How big does the cause have to be, before you kill your friends?

polysemy_59749_18.mp4.ja: サーチライトが壁を左右に照らしている
polysemy_59749_18.mp4.en: There is a moving searchlight beamed onto the Wall where you are to climb.

polysemy_59749_19.mp4.ja: ライトが止まったら行くんだ
polysemy_59749_19.mp4.en: Now, your signal to go will be when the beam stops.

polysemy_59749_20.mp4.ja: 余計なことを考えるな
polysemy_59749_20.mp4.en: It would be too dangerous to arouse too much curiosity.

polysemy_167261_0.mp4.ja: なぜ認めないんです懸命に尽くしているのに
polysemy_167261_0.mp4.en: You give him no credit, and yet he tries to do your will.

polysemy_167261_1.mp4.ja: 我らの民が血を流し命を張っておるのだ
polysemy_167261_1.mp4.en: It is our blood which is being spilled, our people who are dying.

polysemy_452716_3.mp4.ja: 転校生って聞いたけど

polysemy_452716_5.mp4.en: but that's just not the way here.

polysemy_452716_6.mp4.ja: それでも互いに合わないなら
polysemy_452716_6.mp4.en: And if your needs and our needs don't mesh ...

polysemy_452716_8.mp4.en: No wonder you're such a guy-magnet.

polysemy_452716_9.mp4.ja: この辺の唯一のいいクラブ。
polysemy_452716_9.mp4.en: It's the only club worth going to around here.

polysemy_452716_10.mp4.ja: 山の手からすごく近い
polysemy_452716_10.mp4.en: About a half a block from the good part of town.

polysemy_452716_12.mp4.en: I heard from Blue, and she said ...

polysemy_452716_13.mp4.ja: コルでリアの仲間じゃない？
polysemy_452716_13.mp4.en: But aren't you hanging out with Cordelia?

polysemy_452716_14.mp4.en: It has that effect on most kids.

polysemy_452716_17.mp4.ja: スプレーの時代が終わってね
polysemy_452716_17.mp4.en: Pepper spray is just so passé.

polysemy_452716_18.mp4.en: She's not hanging out with us.

polysemy_452716_24.mp4.en: No, Mom, it's a nun club.

polysemy_234215_2.mp4.ja: 俺たちをやった後奴らはまた掘り始めた
polysemy_234215_2.mp4.en: Once the machines were done with us, they started digging again.

polysemy_183649_1.mp4.ja: お前のことが知りたいそうだ切るぜ！
polysemy_183649_1.mp4.en: They wanna know about you, so I'm hanging up.

polysemy_183649_2.mp4.ja: 彼はキュートだものそれに私を助けてくれると言った
polysemy_183649_2.mp4.en: And he's cute and he said that he would help me.

polysemy_183649_3.mp4.ja: いい腕のカメラマンも知ってるいいショットを撮ってもらおう
polysemy_183649_3.mp4.en: I know a reasonable photographer who will do some headshots.

polysemy_183649_4.mp4.ja: あんないい女に心配してもらえるのは気分がいいだろうな
polysemy_183649_4.mp4.en: Must be nice to have a pretty girl care for you.

polysemy_183649_5.mp4.ja: 今見えてるのは高度に拡大された君のイメージだ
polysemy_183649_5.mp4.en: I have a highly magnified telescopic image of you.

polysemy_183649_6.mp4.ja: 電話を切ったとするぞ
polysemy_183649_6.mp4.en: This will count as a hang up.

polysemy_183649_7.mp4.ja: もっときちんと対応してたらこんな事態は避けられた・・
polysemy_183649_7.mp4.en: If you had dealt with the man decently, this might not have been necessary.

polysemy_183649_8.mp4.ja: オレは犯罪なんかしちゃいない！
polysemy_183649_8.mp4.en: I'm not guilty of a goddamn thing.

polysemy_183649_9.mp4.ja: 誰か相談相手を呼びたい気分だ
polysemy_183649_9.mp4.en: Maybe I'd like someone to negotiate my surrender.

polysemy_183649_10.mp4.ja: つまり、収集つけるために君を信用しろと言うのか？
polysemy_183649_10.mp4.en: So you want me to trust you to get me out of this?

polysemy_183649_11.mp4.ja: 手を伸ばす以外に何をする？
polysemy_183649_11.mp4.en: There's only one way to find out.

polysemy_258463_0.mp4.ja: 聞いてると落ち着くんだ
polysemy_258463_0.mp4.en: Well, listening to you, it's relaxing.

polysemy_258463_3.mp4.ja: 俺たちが”トレッドストーン”だ

polysemy_258463_4.mp4.ja: 頭が割れそうになるよな

polysemy_258463_8.mp4.ja: 本当に捕まえられるのか？
polysemy_258463_8.mp4.en: Can you really bring him in?

polysemy_266697_0.mp4.ja: アマチュアの仕事じゃない
polysemy_266697_0.mp4.en: Well it's sure a steady hand did this.

polysemy_266697_1.mp4.ja: バックの車に横たわって麻痺した手足を動かそうと試みる
polysemy_266697_1.mp4.en: As I lay in the back of Buck's truck trying to will my limbs out of entropy.

polysemy_266697_2.mp4.ja: 大変なところはもう終わったわ

polysemy_266697_3.mp4.ja: バーに腰掛けてもいいかしら？
polysemy_266697_3.mp4.en: Um, may I sit at the bar?

polysemy_266697_4.mp4.ja: ゴゴ彼女を守りたいんだろうけど
polysemy_266697_4.mp4.en: GoGo, I know you feel you must protect your mistress.

polysemy_266697_6.mp4.ja: それに奴らは必ずあなたを消す
polysemy_266697_6.mp4.en: And I promise you, they will be things you will miss.

polysemy_572203_0.mp4.ja: クリンゴン・オーグメント作らせたいんだろ
polysemy_572203_0.mp4.en: You want me to create Klingon augments.

polysemy_572203_1.mp4.ja: それで第1段階でのウィルスの影響を抑えることができる
polysemy_572203_1.mp4.en: That would stop the genetic effects of the virus in stage one.

polysemy_572203_4.mp4.ja: ウイルス治療の詳細を送ります
polysemy_572203_4.mp4.en: I am transmitting the details of an antivirus.

polysemy_572203_5.mp4.ja: アーチャー船長、今やお前の船はクリンゴン帝国のものとなった
polysemy_572203_5.mp4.en: Captain Archer, your ships are now the property of the Klingon Empire.

polysemy_572203_8.mp4.en: Let's keep those ships off their tail.

polysemy_572203_10.mp4.ja: クレルに通信をつないで下さい

polysemy_572203_11.mp4.ja: それには強力なウィルスが含まれていたことをご存知ですか？
polysemy_572203_11.mp4.en: What you may not know is that it contains a potent sample of the metagenic virus.

polysemy_572203_12.mp4.ja: センサーが信じられないなら自分の感覚を信用するといいでしょう
polysemy_572203_12.mp4.en: Or if you don't trust your sensors, trust your senses.

polysemy_572203_14.mp4.ja: クレル提督は、壊滅命令を撤回するよう最高評議会を説得した
polysemy_572203_14.mp4.en: Admiral Krell has convinced the High Council to call off their sterilization program.

polysemy_572203_15.mp4.ja: 帝国にフロックスの治療方法を展開することを約束した
polysemy_572203_15.mp4.en: They've promised to distribute Phlox's cure throughout the Empire.

polysemy_572203_16.mp4.ja: 血流にはウィルスの痕跡はありません
polysemy_572203_16.mp4.en: There's no trace of the virus in your bloodstream.

polysemy_572203_17.mp4.ja: 何百万の仲間はこの忌まわしい姿で暮らさなければならない
polysemy_572203_17.mp4.en: Millions of my people will have to live with this disfigurement.

polysemy_572203_18.mp4.ja: 上官は今の地位に留まることを許すとは思わない
polysemy_572203_18.mp4.en: I doubt my superiors will allow me to remain in my position.

polysemy_572203_20.mp4.ja: 自分だったら取っておきますよ、船長
polysemy_572203_20.mp4.en: I'd keep them if I were you, Captain.

polysemy_266543_1.mp4.ja: まず自分を変える必要があります

polysemy_266543_3.mp4.ja: 本当はいいやつなんだ

polysemy_266543_4.mp4.ja: ゴーグルを取り返さないと
polysemy_266543_4.mp4.en: I need to get that mask.

polysemy_266543_5.mp4.ja: 早くゴーグルを取って！

polysemy_266543_9.mp4.ja: 自分のすべき事を考えろ
polysemy_266543_9.mp4.en: Just think about what you need to do.

polysemy_266543_10.mp4.ja: 頭が痛くなりそうだよ
polysemy_266543_10.mp4.en: See, I'm going to get stuck now with that song.

polysemy_266543_11.mp4.ja: それで聞きたいんだが...
polysemy_266543_11.mp4.en: Now, Dory, I want you to tell me ...

polysemy_572178_0.mp4.ja: その様子からするとデザートも避けた方がいいだろう
polysemy_572178_0.mp4.en: From the looks of things...you should probably skip the dessert table while you're at it.

polysemy_572178_1.mp4.ja: それが彼らが会ったばかりの人と議論を始める方法よ
polysemy_572178_1.mp4.en: It's how they start arguments with people they've just met.

polysemy_572178_2.mp4.en: A species that actually thrives on arguing.

polysemy_572178_4.mp4.ja: 大使は朝風呂を好みます
polysemy_572178_4.mp4.en: Apparently, the Ambassador likes a good soak in the morning.

polysemy_572178_5.mp4.ja: 小さいし見栄えもよくない
polysemy_572178_5.mp4.en: I find it small and unimpressive.

polysemy_572178_6.mp4.ja: 大使があなたと話をしたがっています
polysemy_572178_6.mp4.en: The Ambassador wants to speak with you.

polysemy_572178_7.mp4.ja: アンドリア人が結果的にジンディの危機からの手助けをした
polysemy_572178_7.mp4.en: The Andorians came to your aid during the Xindi crisis.

polysemy_572178_8.mp4.ja: お前達が他の手段を持っているとは思えない
polysemy_572178_8.mp4.en: It doesn't seem that you have a lot of other options.

polysemy_572178_9.mp4.ja: この旅では地球の料理を期待していた
polysemy_572178_9.mp4.en: I was expecting to sample Earth cuisine on this journey.

polysemy_572178_10.mp4.ja: 残骸の痕跡からしてリアクターの爆発でしょう
polysemy_572178_10.mp4.en: Judging by the debris pattern, I'd say their reactor breached.

polysemy_572178_12.mp4.ja: フロックスに待機するよう伝えてくれ
polysemy_572178_12.mp4.en: Tell Phlox to stand by for casualties.

polysemy_572178_14.mp4.ja: テラライトの代表を乗せてる

polysemy_572178_15.mp4.ja: 我々はこの攻撃とは関係ない
polysemy_572178_15.mp4.en: We had nothing to do with this alleged attack.

polysemy_572178_16.mp4.ja: 奴らは我々を逮捕する奴らは我々の仕業と考える
polysemy_572178_16.mp4.en: They'll hold us responsible for this incident.

polysemy_572178_17.mp4.ja: 無実なら何も心配することはない
polysemy_572178_17.mp4.en: If you're innocent, I'm sure you have nothing to worry about.

polysemy_572178_18.mp4.ja: 君が正しい選択をしたと願ってるよ
polysemy_572178_18.mp4.en: I hope you made the right decision.

polysemy_572178_19.mp4.ja: 会議に同意したのに大使を攻撃したのは何故だ？
polysemy_572178_19.mp4.en: Why agree to a conference, then attack your ambassador?

polysemy_572178_20.mp4.ja: テラライト人は我々とは同じように考えない
polysemy_572178_20.mp4.en: Tellarites don't think like you or I do.

polysemy_572178_21.mp4.ja: テラライト人は自分達の船を失ったと主張している
polysemy_572178_21.mp4.en: Tellarites claim they've lost ships of their own.

polysemy_572178_22.mp4.ja: ターゲットアレーにアクセスさせてくれ
polysemy_572178_22.mp4.en: I need to access your targeting array.

polysemy_572178_23.mp4.ja: 罠にはめるために遭難信号を送ったんだ
polysemy_572178_23.mp4.en: They sent out a distress call to lure you into a trap.

polysemy_572178_24.mp4.ja: 帝国は会議が行われることを望んでいないんだ
polysemy_572178_24.mp4.en: The Imperial Guard never wanted this conference to take place.

polysemy_572178_25.mp4.ja: 奴らは明らかに自分で事を運んでいる
polysemy_572178_25.mp4.en: They've obviously taken matters into their own hands.

polysemy_572178_26.mp4.ja: 帝国軍は不誠実だといいたいのか？
polysemy_572178_26.mp4.en: Are you implying the lmperial Guard's been disloyal?

polysemy_572178_27.mp4.ja: しかし、奴は明らかにアンドリア人の肩を持っている
polysemy_572178_27.mp4.en: But it's obvious he's inclined to believe the Andorians.

polysemy_572178_28.mp4.ja: 我々はこの船で囚人扱いだ

polysemy_572178_29.mp4.ja: あなたの船の記録装置からこれを取り出しました
polysemy_572178_29.mp4.en: We retrieved this from your ship's data recorder.

polysemy_572178_30.mp4.ja: これはクマリを破壊した船のパワー信号です
polysemy_572178_30.mp4.en: This is the power signature of the vessel that destroyed the Kumari.

polysemy_572178_32.mp4.en: That these two vessels are actually the same ship?

polysemy_325710_0.mp4.ja: 日本は剣（つるぎ）で作られたという
polysemy_325710_0.mp4.en: They say Japan was made by a sword.

polysemy_325710_1.mp4.ja: 弾の装填なしに５～７人の敵を倒せる
polysemy_325710_1.mp4.en: You could kill yourself five, six, seven braves without ever having to reload.

polysemy_325710_2.mp4.en: God knows it looks as if you'll need one real soon.

polysemy_442268_0.mp4.en: If you search hard, you'll find it.

polysemy_442268_1.mp4.ja: お願いしたいことがあって来ました
polysemy_442268_1.mp4.en: I must ask of you, Miss Nagase.

polysemy_120915_0.mp4.ja: ファンのスイッチを掃除してたんだよ
polysemy_120915_0.mp4.en: I was cleaning the fan switches.

polysemy_120915_1.mp4.ja: 君の知らない大物だよ...

polysemy_120915_4.mp4.ja: ヴァローラム議長は希望があると考えています
polysemy_120915_4.mp4.en: Chancellor Valorum seems to think there is hope.

polysemy_120915_6.mp4.en: I object to the senator's statements.

polysemy_120915_7.mp4.ja: 私たちは閣下の忠実な下僕です

polysemy_120915_8.mp4.ja: すぐ捕らえられるでしょう閣下
polysemy_120915_8.mp4.en: It won't be long, my lord.

polysemy_120915_9.mp4.ja: あの小娘にしては予想外の動きだな
polysemy_120915_9.mp4.en: This is an unexpected move for her.

polysemy_120915_10.mp4.ja: やつらに先手を打たせるのだ
polysemy_120915_10.mp4.en: Let them make the first move.

polysemy_120915_11.mp4.ja: 私ができる限り連れ戻しましょうしかし...
polysemy_120915_11.mp4.en: I brought back as many of the leaders as I could.

polysemy_120915_12.mp4.ja: 敵は想像を上回る規模と戦力です
polysemy_120915_12.mp4.en: The Federation army's also much larger than we thought, and much stronger.

polysemy_120915_13.mp4.ja: 隊長は陽動作戦を開始してください
polysemy_120915_13.mp4.en: Captain Panaka will create a diversion.

polysemy_120915_14.mp4.ja: 総督がいなければ敵は混乱するでしょう
polysemy_120915_14.mp4.en: Without the viceroy, they will be lost and confused.

polysemy_120915_15.mp4.ja: 難しいのは玉座の間に入るまで
polysemy_120915_15.mp4.en: The difficulty is getting into the throne room.

polysemy_120915_16.mp4.ja: 問題はこの作戦でグンガンが犠牲になることだ
polysemy_120915_16.mp4.en: There is a possibility, with this diversion, many Gungans will be killed.

polysemy_120915_17.mp4.ja: 戦闘機の武器ではシールドを突破できない
polysemy_120915_17.mp4.en: The weapons on your fighters may not penetrate the shields.

polysemy_120915_18.mp4.ja: だからこそ失敗が許されないのです
polysemy_120915_18.mp4.en: Well, that is why we must not fail to get the viceroy.

polysemy_120915_19.mp4.ja: 予想以上に愚かな女だ
polysemy_120915_19.mp4.en: She is more foolish than I thought.

polysemy_120915_20.mp4.ja: 敵は原始人どもの寄せ集めです
polysemy_120915_20.mp4.en: It appears to be made up of primitives.

polysemy_120915_21.mp4.ja: 攻撃を開始してもよろしいでしょうか閣下？
polysemy_120915_21.mp4.en: I have your approval to proceed, then, my lord?

polysemy_120915_25.mp4.ja: 総督は玉座の間にいるはず
polysemy_120915_25.mp4.en: My guess is the viceroy's in the throne room.

polysemy_120915_28.mp4.ja: アセンション・ガンを！

polysemy_120915_30.mp4.ja: あきらめるなジャージャー将軍

polysemy_120915_34.mp4.ja: さて総督新しい協定について話しましょう
polysemy_120915_34.mp4.en: Now, Viceroy, we will discuss a new treaty.

polysemy_120915_35.mp4.ja: ポッドレースみたいだ

polysemy_120915_36.mp4.ja: そして君もだ若きスカイウォーカー

polysemy_120915_37.mp4.ja: 評議会はそなたにジェダイ・ナイトの地位を与える
polysemy_120915_37.mp4.en: Confer on you the level of Jedi knight the council does.

polysemy_120915_38.mp4.ja: だがあの少年をパダワンとすることには同意できん
polysemy_120915_38.mp4.en: But agree with your taking this boy as your Padawan learner ...

polysemy_120915_39.mp4.ja: マスター・ヨーダクワイ＝ガンの遺言です
polysemy_120915_39.mp4.en: Master Yoda, I gave Qui-Gon my word.

polysemy_120915_40.mp4.ja: 評議会の許しがなくても必ずやります
polysemy_120915_40.mp4.en: Without the approval of the council, if I must.

polysemy_120915_41.mp4.ja: クワイ＝ガンの反骨心がそなたにもあるのぉ
polysemy_120915_41.mp4.en: Qui-Gon's defiance I sense in you.

polysemy_120915_42.mp4.en: Agree with you the council does.

polysemy_167260_0.mp4.ja: 仲間がモサモサの可愛い女と泳いでおるわい...
polysemy_167260_0.mp4.en: It's the Dwarves that go swimming with little, hairy women.

polysemy_378793_0.mp4.ja: 成績を上げてもらうにはどうすれば？
polysemy_378793_0.mp4.en: I was wondering if there was any way I could raise my grade?

polysemy_118531_0.mp4.en: I even testified against him as a character witness.

polysemy_118531_3.mp4.ja: ふざけんな一発ぶち込んでやる
polysemy_118531_3.mp4.en: I might just have to bust a cap in your ass.

polysemy_118531_5.mp4.ja: この間は相談に乗ってくれてありがとう
polysemy_118531_5.mp4.en: I wanted to thank you for letting me cry on your shoulder the other day.

polysemy_118531_6.mp4.en: If you ask me, they're still there.

polysemy_118531_7.mp4.ja: 私が右足を引いたら左足を前よ
polysemy_118531_7.mp4.en: When I go back on my right foot, you come forward on your left.

polysemy_118531_8.mp4.ja: 私が左足を出したら右足を引いて
polysemy_118531_8.mp4.en: When I go forward on my left, you're back on your right.

polysemy_118531_10.mp4.en: This came out of my private stash.

polysemy_118531_11.mp4.en: He should've woke up by now.

polysemy_118531_12.mp4.ja: 分からなかった人は264ページを読みなさい
polysemy_118531_12.mp4.en: Everyone who didn't answer...the questions on page 264, please do so tonight.

polysemy_118531_13.mp4.ja: 事実なら処罰しなければならん
polysemy_118531_13.mp4.en: And if that's the case, I need to address the accusation.

polysemy_118531_14.mp4.ja: 教職と管理職は必ずしも一致しない
polysemy_118531_14.mp4.en: Teaching and being a principal don't necessarily go hand in hand.

polysemy_118531_15.mp4.ja: 車でも５、６時間だけどロスと違う
polysemy_118531_15.mp4.en: It's only about an hour by air, or five or six by car...but it has a totally different attitude than L.A.

polysemy_118531_16.mp4.en: The only problem is, I hate to leave Jack with my mother.

polysemy_118531_18.mp4.en: The ideas in your essay aren't the problem.

polysemy_118531_21.mp4.ja: だがここなら聞きたい事が聞ける
polysemy_118531_21.mp4.en: Since you're here, maybe you can clear something up for me.

polysemy_118531_22.mp4.en: Caught yourself a case for sure now.

polysemy_118531_24.mp4.en: You must be proud of yourself.

polysemy_118531_26.mp4.ja: 教室を荒らした奴を知ってるか
polysemy_118531_26.mp4.en: You wouldn't know who vandalized Bungalow 86, would you?

polysemy_118531_27.mp4.ja: 会議はソフトウェアの話よ
polysemy_118531_27.mp4.en: These conferences mainly focus on software now.

polysemy_118531_30.mp4.en: He smoked the mota for you too?

polysemy_118531_31.mp4.ja: ただし行動の責任は自分にある
polysemy_118531_31.mp4.en: I think everybody's responsible for their own actions.

polysemy_118531_34.mp4.ja: 多大な犠牲を払いました
polysemy_118531_34.mp4.en: But those victories cost him a large part of his army.

polysemy_519793_1.mp4.ja: 我々は初めから攻撃の危険に晒されてきました
polysemy_519793_1.mp4.en: We've been at risk of an attack since day one.

polysemy_572222_0.mp4.ja: シラナイトはシラクの本当の教えに従っていると主張している
polysemy_572222_0.mp4.en: The Syrrannites claim that they are following the true path of Surak.

polysemy_572222_1.mp4.ja: スラクが助けてくれます

polysemy_572222_3.mp4.ja: 母の死が思っている以上に影響しているようです
polysemy_572222_3.mp4.en: My mother's death has affected me more than I realized.

polysemy_572222_4.mp4.ja: パナーは、スラクの時代から知られています
polysemy_572222_4.mp4.en: Pa'nar has been known since Surak's time.

polysemy_572222_5.mp4.ja: 経験者により、神経システムのアンバランスを修正することができます
polysemy_572222_5.mp4.en: One with great experience can correct the neurological imbalance.

polysemy_572222_6.mp4.ja: 我々は、精神訓練で痛みを抑えることができる
polysemy_572222_6.mp4.en: Our mental disciplines allow us to suppress pain.

polysemy_572222_7.mp4.ja: お前が本当のことを言っていると確信するまでは
polysemy_572222_7.mp4.en: Not until I'm certain you've told us the truth.

polysemy_572222_8.mp4.ja: では、設定を上げて終わらせてくれ
polysemy_572222_8.mp4.en: Then I suggest you increase the setting and get this over with.

polysemy_572222_10.mp4.ja: スラクの道をたどったと主張するグループが多くあります
polysemy_572222_10.mp4.en: There are many groups who claim to follow the true path of Surak.

polysemy_572222_11.mp4.ja: 最高司令部のやり方には反対ですしかしそれは過激派に加わるということではありません
polysemy_572222_11.mp4.en: I may have had disagreements with the High Command, but that doesn't mean I'm going to join a radical faction.

polysemy_572222_13.mp4.ja: 私が会った多くのヴァルカン人は我々は過激派と考える人も多い
polysemy_572222_13.mp4.en: A lot of Vulcans I've met consider us a radical faction.

polysemy_347149_0.mp4.ja: 彼はカブ、カブ頭と呼ばれています

polysemy_347149_2.mp4.ja: 私はあなたに不可視の5分を与えることができ、今がチャンスです
polysemy_347149_2.mp4.en: I can give you 5 minutes of invisibility, now's your chance

polysemy_347149_5.mp4.ja: 私はあなたを助けたい

polysemy_347149_8.mp4.ja: ルシファーの現在の状態では、彼はおそらくそれらを維持することはできません
polysemy_347149_8.mp4.en: In Calcifer's present state, he can't possibly keep them out

polysemy_572179_0.mp4.ja: 伝統的な記録装置を許されてないんでね
polysemy_572179_0.mp4.en: I'm not allowed traditional recording devices.

polysemy_572179_1.mp4.ja: 遺伝子的に強化されたDNAは12年前に医療施設から盗まれた胎児のものと一致した
polysemy_572179_1.mp4.en: The genetically enhanced DNA matched embryos stolen from a medical facility over twenty years ago.

polysemy_572179_2.mp4.ja: 明確な理由により人目からは隔離されている
polysemy_572179_2.mp4.en: It's been kept from the public for obvious reasons.

polysemy_572179_3.mp4.ja: でも自分なら戦いなしで彼らを降伏させることができると考えている
polysemy_572179_3.mp4.en: But he does think, he can convince them to surrender without a fight.

polysemy_572179_4.mp4.ja: クリンゴン船が攻撃された地域だ
polysemy_572179_4.mp4.en: That's the area where the Klingon ship was attacked.

polysemy_572179_5.mp4.ja: 両者の最も危険な要素を引き付ける地域です
polysemy_572179_5.mp4.en: It attracts the most dangerous elements from both.

polysemy_572179_6.mp4.ja: 残りの物資の積み込が終わったら知らせろ
polysemy_572179_6.mp4.en: Notify me, when the rest of our supplies are on board!

polysemy_572179_9.mp4.ja: クリンゴンが見つけたDNAにサンプルを調べさせてもらうことはできるかな？
polysemy_572179_9.mp4.en: If I could examine the DNA samples the Klingons recovered ..

polysemy_572179_10.mp4.ja: 彼と交換日記を楽しみたいな
polysemy_572179_10.mp4.en: I'd enjoy trading notes with him.

polysemy_572179_11.mp4.ja: タンパク質の再結合装置(フードプロセッサー)を除いて全てOKです
polysemy_572179_11.mp4.en: It comes with everything but its own protein resequencer.

polysemy_327247_0.mp4.ja: アメイジング・クレスキン(読心術マジシャン)みたいだな

polysemy_327247_1.mp4.ja: そいつとジミーは組んでる

polysemy_327247_2.mp4.ja: もう少しで当たるじゃないか

polysemy_327247_3.mp4.ja: これが元殺し屋の振舞いだね
polysemy_327247_3.mp4.en: Oh, so this is how a retired mass murderer acts.

polysemy_327247_4.mp4.ja: クソったれどもに逃げられた
polysemy_327247_4.mp4.en: The sons of bitches got away.

polysemy_327247_5.mp4.ja: 証人保護プログラム下の誰かさんと結婚したんだろ
polysemy_327247_5.mp4.en: This coming form someone who married someone in the witness protection program.

polysemy_327247_6.mp4.ja: やった殺し屋が来てくれた
polysemy_327247_6.mp4.en: Oh, thank God the killers are here.

polysemy_327247_7.mp4.ja: 追ってきたらこいつの体をバラバラにして投げつける
polysemy_327247_7.mp4.en: Any of your knuckleheads follow this car, I start throwing out body parts.

polysemy_327247_8.mp4.ja: 取ったら不運をもたらす
polysemy_327247_8.mp4.en: I take it off, I'm jinxed.

polysemy_327247_9.mp4.ja: そう言って逃げるんだろ
polysemy_327247_9.mp4.en: Now, that's the kind of thinking you gotta get away from, my friend.

polysemy_327247_10.mp4.ja: 自分の子供にも作ってやりたい
polysemy_327247_10.mp4.en: I could make a slingshot for my little boy.

polysemy_327247_11.mp4.ja: 物に当たらないようにね
polysemy_327247_11.mp4.en: Would you be careful of the fixtures?

polysemy_338013_0.mp4.ja: 終わったらこれらの品は処分します
polysemy_338013_0.mp4.en: We'll dispose of these mementos when we're done here.

polysemy_338013_2.mp4.ja: 彼女の立場なんだけど

polysemy_338013_3.mp4.en: I'm erasing you, and I'm happy!

polysemy_338013_5.mp4.ja: 『愚かなる過去よ訣別の為なら忘却も祝福される』
polysemy_338013_5.mp4.en: " Blessed are the forgetful, for they get the better even of their blunders."

polysemy_338013_10.mp4.en: I'm here to erase Joel Barish.

polysemy_265208_1.mp4.en: It's like I can't control it.

polysemy_519790_1.mp4.ja: ただ、最近はみんなパスしてること知ってればいいけど
polysemy_519790_1.mp4.en: If only they knew that everyone passes these days.

polysemy_519761_1.mp4.ja: 乗客を降ろして船を破壊しては？
polysemy_519761_1.mp4.en: I suggest that we evacuate the passengers, then destroy the ship.

polysemy_349710_1.mp4.en: All right, where do we start?

polysemy_349710_2.mp4.en: All right, somebody's gonna pay for this!

polysemy_349710_3.mp4.ja: 彼の頭は大丈夫だと思うわ
polysemy_349710_3.mp4.en: It doesn't seem to be his head that's the problem, Lieutenant.

polysemy_349710_6.mp4.ja: 注意して無かったんだ

polysemy_133240_0.mp4.ja: さぁおしまい聞いたでしょ？
polysemy_133240_0.mp4.en: Now at last, we hear some sense!

polysemy_133240_2.mp4.ja: ヤな仕事だわだけど私はあなた達を退屈させたくないのよ
polysemy_133240_2.mp4.en: Nasty business, but I won't bore you with my scars.

polysemy_133240_3.mp4.ja: よろしくお願いするぜ

polysemy_133240_4.mp4.ja: そういえばこの間のことなんだけど...
polysemy_133240_4.mp4.en: Come to think of it, just before I left ...

polysemy_133240_5.mp4.ja: トカゲのおっさんの名前はなんだったかな？
polysemy_133240_5.mp4.en: What was that old salamander's name?

polysemy_133240_6.mp4.ja: ボクは本当の瞬間にいたいんだ
polysemy_133240_6.mp4.en: And I want a moment to be real

polysemy_133240_7.mp4.ja: ボクは本当の瞬間にいたいんだ
polysemy_133240_7.mp4.en: And I want a moment to be real

polysemy_133240_8.mp4.ja: 失うこともあるってことだよ夢を追いかけてるとな
polysemy_133240_8.mp4.en: You give up a few things chasing a dream.

polysemy_133240_9.mp4.ja: その大きな波動で太陽エネルギーを得られますぞ！
polysemy_133240_9.mp4.en: Followed by the biggest magilla of them all!

polysemy_133240_10.mp4.ja: 最後の爆風に乗ってここから脱出しましょう
polysemy_133240_10.mp4.en: We'll ride that last magilla out of here.

polysemy_133240_12.mp4.en: It seems your cabin boy...did a bang-up job with those lifelines.

polysemy_133240_13.mp4.ja: 残念ながらアロー指揮官は飲み込まれたようです
polysemy_133240_13.mp4.en: I'm afraid Mr. Arrow has been lost.

polysemy_133240_14.mp4.ja: 後２秒あれば俺はきっと
polysemy_133240_14.mp4.en: For two seconds, I thought that maybe ...

polysemy_133240_15.mp4.ja: いいかよく聞くんだジェームス･ホーキンス
polysemy_133240_15.mp4.en: Now, you listen to me, James Hawkins.

polysemy_133240_16.mp4.ja: 前の仲間はたった３人しかいないんだぜ
polysemy_133240_16.mp4.en: There's only three of them left

polysemy_133240_18.mp4.ja: それ以上俺にケチつけんじゃねぇ
polysemy_133240_18.mp4.en: Now, mark me, the lot of ya.

polysemy_133240_19.mp4.ja: 悪魔の望遠鏡はどこだ？

polysemy_133240_20.mp4.ja: おまえらに任せてたら日が暮れちまう
polysemy_133240_20.mp4.en: Oh, you're taking all day about it.

polysemy_133240_21.mp4.ja: 博士私が「今よ」と言ったらあそこのケーブルを撃つのよ
polysemy_133240_21.mp4.en: Doctor, when I say" now", shoot out the forward cable.

polysemy_133240_22.mp4.ja: 紅茶を一杯飲めば良くなるわ
polysemy_133240_22.mp4.en: Cup of tea, and I'll be right as rain.

polysemy_133240_23.mp4.ja: ついに有機生命体が僕を助けにきたんだね
polysemy_133240_23.mp4.en: A carbon-based life form come to rescue me at last!

polysemy_133240_24.mp4.ja: 僕はずっと長い間一人ぼっちだったもんだからさ
polysemy_133240_24.mp4.en: It's just I've been marooned for so long.

polysemy_133240_25.mp4.ja: 海賊に追われていて隠れる場所が必要なんだ
polysemy_133240_25.mp4.en: I got to find a place to hide, and there's pirates chasing me.

polysemy_133240_26.mp4.ja: そのとき財宝について何か聞いたかい？
polysemy_133240_26.mp4.en: But then you gotta know about the treasure?

polysemy_133240_27.mp4.ja: そのセントロイドの仕掛けってのは？
polysemy_133240_27.mp4.en: The...the centroid of the mechanism, or ...

polysemy_133240_28.mp4.ja: 君は探し出さないと駄目だ〜
polysemy_133240_28.mp4.en: You haven't found it, have you?

polysemy_133240_29.mp4.ja: ごめんね役に立たなかったね
polysemy_133240_29.mp4.en: I'm sorry that I'm so dysfunctional.

polysemy_133240_31.mp4.ja: 古風な恋愛がとても人の心を動かすんだね〜
polysemy_133240_31.mp4.en: I find old-fashioned romance so touching, don't you?

polysemy_133240_32.mp4.ja: 地図の模様と同じですな
polysemy_133240_32.mp4.en: They're identical to the ones on the map.

polysemy_133240_34.mp4.ja: 騙してもいない少しだけ話をするだけでいい
polysemy_133240_34.mp4.en: No tricks, just a little palaver.

polysemy_133240_35.mp4.ja: てことはあいつはまだ俺達が地図を持ってると思ってるんだ
polysemy_133240_35.mp4.en: That means...that he thinks we still have it.

polysemy_133240_37.mp4.ja: ちょっと聞いてくれよジム

polysemy_133240_38.mp4.ja: 博士あなたは素敵な目をしてるのね

polysemy_133240_39.mp4.ja: つまりその私は博士であってしかしその手の医者ではないわけで
polysemy_133240_39.mp4.en: I mean, I am a doctor, but I'm not that kind of doctor.

polysemy_133240_40.mp4.ja: 博士号では助けられないのです
polysemy_133240_40.mp4.en: You can't help people with a doctorate.

polysemy_133240_43.mp4.ja: よしジムには少し静かに考える時間が必要だね
polysemy_133240_43.mp4.en: Well, I think that Jimmy could use a little quiet time.

polysemy_133240_44.mp4.ja: あのバカロボット俺たちを殺す気かよ
polysemy_133240_44.mp4.en: That stupid robot's gonna get us all...killed.

polysemy_337921_5.mp4.ja: ちょっとでも傷があったらケツをぶっ飛ばすかもな
polysemy_337921_5.mp4.en: One scratch on the car and guess who gets an ass whip--?

polysemy_519763_0.mp4.ja: この種の計画に適してない
polysemy_519763_0.mp4.en: I'm not cut out for this kind of work.

polysemy_519763_1.mp4.ja: 失礼ながら私より腕のいいスナイパーはこの船にいません
polysemy_519763_1.mp4.en: With all due respect, I'm the best shot in or out of the cockpit.

polysemy_519763_2.mp4.ja: このままだと悲惨な結果を迎えるぞ

polysemy_519763_3.mp4.ja: 水不足は全船に及んでいる
polysemy_519763_3.mp4.en: The water shortage affects the entire fleet.

polysemy_519763_4.mp4.ja: 話をしてる間にお前の部下が来そうだ
polysemy_519763_4.mp4.en: Your men are on their way even as we speak.

polysemy_519763_5.mp4.ja: 人質を開放したらこの船をあんたの手に任せる
polysemy_519763_5.mp4.en: You let the rest of the hostages go, we'll leave this ship in your hands.

polysemy_519763_6.mp4.ja: この事はあなたと私の間に留めておかなくては
polysemy_519763_6.mp4.en: So this has to stay between you and me.

polysemy_519762_0.mp4.ja: この事はあなたと私の間に留めておかなくては
polysemy_519762_0.mp4.en: So this has to stay between you and me.

polysemy_519762_1.mp4.ja: かなり尾ヒレが付いてるな

polysemy_519762_2.mp4.ja: さぁみんな奴等が燃えるのを見よう
polysemy_519762_2.mp4.en: Come on, people, watch them bake

polysemy_519762_3.mp4.ja: 今まで困難な日であった

polysemy_519762_4.mp4.ja: レバーを引け・・カット

polysemy_519762_5.mp4.ja: 間違いを犯しました・・・

polysemy_519762_6.mp4.ja: 出来なくても降ろさない
polysemy_519762_6.mp4.en: It's my job to figure out which is which, without personal feeling either way.

polysemy_572176_3.mp4.ja: 確かめる方法は1つだけです
polysemy_572176_3.mp4.en: There is only one way to be certain.

polysemy_572176_4.mp4.ja: 彼はカトラを持っている

polysemy_572176_5.mp4.ja: 少し聞いてもいいですか？
polysemy_572176_5.mp4.en: Mind if I ask you something?

polysemy_572176_6.mp4.ja: その間、あなたの世界と人々への親近感を育ててきた
polysemy_572176_6.mp4.en: In that time, I developed an affinity for your world and its people.

polysemy_572176_7.mp4.ja: ヴァルカン科学アカデミーがタイムトラベルに懐疑的的だったように
polysemy_572176_7.mp4.en: The Vulcan Science Academy was just as skeptical about time travel.

polysemy_572176_8.mp4.ja: あなたには、比較の基礎が全くありません
polysemy_572176_8.mp4.en: You have no basis for comparison.

polysemy_572176_9.mp4.ja: 彼とシラナイトに対する証拠は無視できません
polysemy_572176_9.mp4.en: The evidence against him and the Syrrannites is compelling.

polysemy_572176_10.mp4.ja: 人間に対するあなたの偏見があなたの判断を鈍らせると信じてます
polysemy_572176_10.mp4.en: I believe your prejudice toward humans is clouding your judgment.

polysemy_572176_11.mp4.en: I'll perform the procedure in one hour.

polysemy_572176_12.mp4.ja: 一人の人間の命を守るために我々の未来を犠牲にはできない
polysemy_572176_12.mp4.en: I won't sacrifice our future to protect the life of one human.

polysemy_572176_13.mp4.ja: だが、見た目より悪い感じはしない
polysemy_572176_13.mp4.en: But I don't feel half as bad as you look.

polysemy_572176_15.mp4.ja: 愚かな行為に高い代償を払っている
polysemy_572176_15.mp4.en: We're paying a heavy price for our foolishness.

polysemy_572176_16.mp4.ja: 彼らにコードを渡した

polysemy_251127_3.mp4.ja: 彼が網にかかったわけ？
polysemy_251127_3.mp4.en: So, does this mean he's hooked?

polysemy_251127_7.mp4.en: Oh, it's just a little frosting.

polysemy_251127_9.mp4.ja: フェルトが草の上だと思ってるのかしら
polysemy_251127_9.mp4.en: You think maybe he thinks the felt is grass?

polysemy_251127_10.mp4.ja: 明日までに何か策を考えないと
polysemy_251127_10.mp4.en: Look, I have to think of something before tomorrow.

polysemy_251127_11.mp4.ja: マイクもボーイズナイトがあったわ
polysemy_251127_11.mp4.en: Oh, Mike used to have a boys' night.

polysemy_251127_12.mp4.ja: 彼女キーを持ってるのか？

polysemy_251127_13.mp4.ja: おいしいもの持ってきたわよ

polysemy_251127_14.mp4.ja: いいな今度の手はすごいぞ
polysemy_251127_14.mp4.en: All right, I'm already maxed out.

polysemy_251127_16.mp4.ja: つまりもう終わりって事ね
polysemy_251127_16.mp4.en: So I guess this means we're over.

polysemy_251127_18.mp4.en: How are things between you sexually?

polysemy_356470_0.mp4.ja: ”王子様はお姫様の””手を取って口付けをし━”
polysemy_356470_0.mp4.en: " He took her hand, and he kissed it.

polysemy_356470_1.mp4.ja: 何で彼女らを認めるの？
polysemy_356470_1.mp4.en: Remind me why we tolerate them.

polysemy_356470_2.mp4.ja: そんなときはキミを思うんだ

polysemy_356470_3.mp4.ja: 何の仮装でシェルビーとダンスパーティーに？
polysemy_356470_3.mp4.en: so, what are you and shelby going to the dance as?

polysemy_356470_4.mp4.ja: 誰にお金払えばこんなに汚くできるの？
polysemy_356470_4.mp4.en: so who'd you guys pay to make your cars so dirty?

polysemy_356470_5.mp4.ja: 奨学金も取れるしまだ足りないくらいよ
polysemy_356470_5.mp4.en: You could go to the University of Mars and it still wouldn't be far enough.

polysemy_356470_6.mp4.ja: 自分の幸せをつかむときなのまずダンスからね
polysemy_356470_6.mp4.en: It's time for you to find your own bliss, starting with this dance.

polysemy_572248_0.mp4.ja: 仲間の前で私に楯突くのは止めるべきだ
polysemy_572248_0.mp4.en: You have to stop challenging my authority in front of the others.

polysemy_572248_1.mp4.ja: 人格を変えようとしている

polysemy_572248_2.mp4.ja: 君が作られた頃は遺伝子組み換え技術は未熟だった
polysemy_572248_2.mp4.en: Genetic engineering was in its infancy when you were created.

polysemy_572248_3.mp4.ja: コース上の惑星を探せ
polysemy_572248_3.mp4.en: Scan for any planets along our flight path.

polysemy_572248_5.mp4.ja: 人質を殺害する趣味を持つようになったのか？
polysemy_572248_5.mp4.en: Murdering hostages is turning into a new hobby for you.

polysemy_572248_6.mp4.ja: 艦隊は我々を見つけ出すまで止めません
polysemy_572248_6.mp4.en: Starfleet isn't going to stop until they find us.

polysemy_572248_8.mp4.ja: でも君は認めた少しやりにくいよ
polysemy_572248_8.mp4.en: But you got to admit, it's a little awkward.

polysemy_572248_9.mp4.ja: 君がお母さんを助けるためにしたということはわかっている
polysemy_572248_9.mp4.en: I know you did it to help your mother, but ...

polysemy_572248_10.mp4.ja: 私もまだ順応しようとしています
polysemy_572248_10.mp4.en: I'm still adjusting to it myself.

polysemy_572248_11.mp4.ja: もう彼に従う必要はない
polysemy_572248_11.mp4.en: You won't have to answer to him any longer.

polysemy_572248_16.mp4.ja: ワープを解除し、検閲の準備をしろ
polysemy_572248_16.mp4.en: Drop out of warp, and prepare for inspection.

polysemy_572248_19.mp4.ja: 彼を止めるのを手伝ってくれ
polysemy_572248_19.mp4.en: You have to help me stop him.

polysemy_572248_20.mp4.ja: コースを変更したまえ
polysemy_572248_20.mp4.en: You have to alter your course.

polysemy_572248_22.mp4.ja: 頼む、頼むから変えてくれ
polysemy_572248_22.mp4.en: Please, please, you have to do as I ask ...

polysemy_572248_23.mp4.ja: もし、艦隊が私を拘留していたらもし、私が彼らとずっと一緒にいたらもっと違っていたかもしれない
polysemy_572248_23.mp4.en: Maybe things would have been different if I'd been there for them, if Starfleet hadn't locked me away.

polysemy_572248_24.mp4.ja: 誰かが彼の逃走を手助けするためオフラインにしたんだ
polysemy_572248_24.mp4.en: Someone took it off-line to cover his escape.

polysemy_572248_25.mp4.ja: セキュリティ・コードを持ってなかった
polysemy_572248_25.mp4.en: He would've needed the security codes.

polysemy_572248_26.mp4.ja: 4人しかコードを知らなかった
polysemy_572248_26.mp4.en: Only four of us have the codes.

polysemy_572248_27.mp4.ja: 誰かさんがトゥポル中佐を守ろうとしてる
polysemy_572248_27.mp4.en: Someone's a little protective of Commander T'Pol.

polysemy_308644_0.mp4.ja: 金があればどうにかなる
polysemy_308644_0.mp4.en: A fortune, James, but I am fortunate because I can afford to lose a fortune.

polysemy_308644_1.mp4.ja: 今は愉快なクマの物語を書いている
polysemy_308644_1.mp4.en: Well, currently, I make my living entertaining princes and their courts with my trained bear, Porthos.

polysemy_308644_2.mp4.ja: だが命の心配は要らない
polysemy_308644_2.mp4.en: Only the true master would attempt these tricks without either measure of safety.

polysemy_308644_3.mp4.ja: 大きい劇場を借りないと
polysemy_308644_3.mp4.en: I took an extended lease on the theater, keeping the actors on.

polysemy_308644_4.mp4.ja: 彼を戦士に育て上げる
polysemy_308644_4.mp4.en: Our people teach boy Indian ways, make him great warrior.

polysemy_308644_6.mp4.en: Sarah let EMa cook this evening.

polysemy_308644_7.mp4.ja: マイケルは国王で槍を持ってる
polysemy_308644_7.mp4.en: Lords and ladies, His Royal Highness, King Michael the Benevolent, protector of the realm.

polysemy_308644_9.mp4.en: She didn't get out of bed for months.

polysemy_308644_11.mp4.ja: 魔法が掛かったような演出にしよう
polysemy_308644_11.mp4.en: Yes, and then the money for the play will appear magically before me.

polysemy_308644_12.mp4.ja: 仲間になるかサメのエサになるかだ
polysemy_308644_12.mp4.en: So now you can either choose to become a pirate with the rest of us, or we'll toss you to the sharks.

polysemy_308644_13.mp4.ja: 危険なので命の保障は出来ない
polysemy_308644_13.mp4.en: To enter upon the most dangerous chapter in your young and soon-to-be-wasted lives?

polysemy_308644_15.mp4.en: " No later than you were out, James."

polysemy_308644_16.mp4.ja: 何も知らずに結婚した
polysemy_308644_16.mp4.en: I was hopelessly naive when I married you.

polysemy_308644_17.mp4.ja: あなたに秘密の場所があったなんて
polysemy_308644_17.mp4.en: I imagined that brilliant people disappeared to some secret place where good ideas floated around like leaves in autumn.

polysemy_308644_18.mp4.ja: 凄い咳き込むことがある
polysemy_308644_18.mp4.en: She said she only wanted a bit of quiet, but she was trembling so badly she couldn't even finish her tea.

polysemy_308644_19.mp4.ja: 私が検査を受けるまでギブスをつけないの
polysemy_308644_19.mp4.en: George won't allow them to set his arm unless I submit to an examination.

polysemy_332452_1.mp4.ja: 暴君の傭兵などご免だ
polysemy_332452_1.mp4.en: I won't be remembered as a tyrant's mercenary.

polysemy_332452_2.mp4.ja: スティクス河の向こうに立って
polysemy_332452_2.mp4.en: They're standing there on the far bank of the River Styx.

polysemy_332452_3.mp4.ja: どこかの阿呆の命令で命を棄てるな
polysemy_332452_3.mp4.en: Don't waste your life following some fool's orders.

polysemy_332452_4.mp4.ja: 本当にこれで良かったのか？
polysemy_332452_4.mp4.en: Are you sure you want to do this?

polysemy_332452_6.mp4.ja: この日ために十分祈ってきた
polysemy_332452_6.mp4.en: All my life I have prayed against this day.

polysemy_332452_8.mp4.ja: 奴が息をしてるだけで耐えられん

polysemy_332452_9.mp4.ja: 奴が戦わねばトロイは終わるぞ
polysemy_332452_9.mp4.en: If he doesn't fight, Troy is doomed.

polysemy_332452_11.mp4.ja: 話してる間に槍で襲いかねんぞ！
polysemy_332452_11.mp4.en: He's as likely to spear me as to speak to me!

polysemy_332452_13.mp4.ja: お前を守ろうとして死んだトロイ兵も
polysemy_332452_13.mp4.en: Trojan soldiers died trying to protect you.

polysemy_332452_14.mp4.ja: お前は神々に命を捧げた
polysemy_332452_14.mp4.en: You've dedicated your life to the gods.

polysemy_332452_15.mp4.ja: 上に立つため下で働く事もある
polysemy_332452_15.mp4.en: Sometimes you have to serve in order to lead.

polysemy_332452_17.mp4.ja: ともに食べ苦楽を分かち合った貴方がテントに隠れてる間に
polysemy_332452_17.mp4.en: I ate, laughed, mourned with these men while you hid in your tent.

polysemy_332452_18.mp4.ja: そなたの勧める道は何だ？
polysemy_332452_18.mp4.en: What course of action do you recommend?

polysemy_332452_20.mp4.ja: だが我々が舟を攻めれば彼らは団結する
polysemy_332452_20.mp4.en: But if we attack their ships, we will unify them.

polysemy_332452_21.mp4.ja: 彼らもそこまでは追って来ない
polysemy_332452_21.mp4.en: The Greeks won't go that far inland.

polysemy_332452_22.mp4.ja: 街は程なく落ちるだろう
polysemy_332452_22.mp4.en: If I die, I don't know how long the city will stand.

polysemy_332452_23.mp4.ja: これで間違えないだろう
polysemy_332452_23.mp4.en: Now you know who you're fighting.

polysemy_332452_24.mp4.ja: そなたと間違えたのだ

polysemy_332452_26.mp4.ja: ギリシアは12日間トロイを攻撃しない
polysemy_332452_26.mp4.en: No Greek will attack Troy for 12 days.

polysemy_332452_27.mp4.ja: これがトロイ人の手にある限り未来は開ける
polysemy_332452_27.mp4.en: As long as it's in the hands of a Trojan, our people have a future.

polysemy_332452_28.mp4.ja: トロイの巫女が昼は我が宮殿の床を磨き
polysemy_332452_28.mp4.en: A Trojan priestess scrubbing my floors.
